dolls.description: Clawdeen’s is wearing a fabulous purple and green outfit to the dance. It goes perfectly with her party persona that boasts short neon green hair and purple lipstick.The dress is purple with a scaly animal pattern as well as a variety of gold & black zippers. She accentuates the dress with a neon green ribbon belt and a black belt with gold rings. Her mesh tights are neon yellow and lead to her shiny gold heels. Clawdeen’s accessories feature two shiny gold hoops in each ear, molded black gloves, and a neon green clutch with gold & black accents. Also included with the doll is an iCoffin phone, dance invitation, doll stand, and party photos.

Cleo has her hair cut short and peppered with shiny tinsel streaks for the dance. It goes well with her stunning green, yellow, and copper ensemble. The form-fitting shoulderless dress is a shiny green and yellow. It has a left sleeve that wraps around her hand and a teal wrap around the shoulders. Under the dress is copper bandage tights that only cover her right leg. Her shoes are a shiny green with bronze gems dangling from the heels. She accessorizes the outfit with a bronze scarab necklace, bronze armband, bronze earrings, and a shiny copper pyramid purse. Also included with Cleo is an iCoffin phone, teal brush, doll stand, dance invitation, and party photos.

Frankie’s party attire features am electrifying black, white, and pink outfit. She highlights the wardrobe by having her long black & white hair pulled back into a pony tail. Her short black & white zigzag dress features a shiny blue sash held with a pair of white belts. Worn over the dress is a small pink jacket with short puffy sleeves and under the dress is pink fishnet tights. Each of Frankie’s shoes are unique with one being black with a gray sole and the other gray with a black sole. Accessories for her outfit include blue lightning bolt earrings, a black & white pearl bracelet, a black necklace with silver pendant, and a stitched pink and blue purse with a black & white zigzag flap. Also included with the doll is her iCoffin phone, a pink brush, doll stand, invitation, and party photos.

Clawdeen is ready to have a blast at the beach. Her long purple streaked hair looks amazing with her one piece swimsuit with side cutouts and boyshort legs. It is a leopard print with a rainbow of colors, black seams, and a purple belt with white buckle. Over the suit is a pink & black pencil stripe mini-top and on her feet are pink sandals with gold chain straps. She accessorizes the outfit with a pair of gold sunglasses as well as two triangle earrings in each ear. The earring are different colors that include pink, blue, purple, and green. Also packaged with the doll is a pink & green frisbee, a black brush, and a postcard of Clawdeen at the beach.

Cleo looks magnificent even when going to the beach. Her black hair is pulled into a ponytail and is embellished with gold tinsel highlights. Her eyeshadow is turquoise and so is her lipstick.  She is wearing a stunning monokini made of a black & gold wrappings. Over the suit is a turquoise sarong and on her feet are turquoise sandals. She accessorizes the outfit with sea green sunglasses, gold pyramid hoop earrings, a black & gold arm wrap, a black & gold leg wrap, and a gold & turquoise fan. Also included with the doll is a black brush and a postcard of Cleo sunning at the beach.

Draculauara looks beautiful with her long black hair and pink highlights. Her one piece bathing suit is black with pink heart stripes on top and yellow with pink polka dots on the bottom. It has yellow polka dot straps, white frills, and a pink bow.  Around her waist is a yellow and pink polka dot sarong that is held with a pink and yellow polka dot bow. On her feet are black sandals with pink and yellow straps. Accessories for the outfit feature pink bow-shaped sunglasses and yellow bow earrings. Also included with the doll is a black brush, a postcard of Draculaura at the beach, and a bottle of SPF 500 sunscreen to use on her sensitive skin.

Frankie is looking delightful with her eye-catching black & white hair and aqua blue eyeshadow and lipstick. Her one piece bathing suit is half yellow & aqua blue stripes and half black with a yellow & pink outlined lightning bolt. Around her waist is a black & blue checkers sarong with yellow stripes. Her sandals are black with yellow straps and blue buckles. Accessories for her outfit feature blue sunglasses, gray stud earrings, and a blue lightning bolt barrette. She also has a black beach bag with jagged yellow at the base and blue and pink jumper cables for handles. Also packaged with the doll is a black brush and a postcard of Frankie at the beach.

Jackson is ready to have some fun at the beach while still looking cool. He is wearing a yellow & white diagonal striped shirt with its sleeves cut off. It boasts black & white striped pockets, shoulders, and collar as well as black buttons. His swim shorts have one black leg and one leg checkered with white squares and squares with a variety of black, green & yellow patterns. His flip-flops are black with yellow straps and white skulls. He also has orange shutter shades, a black & white beach ball, a black doll stand, and a postcard of Jackson at the beach.

Frankie is a grayscale variant of the standard doll in the Basic series. Her outfit is the same except that everything is in shades of gray. She was an exclusive of the 2010 San Diego Comic-Con International and is limited to only 5000 pieces. Frankie is wearing a plaid dress with black fishnet sleeves and fishnet hem. She has a polka dot tie with a skullette clip and around her waist is a silver studded belt with lightning bolt buckle. Her shoes are black & white striped heels and the purse has silver studs and skullettes on the sides. Other accessories include black & silver bracelets and silver skullette dangle earrings. Also included with the doll is a gray Watzit, her dog-like pet, a silver brush, silver doll stand, and her diary.

Clawdeen boasts long brown hair with highlights, curls, and her wolf-like ears poking through. She is wearing a fearsome purple, black & peach ensemble that features a jacket, skirt, and boots. The black jacket has purple cuffs and hem as well as a purple fur collar. It is worn over a peach and black tiger striped top. Her short skirt is purple with black stitching and black tulle at the hem. She has long open-toe peach socks to go with her knee-high black and purple-strapped sandal boots. She accessorizes the outfit with a black belt with gold studs, a gold necklace, and two hoop earrings in each ear. Her purse is black with purple straps and gold buckles, zippers, and studs. Also included with the doll is an orange brush, orange doll stand, her diary, and Crescent, Clawdeen’s cat.

Cleo looks stunning in her mummy themed ensemble. She has a turquoise & black top that is part sparkly and part sheer. Under the top is a sand-colored jumpsuit with the appearance of wrapped linen bandages. Her shoes are black wedges with sand-colored wrappings and one forearm is covered with bandages. She accessorizes the outfit with gold earrings, bracelet, armband, belt, headband, and a golden cell phone strapped to her thigh. Her purse is also gold with black accents. Deuce is wearing a gray & white striped vest over a red sleeveless tee with a skull and cassette graphic. He has black pants with diamond scale patterns and black & white checkered slip-on shoes. Accessories include a black fingerless glove, a black wristband with gray skull, a gray chain necklace, and a gray-studded white belt with a red cassette tape buckle. He completes the outfit with a pair of red sunglasses. Also included with the dolls is a gold brush, two doll stands, their diaries, and their pets. Hissette is Cleo’s cobra and Perseus is Deuce’s two-tailed rat.

Draculaura has black hair with pink highlights that is tied into long pigtails. She is wearing an adorable black, white, and pink outfit that includes a vest, skirt, and boots.  The pink vest has gray buttons, white stitching, a white lace jabot, and black fishnet sleeves with white lace cuffs. She has black fishnet tights under her short white skirt that features pink stitching and white tulle at the bottom. The knee high boots are pink with black laces and gray hearts at the top. The outfit is accessorized with gray safety pin earrings, a pink flower necklace, and a parasol. The parasol is adorned with a skull tip, a black bat-shaped handle, and a black canopy held closed with a pink strap and heart-shaped buckle. Also included with the doll is Draculaura’s pet bat, Count Fabulous, a pink brush, pink doll stand, and her diary.

Frankie has long straight hair that is streaked white and black and is wearing a plaid outfit with electrifying accessories. The dress is black & blue plaid with red and white lines, has a white collar, short black fishnet sleeves, and black fishnet on the hem. She intensifies the dress with a black & white polka dot tie with skullette pin and a silver-studded black belt with lightning bolt buckle. Frankie’s purse is black & red with silver clasps, studs, and skullette. She completes the outfit with black & white striped shoes, blue skullette earrings, and blue and silver bracelets. Also included with the doll is Watzit, her dog-like pet, a gray brush, gray doll stand, and her diary.

Ghoulia is wearing a black & red ensemble that looks amazing with her light blue hair. She is wearing a red & white tank top with a cherry pattern over a black, red & white shoulderless 3/4 sleeve shirt with black fishnet gloves. Her pants are red with small black polka dots and her knee-high boots are black & white with red heels and laces. She accessorizes the outfit with a black & white piano key belt, a silver necklace with pink pendant, pink zipper earrings, a green headband, and white cat-eye glasses. Her cassette tape purse is black, red, and white with “Monster Mix” in blue. Also included with Ghoulia is her pet owl, Sir Hoots A Lot, her diary, a brush, and a doll stand. There are two different styles of packaging for Ghoulia. The initial release has a box with a coffin shaped window. The later release has a wraparound window box. Both packages have the same model number.

Holt is wearing a fire-themed outfit to go with his fiery hair and blue skin. He is wearing a half black & half white sleeveless shirt under a red pleather jacket with gold stitching and trim. His pinstripe pants are purple & black with yellow & orange flames at the bottom. The black high-top sneakers have yellow laces, yellow soles, and skulls on the toes. Accessories for his outfit include a yellow belt, black & orange headphones, orange shutter shades, and an orange turntable backpack with a black & white checkerboard flap. Also included with Holt is Crossfade, his pet chameleon, his diary, and a doll stand.  There are two different styles of packaging for Holt. The initial release has a box with a coffin shaped window. The later release has a wraparound window box. Both packages have the same model number.

Lagoona’s aquatic themed outfit looks amazing with her long blonde locks and pale blue skin. She is wearing a pink scaled bathing suit with blue fishnet tights. Over the suit is a teal scaled hoodie with black sleeves, black hem, and teal cuffs. Her shorts are black & teal with pink and teal stitching. Accessories for the outfit include black & white striped flip-flops, a gold seahorse pendant, a golden pearl bracelet, gold earrings, and a pink flower barrette. Her purse is a blue fishbowl with a gold handle that holds Neptuna, Lagoona’s pet piranha. Also included with the doll is a white brush, a doll stand, and her diary.

Frankie is all dressed up and ready to learn how to cook and sew. She is wearing a mismatched blue & white striped top with red stitched edges and black & white crisscrossed tights. Her half & half apron has a blue ruffled hem and is half red with white circles and half white with black skulls. Frankie comes with an extra dress that has black on top with a silver collar. The bottom half boasts a black & white pattern with blue lines. The dress is completed with a red and blue wide belt. Accessories for the outfits include gray dangle earrings with scissors, a blue bracelet with black stitches, and a black & white skullette bracelet. Her high-heeled shoes are white with silver toes, red straps, and black heels.   Also included with the doll is Frankie’s Home Ick book, a blue pen, a needle & spool of blue thread, a Watzit toy, stickers, a pink coffin-shaped locker with a skullette lock, a Home Ick survival guide, and a brush.

Ghoulia is wearing her gym clothes and is ready for some fun and exercise. Her white shirt has black sleeves, red trim, and features Monster High – Phys Dead – on the front. The shorts are black with a white waistband, black drawstring, and a pink hem. One leg has a skullette and the other has a pink & white zigzag. Under the shorts are a pair of red half tights. The second outfit is a multicolored dress with red straps. It begins with black trim, red & white horizontal stripes on top, and black with white polka dots in the middle. The dress has a red stripe down the front and a red hem with white vertical stripes. Her accessories are red stud earrings, a red & white bracelet, black cat-eye sports goggles with a red strap, and a pair of white glasses. Her red  & black sneakers have white tops, red laces, and black & white zigzags on the sides. Included with the doll is Ghoulia’s Physical Deaducation book, a red pen, a red bottle, a black ball, stickers, a pink coffin-shaped locker with a skullette lock, a Physical Deaducation survival guide, and a brush.

Lagoona is on her way to class, ready to learn, and looks all scientific in her white lab coat. Under the coat she has a teal dress with black straps and a pattern of white bubbles and black anchors. She also has a shirt and pants as a backup outfit. The top features a pattern of pink, white, and teal whorls. The pants are teal with a black waistband, pockets, and cuffs. Her accessories are a pink necklace, pink bracelet, and yellow dangle earrings with black anchors. The shoes are black & teal with yellow straps that wind up her legs. Also included with the doll is Lagoona’s Mad Science book, a blue pen, a three-eyed frog, a jar, an egg, stickers, a pink coffin-shaped locker with a skullette lock, a Mad Science survival guide, and a brush.

This reissue of Cleo is just like the previous doll. She is wearing the same amazing green & yellow dress, copper tights, and shiny green heels. She even has her fabulous bronze jewelry, copper pyramid purse, iCoffin phone, and teal brush. The packaging for this release differs from the first and features a wraparound window box. It also includes a “New Ghoul @ School” DVD that was not found with the original doll.

Deuce is looking fantastic with his shiny silver themed wardrobe and gloriously green snake hawk swept to the side. He is wearing a black, white, and silver argyle vest with purple hood, buttons, and zippered pockets. Under the vest is a green shirt with green squares and a black tie. His pants are shiny silver & gray pinstripes held by a black belt with gold buckle and white straps. His shoes are white-scale slip-ons with gray soles. Accessories for the outfit are a black bracelet, gold-rimmed sunglasses, iCoffin phone, and a black rose. Deuce also comes with a doll stand and a “New Ghoul @ School” DVD.

Ghoulia is wearing an adorable outfit that goes wonderfully with her beautiful blue wavy hair. Her v-neck dress features white on top that flows into a sparkly pink skirt with a shredded hem. At the waist is a black & white belt with skullette buckle. Her white lace tights then flow into shiny red, black and silver open-toe shoes with bone-like heels.  Accessories include earrings with red and white skulls, a yellow bracelet, a white choker, and red cat-eye glasses. Her evening bag is red with black accents and strap as well as three bone-like stripes on the flap. Ghoulia also comes with a yellow brush, doll stand, and a “New Ghoul @ School” DVD.

Lagoona’s long blonde & aqua blue hair is styled into a fin-like mohawk. She is decked out in an alluring pink and blue ensemble. The aqua blue dress is sleeveless and form-fitting with sheer pink ruffles at the top and a flowing pink sheer hem. Around her hips is a sand colored lace wrap held with a gold seashell clasp. Her heels are a translucent pink and blue that is utterly breathtaking. Accessories include a gold seaweed spiral band, pearl earrings, and a pearl necklace. Her pink seashell purse has blue stitching and a pearl strap. Lagoona also comes with her iCoffin phone, a yellow brush, doll stand, and a “New Ghoul @ School” DVD.

Cleo is wearing a turquoise pajama set decorated with a bandage pattern and yellow & green highlights. The outfit has one arm warmer, a top with yellow stitching along the edges, and pants with a yellow waistband and drawstring. Cleo’s striped yellow & turquoise sleep mask has the Eye of Horus, a powerful Egyptian symbol of protection, over each eye patch. Her fuzzy turquoise monster slippers each have a gold crown, yellow eyes, and a mouth with a pink tongue. Also included with the doll is a gold choker, gold pyramid nightlight, turquoise brush, doll stand, and a Cleo de Nile card.

Draculaura is ready for a sleepover with her upright pigtails and pink & white PJs. Her top is pink with puffy white polka dot shoulders, a white lace jabot with black bow, and white mesh frills on the sleeves and the hem. The pink & white polka dot pants are knee length with a pink waistband and white mesh frills on the hems of the legs. She accessorizes the outfit with a pink & white polka dot sleep mask and pink slippers. The slippers have fuzzy monster faces with eyes, fangs, and black bat wings. Entertainment for the night is a DVD of “Scary Human Movies Vol. 1” packaged in a coffin-shaped case with a gray disc. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and a Dead Tired Draculaura card with her checklist on the back.

Frankie looks as cute as ever with her hair in a ponytail and wearing PJs. The outfit has a white tank top with blue trim and a blue lightning bolt on the front. The black & white striped pants have a blue lightning bolt pattern, a plaid waistband with blue drawstring, and plaid cuffs. Frankie has a black & white striped sleep mask with blue trim. Her fuzzy monster slippers are blue with yellow eyes and silver neck bolts. She brings to the slumber party a iCoffin MP3 player with speaker dock. Also included with the doll is a blue brush, doll stand, and a Dead Tired Frankie Stein card.

For the sleepover, Ghoulia has her hair in a ponytail and is wearing a cute red & pink outfit. Her top is white with red spatter, two vertical black stripes in the front, and a pink bow by the neck. The pants are also white with red spatter and have red, black & white striped cuffs. Over the pants is a black miniskirt with a red, black & white striped waistband. Ghoulia’s sleep mask has has the same red spatter as her pajamas. Her slippers are red fuzzy monsters with yellow eyes and black cat-eye glasses. Her treat for the night is a delicious box of red popcorn-like “Brain Puffs”. Also included with the doll is a red brush, doll stand, and a Ghoulia Yelps card.

This playset features Lagoona Blue wearing cute aquatic-themed PJs. It also has her Hydration Station where she rests and rehydrates. Logoona has on a white tank top with blue stitched edges and a pattern of blue waves and pink flowers. Her pants are blue with a blue & white wave pattern, white stitching, and a white waistband with drawstring. Lagoona’s sleep mask is white with a blue wave pattern and blue edges. Her pink fuzzy monster slippers each have yellow eyes, a mouth, and fins. The Hydration Station is a tube with a transparent front, blue back door, and a black base with a blue seashell. The black top has a gray skullette, a blue scale roof, and a gray hand crank. The inside of the door has three bubble shelves to hold Lagoona’s essentials. The station lights up with three different modes: flashing lights, extended flashing lights, and lights always on. When filled with water it can also creates streams of rising bubbles. The playset includes Neptuna, Lagoona’s pet piranha, and many other items. There’s a blue bottle of H2O, a bottle of moisturizer, a journal & pen, a seashell compact, a doll stand, a brush, and a funnel.

Draculaura is wearing an adorable ensemble that boasts a multi-layered top, skirt, and tights. The v-neck shirt is primarily black with pink hearts, pink trim, and a white line with pink ruffles on the front. The sleeves and turtleneck are made of white fishnet. The skirt is double-layered with a light pink and a dark pink layer; both layers feature black mesh ruffles. Her tights are a combination of white fishnet and thigh high black stockings. Pink shoes with hearts on the heels and ankle strap bows complete the outfit. She accessorizes with pink dangle skullette earrings. A doll stand, brush, and a keychain of her pet, Count Fabulous, are included with the doll.

Frankie has her hair in a ponytail and is wearing a casual outfit that features an extra-long light blue top with a red & white crisscross pattern. Over the shirt is a small silver vest with red stitching and a red lightning bolt. Under the shirt she has black tights with a crisscross pattern of silver stitches. Her shoes are black sneakers with silver laces and soles. Frankie accessorizes with black lightning bolt earrings. A doll stand, brush, and a keychain of her pet, Watzit, are included with the doll.

This Ghoulia doll is an exclusive from the 2011 San Diego Comic-Con. Much like other attendees of the event, Ghoulia is dressed up as her favorite comic book hero. Her outfit features a sparkly black jumpsuit with “DF” in a silver circle on the chest. The suit has a red collar, big red cuffs on the sleeves, and a red zigzag around the waist. The white & red zigzag belt has a buckle with “DF” in black. Each of the knee-high red boots have a white line down the front, white at the top, and horizontal black stripes at the top and heel. Accessories for the outfit include red stud earrings, white glasses, and a red & black eye mask. Ghoulia comes with a red & white lanyard for the event, a Dead Fast tote bag, and a Dead Fast action figure. A red doll stand and a red brush are also included with the doll.

This playset includes Clawdeen with purple PJs and her purple & gold bunk bed. Clawdeen’s hair is long, straight and highlighted purple. Her top is white with purple leopard print sleeves, purple scratches on the front, and a ripped waist. The black pants have purple leopard print pockets, a purple hem, and a purple waistband. Her sleep mask is white with purple tiger stripes and her purple fuzzy monster slippers each have yellow eyes, gold ears, and a fanged mouth. The bunk bed has a gold frame with ornate posts that each have a skull on the top. The back of the bottom bunk features a gold skullette in the frame and strings of hanging translucent purple beads. The bottom bunk also has black swing-out mirror on one post and a sheer black curtain held with a purple bow. The deep dish purple beds have gold along the edges and the bottom bed also has gold feet. The beds have black tufted mattresses held with purple buttons and each comes with a black & gold leopard print blanket. There are a variety of accessories for the playset. It has a hair straightener, razor, black brush, and make-up kit. There is also a coffin-shaped mini fridge, a can of Full Moon Energy, and a black & white skullette pillow with pink bow.

Abbey outfit features a dress with white fur around the collar, white trim, and a mosaic pattern that is black, white, pink, and light blue. Under the dress is a pair of sheer pink tights. Her arms and legs have white fur warmers, on her head is a white fur headband, and she is wearing white hiking boots. Accessories for the outfit include a pink snowflake earring, a blue icicle earring, a blue crystal necklace, and a bluish gray pouch with a white skullette key & chain. Also included with the doll is Shiver, her pet wooly mammoth, a light blue brush, light blue doll stand, and Abbey’s diary.

Cleo is wearing a purple off-the-shoulder tiger print sweater with a pattern of gold leopard spots, teal straps, and thick yellow trim. Around her waist she has a wide teal belt with a double row of gold grommets. Her purple pants lead into black & purple knee high boots that are covered with gold zippers and feature gold fangs for heels. Accessories for the outfit include a black & gold zipper choker, two gold hoop earrings in one ear, two gold hoop earrings connected by a chain in the other ear, and a black multi-finger ring with gold spikes. Her black oval purse has a black & gold shoulder strap and a flap covered with purple straps and gold buckles. Also included with the doll is a purple & teal binder, a purple brush, purple doll stand, and Clawdeen’s diary.

Cleo is wearing a turquoise strapless halter top with shiny green crisscrosses and a black & gold band across the top. Under her short gold & black skirt is a pair of black tights. Over the tights and on her arms are different length warmers with a pattern of black, yellow & white bandages. Her shoes are turquoise strappy cage sandals with gold studs on the front and gold hourglasses for heels. Accessories for her outfit include a studded gold belt with loincloth, a gold & turquoise choker, a gold rope headband, and gold earrings. Her black purse has a gold strap, turquoise frills, gold & turquoise embroidery, and features the Eye of Horus on the sides. Also included with the doll is a binder with a bandage pattern, a yellow brush, yellow doll stand, and Cleo’s diary.

Draculaura looks fabulous in her multi-patterned dress. It has white with pink hearts on top, a pink bow, puffy white sleeves with pink cuffs, and black in front with yellow buttons and pink & yellow crisscrosses. The rest of the dress is pink with black mesh frills along the hems of the double-layered skirt.  Under the dress she wears yellow tights with pink polka dots. Her pink & black pumps have yellow soles and stacked pink buttons for heels. Draculaura accessorizes with yellow earrings that have dangling red & black bats. She also has an open parasol with a pink bow on top, a pink center canopy, and a black spiderweb outer canopy. Her purse is black, coffin-shaped, and has a pink heart on the side. Clawd is wearing a white button-down shirt with gold buttons and gold crossbones under a gold vest with a white collar. His black jeans lead into a pair of scuffed gold work boots with black laces and soles. Accessories for the outfit include a teal cap, a teal scarf with black dots, a teal belt with gold buckle, a gold earring, and a gold watch. He also has his pet gargoyle bulldog, Rockseena. Included with the dolls is a teal doll stand, a pink doll stand, a pink brush, and the diaries of Draculaura and Clawd. This 2-pack is sometimes referred to as “Forbitten Love” because of a blurb on the box.

Frankie is wearing a long blue shirt with pink vertical stripes, white crisscrosses, and white cuffs and collar. Over the shirt is a black sweater with blue trim and a blue & silver argyle pattern on the front. Under the shirt are tights with one long silver leg and one short black leg. Her black shoes have blue & silver crisscrosses on one half and silver bolts for heels. She accessorizes the outfit with a silver triple-wrapped belt & lightning bolt buckle, a silver skullette hair clip, a silver & blue charm bracelet, and black earrings with silver lightning bolts. Her black hexagon purse has a silver strap and a blue & silver lightning bolt flap. Also included with the doll is a blue brush, blue doll stand, and Frankie’s diary.

Lagoona is wearing a teal romper with pink along the top, black buttons, scalloped ruffles around the waist, and a gold rope belt. Under it she is wearing a black fishnet body suit with one leg, one sock, and one sleeve not attached. Her high heel sandals are translucent pink. Accessories for the outfit include pink fish bone earrings, a gold headband, a gold multi-strand necklace, and a gold, pink & blue watch. She also has a pink translucent purse, a translucent blue folder, and a paper with images of seahorses and a skullette.  The doll comes with a light blue brush, light blue doll stand, and Lagoona’s diary.

Spectra looks terrorific in her double layered dress that features a black top with purple and black straps and a sparkly purple front with three silver chains. To go with the bodice is a purple skirt with a black mesh overskirt. Her translucent purple shoes each have a silver ball for a heel that is connected to a chain that wraps around the shoe. Accessories for the outfit include a silver belt with rings, ball & chain earrings that may be all black or have silver chains, a silver shackle bracelet, and a silver double chain necklace. Her handbag is a translucent purple pouch with a silver chain handle. Spectra’s pet ferret, Rhuen, a purple brush, purple doll stand, and her diary are also included with the doll.

Toralei looks ferocious in her black leather jacket with red trim and gray studs on the collar. Under it she wears a red sleeveless top with jagged diagonal black & white stripes. The pants are black with with red showing through a variety of tears. Her black open-toe shoes have red red heels, red laces, and gray studs along the tops. She accessorizes the outfit with an orange scarf, red fingerless gloves, and a gold grommeted belt with a silver skullette buckle. In each ear there is a silver stud and the left ear also has a silver hoop earring. Her purse is black & red with red scratches on the sides. Extras for the doll include Sweet Fang, her pet saber-toothed cub, a black brush, doll stand, and her diary.

Abbey looks frostastic in her snow-inspired swimsuit. It is a black one-piece suit that features blue, white & pink snowflakes and a black halter strap that cinches at the bust. Around her waist she wears a purple netting wrap with a snowflake pattern and white fur waistband. On her feet are translucent purple sandals with icicle heels. Abbey accessorizes the outfit with translucent blue icicle earrings, a purple skullette key charm bracelet, and a translucent purple hat. Her cocktail is pink shaved ice in a translucent blue cup. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and an Abbey Bominable card with a map of Skull Shores.

For the getaway, Ghoulia is wearing a black one-piece swimsuit with green spatter, green straps, a red waist, red around the top, and a white strip with red dots on the front. Over the suit she has a skirt made of red netting with patterns of white brain wrinkles. Her heeled sandals are translucent red with dripping ankle straps. Accessories for the outfit feature green sunglasses, a red flower-shaped brain barrette, a white lungs earring, a red brain earring, and a red dripping bracelet. Ghoulia’s drink is a red smoothie in a coconut skull cup with a white bone umbrella and red straw. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and a Ghoulia Yelps card with a map of Skull Shores.

Gil is ready for a fun and exciting vacation at the beach. He is wearing a black sleeveless shirt with turquoise stitching and a red & white fish bone on the front. His swim shorts are turquoise with black stitching and a wave graphic on one leg. On his feet are black flip-flops with translucent turquoise straps. Gil’s accessories include a clear dome helmet with a silver neck piece and a turquoise shell pendant. His drink is in a yellow pineapple cup with a yellow straw, green leaves, and a white fish bone cocktail pick. Also included with the doll is a doll stand and a Gil Webber card with a map of Skull Shores.

Lagoona looks absolutely amazing for her island getaway in her black two-piece bathing suit with pink and blue stitching. The top has pink straps and features a turquoise mesh cover. Hiding the shorts is a cover up with black & turquoise stripes and a pattern of pink scales. Her shoes are translucent blue sandals with winding ankle straps and bubbly heels. Accessories for the ensemble include a black headband with pink flower, a pink tentacle bracelet, a pink octopus dangle earring, and a turquoise tentacle earring. Her greenish-brown beverage is in a tiki cup with a straw and pink umbrella. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and a Lagoona Blue card with a map of Skull Shores.

C.A. Cupid is wearing a black, white, and pink ensemble to Draculaura’s birthday party. Her strapless dress has a pink top and a black waist that flows into white blending into pink. The bottom of the skirt is adorned with black tulle and black hearts. C.A.’s accessories feature a white heart-shaped purse with pink handles, a black tulle shawl, a bow & arrow ring, and white earrings – one a bow, the other an arrow. Her shoes are black with pink & white heart-shaped chains. One has a bow for the heel and the other has an arrow. A pink stand is included with this Walmart exclusive doll.

Clawd is dressed for the biggest birthday bash in the last thousand years. He’s wearing a black & teal patterned jacket with gold accents and collar over a black dress shirt and teal tie. His pants are black with gold stitching and his boots are gray. He accessorizes the outfit with sunglasses, a gold belt, and a gold earring in his left ear. Clawd’s gifts for Draculaura are a pink necklace in a black jewelry box and a black & white dress with a pink bow. Also included with the doll is a coffin-shaped invitation with Skullette key, a black brush, and a black doll stand.

Clawdeen is sporting a wild, yet fancy, outfit for her BFF’s birthday party. She’s wearing a black tuxedo jacket, white shirt with black buttons, a purple bowtie, and purple gloves. Her purple leopard print pants have black & gold accents and a black & gold belt with a gold crescent moon buckle. The shoes are black and gold with fanged teeth as heels. Her purse is black & white with black buttons and fur handles. Clawdeen’s gift for Draculaura is a black puff-sleeved dress with red stripes and white lace around the collar. The doll also has a coffin-shaped invitation with Skullette key, a black brush, and a black doll stand. I can't believe Draculaura is finally turning 1600! It's been scary fun planning the party and it's definitely going to be a howling good time. Her dress is totally haunt couture and she'll definitely be the center of attention. I'm so excited for her that this may be the first time I'll ever want to walk into a party and not have all eyes on me. Now if I can just get Clawd to relax. You'd think he'd never escorted a ghoul to her sweet 1600th birthday before ;)

Draculaura is turning 1600 and to celebrate she is having a party. Her birthday outfit features a black dress with pink hearts & bows, white lace accents, and a pink waistband with a bow.  She accessorizes with a white lace shawl, a pink heart tiara, and long pink earrings – one spells “sweet” and the other “1600”. Draculaura’s purse is sparkly pink lips with white fangs. Her frosting inspired shoes are black, white & pink with a bat-winged heart on each. The doll also includes a coffin-shaped invitation with Skullette key, a Sweet 1600 birthday cake, a black brush, black doll stand, and an extra black skirt with a pink striped overskirt.

Frankie Stein looks amazing for Draculaura’s birthday bash. Her outfit features a one-shoulder black & blue plaid dress with red & black lines and silver stitch accents. It has a puffy skirt with blue and black tulle underskirts. She accessorizes the ensemble with stitched black bracelets, black stitches earrings, a silver lightning bolt purse, and black & blue patched & stitched shoes. Frankie’s birthday gift is a black and pink dress with a white diamond pattern and white bow. The doll also includes a coffin-shaped invitation with Skullette key, a black brush, and a black doll stand.

This reissue of Frankie is very similar to the original. The primary difference is it lacks the pink coffin-shaped locker and the survival guide. Frankie’s outfit is the same and features a blue & white striped top with red stitched edges. Her tights are black with a white crisscross pattern. The apron has blue ruffles and is half red with white circles and half white with black skulls. She also has a one-piece dress with black on top and a silver collar. The skirt is black & white with blue lines. A red & blue wide belt goes with the dress.  Accessories are a blue & black bracelet, a black & white skullette bracelet, and gray dangle scissor earrings. The shoes are white with silver toes, red straps, and black high heels. Extras for the doll include Frankie’s Home Ick book, a blue pen, a needle & spool of blue thread, a Watzit toy, and a brush.

This reissue of Ghoulia has the same outfits as the original but lacks some extras. The pink coffin-shaped locker and the survival guide are not included with this release. She is still wearing a white tee with black sleeves and red trim that sports Monster High – Phys Dead – on the front. The shorts are black with a pink & white zigzag on one leg and a skullette on the other. Under the shorts is a pair of red half tights. Her shoes are red & black sneakers with red laces and white on top. Ghoulia also has a dress that is a combination of black & white polka dots and red & white stripes. Her accessories include red earrings, a red & white bracelet, a red bottle, black sports goggles, and white glasses.  Extras for the doll are a Physical Deaducation book, a red pen, a red bottle, a black ball, and a brush.

This version of Lagoona is almost identical to the original but lacks a few of the extras. The pink coffin-shaped locker and the survival guide are missing from the reissue. Lagoona still has her white lab coat and teal dress with the pattern of white bubbles and black anchors. She also comes with an extra shirt and pants. The shirt has teal, pink and white whorls and the pants are teal with black pockets, waistband, and cuffs. Accessories for the outfits are a pink necklace, pink bracelet, and yellow dangle earrings with black anchors. The shoes are teal & black with yellow winding straps. The extras for the doll include a three-eyed frog, a jar, an egg, a Mad Science book, a blue pen, and a brush.

Howleen is a maniac on the floor. With her pink pompom hair and energetic leotard she can dance like a ghoul has never danced before. Her single-shoulder leotard is powder blue with pink trim and a colorful diagram of dance steps. The attached tights are black with a pattern of pink and powder blue paw prints. On her feet are baby blue high tops with pink laces and skullettes on the sides. Around her waist is a pink safety pin belt with attached headphones. She accessorizes with a yellow safety pin earring and a black boombox purse with pink accents.

Lagoona is a majestic beauty when she dances in her aquatic themed wardrobe. Her black leotard has squiggly pink straps and a pattern of pink coral and white bubbles. Over the leotard is a turquoise mesh skirt with a pink waist and a pattern of pink tentacles and blue-green seaweed. Her shoes are pink with starfish on the front and seaweed winding up her calves. She has a pink bracelet and an aqua-blue purse that is a scuba tank covered with seaweed and seashells. The color of the purse matches the light blue highlights in her long blond hair.

Operetta is a cool cat on the dance floor with her rockabilly ensemble. She is wearing a black leotard with a pattern of white dice with red pips. It is held by a red halterneck and a black & white spiderweb skirt is worn over top. On her feet are white shoes with black tips and piano key heels. Her red baguette bag is embellished with music notes and spiderwebs. Over one eye is a purple heart-shaped mask and holding her red & black hair is a white & purple mini check headscarf.

Robecca is a dancing machine with her amazing robot moves and outfit that goes perfectly with her lovely black & blue hair. She is wearing a collared blue & black leotard emblazoned with a pattern of steampunk filigree. Over the leotard is a purple & black waist cover-up that features a patchwork pattern of riveted sheet metal. She wears bronze booties with purple bows at the tops and gears for heels. On her head is a small top hat attached to a bronze headband made up of gears. One wrist has a purple steampunk bracelet and she carries a purple steampunk purse. The tubular hinged purse is embellished with rivets, gauges, and gears.

For the sleepover, Abbey’s hair is long, straight and white with pink & blue highlights. She is wearing a blue sleeveless nightie covered in a pattern of white snowflakes. The nightie has black frills decorating the arm holes, a black hem, and around the neckline is a black bow with white pompoms on the ends. Abbey has a white fur sleep mask and her shoes are blue fuzzy monster slippers with black eyes and mouth. The doll also has a pink tub of “I Scream” ice scream.

Clawdeen is wearing a ferociously cute outfit to the sleepover. It features a black tank top with with yellow stitched edges and a yellow paw print on the front. The shorts are purple leopard print with a black stitched waistband, yellow stitching, and a black hem. Clawdeen’s sleep mask has the same purple print as her shorts and her slippers are yellow fuzzy monsters with ears, black eyes, and black mouth. Also included with the doll is a purple makeup kit in the shape of a paw print.

Draculaura is back again with her hair pulled back in a ponytail and a brand new outfit. For the sleepover she is wearing a pink nightie with a pattern of black bat-wing hearts. It has white & pink mesh frills decorating the chest and the hem. Her slippers are pink fuzzy monsters with black eyes, a black fanged mouth, and pink bat-wings. She has a pink sleep mask with the same pattern as her nightie. Also included with the doll is a copy of “Monster Beat” magazine.

Lagoona will be swimming in complements when she arrives at the polka dot dance. She is wearing a sleeveless aqua blue dress that is trimmed in black and covered in a pattern of beautiful bubbles with rows of blue kelp.  Separating the top of the dress from the skirt and its pink tulle overlay is a blue belt with a pink starfish buckle. Her translucent pink shell shoes each have a white pearl attached to the toe strap. Additional trappings for the outfit feature a white pearl earring, a string of pearls earring, two pink necklaces, a blue necklace, a white charm bracelet, and a pink headband with an open clamshell containing a white pearl. On one arm is a blue mesh arm warmer and her purse is a translucent orange sand dollar with dangling kelp. She also has a black & teal iCoffin phone and a blue clamshell makeup case. Included with the doll is a silver brush, doll stand, and a trading card of Lagoona.

Operetta will bedazzle everyone at the polka dot party with her cute and creative ensemble. Her sleeveless back & white polka dot dress is supported by red & black polka dot straps. The skirt is embellished with a red tulle top layer that is covered in a pattern of records. Her red wedges with black spiderweb heels have white dice with red dots on the toe straps and black spiders on the backs. Accessories for the outfit consist of a silver spiderweb earring, a white heart-shaped mask, and a double-layered white pearl necklace with black music note charms. In her hair is a red & black polka dot bow and around her waist is a black & white keyboard belt. Her purse is a black & white jagged keyboard with black spiderweb sides and a black handle. She also has a black & red iCoffin phone and a red coffin-shaped makeup case. Included with the doll is a silver brush, doll stand, and a trading card of Operetta.

Spectra looks stunning in her dots & chains ensemble for the polka dot dance. She is wearing a single shoulder sleeveless dress that is light purple with black polka dots. It features a pink tulle overlay that has a pattern of pink chains and large purple dots. Her purple shoes have cone heels and are covered in rows of chain links. Accessories begin with a silver chain hairband, a silver heart-shaped lock earring, a white skullette key earring, and a silver chain necklace with layers down to her waist. On each wrist is a black band with a pink & black polka dot bow and on each ankle is a silver shackle. Her black handbag is wrapped in chains and has a silver handle. She also has a black & purple iCoffin phone and a purple padlock-shaped makeup compact. Included with the doll is a silver brush, doll stand, and a trading card of Spectra.

Clawdeen is wearing a shiny gold top featuring black tiger print and a ruffled neck. Over the top is a black vest with a wide purple hem and a white faux fur collar. Her a-line skirt is shimmery purple with a black tulle hem. On her feet are knee-high black sandals with purple straps and gold buckles. Accessories consist of gold hoop earrings, a gold necklace with purple pendant, and a gold studded black belt.  This version is similar to the Signature doll, but also has the Ghoul’s Alive! feature. When a lever on her back is depressed Clawdeen tilts her head back ,closes her eyes, raises her arms, and howls. Also included with the doll is a stand.

Frankie is wearing an adorable dress with a white top that features black fishnet sleeves. Around her neck is a black bow tie held by a silver skullette pin. The plaid skirt is black and blue with red and silver crisscrossed lines. The hem of the skirt is detailed with black fishnet. She accessorizes with translucent blue dangling skullette earrings and a black belt. The belts is embellished with silver studs, chains, and a silver lightning bolt buckle. On her feet are black & white striped ankle-strap pumps. Frankie is similar to the Signature doll, but also has the Ghoul’s Alive! feature. When her belly button is pressed she emits an electrifying buzz and her face and rib cage glow. Also included with the doll is a stand.

Spectra is wearing a lovely dress with black & purple straps. The bodice is black with a sparkly purple front detailed with three silver chains. The purple skirt has a shiny silver pattern of chains that form a chain link design. Over the skirt is a black mesh top layer. Her translucent purple boots each have a silver ball & chain heel with the chain wrapping around the boot. Accessories for the outfit include a silver double chain necklace, a silver shackle, and a silver belt with dangling hoops. Spectra is similar to the Signature doll, but also has the Ghoul’s Alive! feature. When her belly button is pressed she emits a ghostly wail and lights up with a spooky blue glow. Also included with the doll is a stand.

Abbey is gorgeous as she sparkles in her icy Halloween dress that features a white bodice with silver dots and a triple-layered skirt. The shoulders and sleeves are shimmery white with the sleeves ending in white faux fur cuffs. The top skirt is white tulle with a silvery snowflake print, the middle is pink, and the bottom is black tulle. All three layers have shredded hems. Her boots are translucent white with blue crystal fur collars. Accessories begin with a white faux fur headband adorned with a translucent blue snowflake. On her shoulders are translucent blue snowball shoulder pads and around her waist is a translucent blue belt with hanging icicles. Her masquerade mask is a pair of translucent purple goggles covered in dripping ice. The frozen trick-or-treat pail is translucent purple with a skullette and snowflakes. Abbey comes with a purple cake decorated with black spiderweb icing. It has a black cake topper presenting a spider with a top hat. The cake rests upon a pedestal made of skeletal hands attached to a black base. Also included with this Walmart exclusive is a brush, doll stand, and a trading card of Abbey.

Clawdeen has gone all out this Halloween with her werewolf inspired costume. She has even shaved the sides of her head and added animal print highlights. The outfit features a purple & black honeycomb jumpsuit emblazoned with green leopard print and shiny gold zipper designs. To emphasize the werewolf motif the sleeves and leg warmers are covered in long black faux fur. On her feet are claw-heeled gold pumps covered in studded straps.  The outfit is accessorized by a gold chest plate made up of studded straps, a gold belt with two rows of studs, and gold studded ankle bracelets.  Her masquerade mask is black with purple highlights and is held by stiff gold chains that end in crescent moons. In each ear are two green studded hoop earrings and on her hands are green fingerless gloves. Her trick-or-treat pail is purple with a skullette and spikes on the sides. Clawdeen comes with a small black coffin detailed with a skullette, filigree, and spiderwebs. Inside the coffin is creepy green goo candy. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and a Ghouls Rule trading card of Clawdeen.

Cleo has taken the mummy theme to a whole new level with her enchanting Halloween costume. The wardrobe begins with a dress that features a tan bandage-style top adorned with shiny turquoise lines. The skirt is long black mesh with a turquoise top layer that is much shorter and trimmed with a jagged edge. On her feet are translucent turquoise shoes with ouroboros ankle straps and platforms made of gold pyramids. Gold accessories for the ensemble consist of a snake earring, a stud earring, an ouroboros bracelet, and a wide bracelet with triangles. Around her neck is a gold snake necklace holding multiple black mesh bandages embellished with shiny golden lines. Her masquerade mask is also gold and covered in mummy wrappings. For a purse she is using a turquoise trick-or-treat pail with a bandaged mummy skull. Cleo comes with a turquoise punch bowl with gold snake legs, a gold ladle, and gold cup. The bowl and cup are filled with a pink bubbly concoction. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and a Ghouls Rule trading card of Cleo.

Draculaura embraces her vampire heritage with an elaborate Halloween costume. It begins with an off-the-shoulder dress incorporating a white bunched bodice, black mesh bell sleeves, and a triple-layered skirt. The top skirt is black mesh with a patter of batwing hearts, the next layer is sparkly pink, and the bottom layer is pink. Each jagged layer gets progressively longer and all three are under a black mesh train adorned with shiny pink filigree. Under the skirt is are tights that flow from pink to black matching her translucent gray spiderweb boots. The boots have black fang heels and pink & black laces up the sides that end with bat wing hearts. Accessories consist of pink dripping heart-shaped earrings and a translucent pink spiderweb collar. Attached to her back are ornate spiderweb bat wings that are black on top and transition to pink on the bottom. Her masquerade mask is translucent pink with a filigree handle and black bat wing eyebrows. The trick-or-treat pail is pink with a skullette and bows. Draculaura comes with a white skullette skeleton with two pink attachable bows. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and a Ghouls Rule trading card of Draculaura.

Frankie is portraying the bride of Frankenstein for Halloween and she is mesmerizing with her big hair and stunning black & white ensemble. The costume begins with a sheer mesh dress featuring a blue bodice and a skirt that transitions from white to gray. The hem of the skirt has shimmery silver lightning bolts and the trim and waist of the dress are detailed with black stitches.  Under the dress is a black jumpsuit covered with strings of metallic blue nuts. Her black knee-high boots have stitches running down the sides and are glittery at the feet. Completing the outfit is a black cropped jacket with a shimmery silver pattern of interlinked nuts. Accessories entail silver earring with dangling strings of nuts and two silver cuffs made from nuts. She has a blue masquerade mask that only covers one eye and is held with a lightning bolt handle. Her purse is a blue trick-or-treat pail with a skullette and neck bolts. Frankie comes with a silver studded cauldron that is filled with a green brew. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and a Ghouls Rule trading card of Frankie.

Abbey looks amazing with straight white hair accentuated by a blue and pink underlayer highlights. This Toys”R”Us exclusive comes with a lovely pink  dress plus two additional outfits. She is wearing a pink sleeveless turtleneck sweater dress that features black lacing down the front ending with two dangling draw strings. Black leg warmers cover her calves and the tops of her boots. The lace-up booties are black & purple with purple heels. Her second outfit consists of a sleeveless pink dress with a purple fracture pattern. The dress has a top layer with a wide white faux fur waist and a black tulle skirt. The last outfit has a single long sleeve shirt covered with pink, purple, and white angular shapes. The shirt is accompanied by white pants decorated with pink and purple sparkly snowflakes. For shoes Abbey has white peep-toe heels with side cut-outs and a pair of black lace-up boots. Accessories include a variety of translucent items. She has a pink snowflake earring, a pink icicle earring, a purple pendant, two pink bangles, two  black bangles, and two purple bracelets. The doll’s ice crystal purse is translucent purple and her iCoffin phone is black & blue. Abbey does not come with a brush or doll stand. The doll may also be referred to as”I Heart Fashion Abbey Bominable”. On mountain, most important fashion is warm and clothes are kept in large trunk with aging cheese of the yak. here in the down below there is closet and styles are not desirable to smell like yak pizza topping. Fashion can also be stylish not just warm. Is nice also to have own closet without having to share with whole family as youngest must store clothes on bottom with cheese. Fashion never smelled so good.  xx Abbey

This Toys”R”Us exclusive of Frankie has a wide black stripe down the center of her long straight hair. She comes with a colorful argyle outfit plus two additional outfits.  The outfit she is wearing has a red collared shirt, a blue tie with red & white crisscrossed lines, and a red leatherette underbust vest. The argyle skirt has black, blue, and gray diamonds with black and red intercrossing diagonal lines. Her white knee-high socks have yellow designs at the top; one has stitches and the other has lightning bolts. On her feet are red sandals with ankle and toe straps. The second outfit features a top that is part red and part black with a blue chain link fence pattern. The skirt is blue with red stitching, black crisscrossed lines, and a frilly red hem. Around the waist is a silver double belt with hanging chains and a yellow lightning bolt buckle. The final outfit has a shiny silver single-strap top and patchwork pants. The pants have red patches and black patches with white diagonal crisscrossed lines. Extra shoes include half blue & half silver pumps with bolts for heels. She also has white high-top sneakers with silver soles, silver laces, and black lightning bolt emblems on the sides. Accessories consist of yellow lightning bolt dangle earrings, silver lightning bolt dangle earrings, a black bolt pendant, two black and two white bangles, and a silver bracelet. The doll’s black purse is detailed with screws, lightning bolt handles, and red power outlets. Frankie does not come with a brush or doll stand. The doll may also be referred to as”I Heart Fashion Frankie Stein”. I got some kind of electrical bug that really shorted me out today and made me feel like I was running on half a charge. Some of the ghouls called to see if I wanted to go to the Maul but I didn't really feel up to leaving the house so I did the next best thing to shopping. I organized my closet! it may not sound glamorous but I fixed it to look like a store display so now when I get dressed it's almost as if I'm in my own private fashion boutique picking out styles for the day... well almost .)  xx Frankie

Clawdeen is fierce and fashionable with her brown & green hair and stunning sleeveless dress. The black gathered dress is covered with purple and yellow-green splatter. Over the dress she wears a yellow-green satin jacket with a purple faux fur collar. She completes the outfit with gold open-toe wedges that have mesh-like sides and zippers on the front. Her purse is a gold wristlet held by a gold hoop handle. Me + Fashion Show = A howling good time

Operetta is wearing a lovely black, white & red ensemble that goes wonderfully with her red and black hair. Her fitted black top features a black & white striped strip in the front, black & white striped straps, and purple top trim. The white pencil skirt has a pattern of black spots and music notes. She accentuates the outfit with black & white wedges that feature leopard print toeboxes and red trim. Accessories consist of a red spiderweb brooch, a red spiderweb belt, and a translucent black heart-shaped eye mask. Her record purse is embellished with red trim and a red spiderweb. The outfit was previously released, with some minor variations, as Operetta’s Maul Session fashion pack. I love it when I can spend the day haunting old record stores

This reissue of C.A. is almost identical to the original Sweet 1600 version. Her strapless dress has a pink top with a a black tulle shawl worn over it. The white skirt turns into pink at the bottom and is decorated with black hearts and black mesh along the hem. Her black soled pumps are made from a chain of pink and white hearts. One shoe has a bow for the heel and the other has an arrow. Accessories for the outfit include white bow & arrow earrings, a pin wrist cuff, and a pink & white bow & arrow ring. her white heart-shaped purse has pink handles and black, pink & gray designs. Extras for the doll consist of a pink doll stand and her diary.

Abbey looks chillerific with her cool clothing and icy accoutrements. She is wearing a long light blue top tie-dyed with purple & pink triangles. Around the neck are shiny rounded icicles and over the shirt is a black fur shawl. The white leggings have a crystal pattern formed by black, light blue, pink, and purple triangles. Her boots are translucent gray with skullette buckles and ice crystal trim.  The outfit is accentuated with a pink crystal multi-finger ring, a single pink crystal earring, and an onyx crystal belt. Her translucent pink backpack has pink straps and a black key ring with skullette keys. Extras for the doll consist of a light blue binder, black brush, black doll stand, student pictures in the form of stickers, and Abbey’s Fearbook.

Cleo is magnificent in her Picture Day ensemble. She is wearing a long shirt with a pattern blue bandage wrappings highlighted with black, teal, and shiny gold. Under the top are black & shiny gold striped tights. On her feet are gold wedge sandals with multiple blue straps. The outfit is made even more dazzling by a wide gold belt and gold bracelet; both featuring a black scarab emblem. Her translucent teal purse is embellished with the outline of a gold scarab. Extras for the doll consist of a gold binder, black brush, black doll stand, student pictures in the form of stickers, and Cleo’s Fearbook.

Draculaura looks fangtastic in her black, white, and pink ensemble. Her white under black mesh top has a black collar with white frills and a large pink bow in the front. The pink skirt has a black waist, Victorian designs with bats & carriages at the bottom, and black tulle along the hem. Her black wedges have white skullette clasps and knee-high straps that are tied into a bow at the top. Accessories for the outfit feature pink & white skullette and crossbones earrings and a pink headband with a bow. Her pink heart-shaped purse has a black handle and is embellished with black bats. Extras for the doll consist of a pink binder, black brush, black doll stand, student pictures in the form of stickers, and Draculaura’s Fearbook.

Spectra is unstoppable in her spooktacular chain-themed garb. Her shades of purple top features a chain-link pattern, black mesh sleeves, and an asymmetrical hem. Under the top is a black leather miniskirt and purple tights with a pattern of different sized chains. Her silver heels are held with ankle straps and chains. Accessories for the outfit consist of a white skullette key earring, a silver heart-shape lock earring, a black multi-chain necklace, and a black wrapped-chain bracelet. Her purse is a silver clutch wrapped with black chains. Extras for the doll consist of a pink chain binder, black brush, black doll stand, student pictures in the form of stickers, and Abbey’s Fearbook.

Draculaura is dressed as Snow Bite, a lovely fairy tale ghoul. She is wearing an off-the-shoulder dress featuring a green top layer with a puffed bust and an uneven dripping hem. Around the waist is a white bow with a pink dripping apple pattern. Under the green is a pink skirt with an outline of small black apple-skulls and larger shiny green apple-skulls. The skirt’s hem is serrated and embellished with black tulle. Black pumps complete the ensemble. Each shoe has a pink bow wrapped around the toebox, a green leaf counter, and a translucent green dripping heel. Translucent green accessories comprise of apple-skull earrings, an apple-skull barette, and a necklace. Her hinged purse is a translucent green apple-skull with dripping goo. Also included with this Target exclusive is a green brush, doll stand, and a Snow Bite trading card. Once there was a kingdom where the ghouls were wondrous fair yet none could hold a candle to Snow Bite of the raven hair.  In manner she was proper and graceful, in attitude generous and kind; that she was considered fairest never crossed her mind.  For she shared a gothic cottage deep in a primeval wood with seven friends who were zombies and for the eight of them unlife was good.

Frankie is dressed as Threadarella, a sweet fairy tale ghoul with dreams of a better life. She is wearing a patchwork formal dress that has one puffy blue sleeve and a shiny silver shoulder strap. The bodice and skirt are blue with red diagonal crisscrossed lines. The skirt has a silver strip by the waist, a short blue top layer, and a black fishnet under layer. Connecting portions of the skirt is a hanging blue strip and hanging silver strip. Light blue shoes are the last piece of the wardrobe. They have reddish-pink laces that are wrapped around the ankles and feature silver scissors for heels. Accessories for the outfit consist of silver needle earrings, a tiara, and a purse. The tiara is made of silver needles, reddish-pink thread, and light blue accents. Her purse is a silver spool of reddish-pink thread and light blue beads. Also included with this Target exclusive is a black brush, doll stand, and a Threadarella trading card. Once there was a lovely ghoul whose heart was sweet and kind she sewed all day with no time for play but for a better unlife she pined.  Her name was Threadarella and she lived with her step sisters three, who were totally catty and even quite bratty, not nearly as nice as she.  One day Threadarella told them about her grandest dreams but they shook their heads and laughed as they said, "You'll just fall apart at the seams."

Abbey is dressed for an international adventure. She is wearing a single shoulder dress covered with a pattern of purple & pink shapes. The angular shapes are of various sizes and create an ice crystal appearance. The bottom of the dress is adorned with a white faux fur hem. Her white ice crystal wedges have crystal flowers on the toe and ankle straps. Translucent purple accessories consist of crystal earrings and a crystal necklace. Around her waist is a translucent blue belt made of icicles. Her handbag is made of translucent blue bricks with black handles.

Clawdeen is ferociously fashionable for her visit to the City of Frights. She is wearing a sleeveless purple dress with black straps and an over-skirt. The dress is decorated with interconnected hexes and claw-like fleurs-de-lis. The skirt is black mesh with shiny gold leopard print and a black lace hem. Over the dress is a black faux fur vest. On her feet are studded gold pumps with serrated claw heels. Gold accessories for the outfit include an Eiffel Terror earring, two studded hoop earrings, and a bracelet made up of four studded straps. Her gold triple-belt has a pyramid studded belt, a grommet belt, and a grommet belt with dangling crescent moons. Clawdeen’s suitcase is purple with a gold serrated handle. The studded case is adorned with three straps held by gold crescent moons. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, Clawdeen’s travel journal, and a mini journal.

Deuce has dressed for comfort during his travels abroad. He is wearing a green sleeveless hoodie with yellow scaly spots and black drawstrings. His argyle shorts are white with gray and green diamonds intersected by black diagonal lines. Each of his black loafers feature a graphic of a green skeletal snake looped around a skull. He accessorizes with green sport sunglasses and a travel bag. The black scale bag has a skullette on the side and is held by a green frame with handles.

Draculaura is ready to experience the City of Frights. She is wearing an off-the-shoulder pink top covered in black printed chandeliers. The sleeves are black and the top is trimmed with pink. Her short skirt is light pink with pink & black zigzag stitching and a black tulle hem. She accessorizes with black rounded-toe pumps and pink dripping heart earrings. Draculaura’s rounded travel bag is light pink and features a dark pink lid with a bow and skullette.

Frankie is ready for a shockingly good trip with her flowing black & white hair and energizing wardrobe. She is wearing a blue puffy sleeve top with black cuffs, black waist, and pink trim. A pattern of black nuts, screws, and Eiffel Terrors cover the top. Her silver pencil skirt features diagonal  blue stitched stripes and a black hem. For shoes she has black knee-high boots with lightning bolt heels and yellow lightning bolts down the sides. She accessorizes with yellow sunglasses, a yellow earring with dangling nuts, and a blue screw earring. Frankie’s suitcase is baby blue with a yellow lightning bolt handle. The case is covered with screws, gauges, lightning bolts, and a central pink rectangle with a baby blue lightning bolt. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Frankie’s travel journal.

Ghoulia is dressed for comfort as she embarks on her trip abroad. She has on a black hoodie dress with an image of a blue skeletal rib cage on the front. The front also has deep red pockets with black brain wrinkles. The hood is shadow striped in red, white, and black and the hem of the dress is red. On her feet are blue sneakers that feature high heels and white skullettes on the sides. She accessorizes with red horn-rimmed glasses and red zipper slider earrings. Her red box handbag is detailed with dripping goo, a skull with sunglasses, and has a black lid with handle.

Jinafire is a creature of beauty with her long black & green hair, gold scale skin, and elegant wardrobe. She is wearing a purple dress covered with red flames and blue and black clouds. The collared dress has one long black mesh sleeve adorned with red scales. Around her waist is a gold belt that holds a black mesh cover-up with red scales. Her pumps are red with ankle straps and gold heels. The bottom of the shoes are gold claws holding orbs. Accessories consist of red dangle earrings, a red bracelet, and a black hairstick. The stick has red tassels on each end and a large gold flower in the middle. Jinafire has a red suitcase detailed with lavish designs, gold flames at the top, and a retractable black handle. The front of the case is adorned with a magnificent Chinese dragon. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Jinafire’s travel journal.

Rochelle’s pink & blue hair is pulled back into a ponytail for her exciting excursion. She is wearing a pink & black dress with black straps. The bodice is covered with a decorative scroll pattern and pink lace circles that run down the front. A black waist separates the bodice from the splotchy pink skirt which features a large image of the Eiffel Terror. Light and dark gray striped tights lead into pink shoes. The shoes and their heels are made up of ornamental scrolls. On her head is a gray beret with a pink bow. She accessorizes the outfit with two black and two blue bangles. Rochelle’s suitcase is gray with a pink handle made of decorative scrolls. The case is adorned with chains, fleurs-de-lis, and ornamental scrolls giving it a wrought iron appearance. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Rochelle’s travel journal.

Skelita is as lovely as ever with her long black hair, brown highlights, and colorful wardrobe. She is wearing a black halterneck top with purple and pink piping along the top trim. It is covered with a pattern of gray flowers and curled designs. The triple-layered skirt has jagged trim and multiple sections featuring different colors and prints. The prints include graphics of bats, spiders, safety pins, flowers, moons, hearts, and more. On her feet are green wedge sandals with brown heels. Accessories consist of an ornate orange necklace, a brown etched belt, and a brown etched bracelet. For travel she has a pink tombstone-shaped suitcase with a spinal column handle. The case is covered with elaborate curling patterns with a white skull in the center. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Skelita’s travel journal.

This 2-pack has a couple of cute and sassy werewolf sisters who look amazing. Clawdeen is wearing a sleeveless high-waist dress that features a shiny green top half with purple leopard print. The bottom is black with two columns of horizontal gold stripes. One leg has a gold and purple tiger striped knee-high sock and her shoes are gold open-toed cut out heels. Accessories for the outfit include four gold bangles on one wrist and two gold hoop earrings in each ear. Clawdeen’s hair is purple with black & green striped highlights in the front. Howleen has on a half black & half orange tank top with yellow moons and blue clouds on the black half. Over the top she has a blue sleeveless hoodie with patterns of different colored paw prints. Her black shorts have a single blue suspender with yellow grommets and one leg also has blue trim with yellow grommets. On each leg she has a different type of sock. The short sock is pink mesh and the thigh high sock has blue, yellow & orange horizontal stripes. Her black shoes are accentuated by blue straps with yellow buckles. Her accessories comprise of an orange paw print pendant and a yellow safety pin earring. On one wrist she has a blue, black & pink triple bracelet and on the other is a yellow vambrace with three yellow straps and blue buckles. Howleen’s hair is orange and styled into a frohawk. Also included with the doll is a blue & yellow paw print backpack with orange straps and Cushion, her pet hedgehog.

Nefera looks absolutely stunning in her single-sleeved top and layered skirt. The top features a pattern of mummy bandages with pink and turquoise highlights. The skirt has a combination of ruffle strips that are black or have the bandage pattern. Attached to the skirt is a turquoise mesh sash that drapes over one shoulder.  Around each ankle are leg warmers with the same wrappings pattern as her top. Her gold sandals each have black on the sides, pink & turquoise on the band, and a turquoise cobra for the heel. She enriches her wardrobe with a translucent blue ring, a gold bracelet, and a gold snake necklace with a red disc pendant. One gold earring is a triangle and the other is a snake. Around her waist is a wide gold belt encircled by a golden snake and on her head is a gold head piece. Her gold wedge purse has turquoise on the sides and a gold snake handle. Extras for the doll include a black brush, doll stand, her diary, and Azura, her pet scarab beetle.

Operetta resonates a creative beauty with her white jacket that features black spiderwebs, puffy sleeves and keyboard cuffs, a black collar, and a skullette button. Under the jacket is a black & purple patterned sleeveless top with white buttons. Her pants are blue jeans with red stitching and wide folded cuffs. The black & white shoes have white laces, a spiderweb pattern, and black treble clefs for heels. Her outfit is accentuated with a variety of black & white accessories. She has a black die ring and a keyboard bracelet. Her white belt has black musical notes and black chains with even more notes. There are two different dice earrings: a white die earring with five black dots and a black die earring with six white dots. Over one eye she has a translucent black heart-shaped mask. Extras for the doll include a black brush, doll stand, her diary, and Memphis “Daddy O” Longlegs, her pet spider. She also has a black & red guitar case adorned with white spiderwebs and black treble clefs.

Jackson looks knowledgeable and handsome in his academic attire. He is wearing a yellow dress shirt with a blue bow tie and over the shirt is a black, gray & green sweater vest with a black hem. His gray pants with white stitching lead to his blue & green sneakers with white laces and soles. He carries a green satchel with a peace symbol on the flap. His glasses are black and he has a silver piercing in his left eyebrow. Jackson’s hair is short and black with yellow bangs. Extras for the doll consist of a doll stand, his diary, and Crossfade, his pet chameleon.

Robecca looks technologically beautiful in her retro-futuristic ensemble. She is wearing a black pleather power shoulder jacket with gold trim along the edges of the short sleeves. Under the jacket is a a half pleather and half fabric sleeveless dress. The top of the dress has blue straps and blue fabric with a pattern of tan & copper dots and diamonds. The rest of the dress is black pleather with blue horizontal stripes and a pattern of gears and mechanical parts in the middle. Over the skirt is a riveted blue cage. On her feet are copper knee-high rocket boots with laces up the front, tubing on the sides, and small wings.  Accessories encompass copper goggles, dangling copper gears for earrings, and a blue & yellow vambrace on one forearm. Her round blue purse has a hinged clock face with a skull in the center. Robecca’s long wavy hair is black with blue highlights. Extras for the doll consist of a brush, doll stand, her diary, and Captain Penny, her robotic penguin.

Rochelle looks delightful in her black & white striped top with crossed shoulder straps. Complementing the top is a black & silver puffy skirt with a pattern of fleurs-de-lis, lines, ribbons, and other images. She is wearing pink mesh socks and open-toed ankle strap heels that are gray stone with spiral designs. Accessories for the outfit consist of a black tiara, necklace, earrings, and armband. Her gray stone purse has various carvings, a pink fleur-de-lis clasp on the flap, and a stone chain handle. Rochelle’s long lovely hair is pink with streaks of blue. Extras for the doll consist of a brush, doll stand, her diary, and Roux, her pet gargoyle griffin.

Venus is sporting a black t-shirt with a yellow & pink collage that includes skullettes, hearts, “eco punk”, and other designs. Over the tee is a sleeveless jean jacket with yellow stitching and a pink & yellow image of a skullette with “eco punk”. Under the short black skirt are pink, black & yellow capri leggings. Each of her pink boots have green ivy laces and a large mouth full of green teeth. Accessories include three hook-like earrings in one ear, a dangling green vine in the other, and a variety of green vine adornments. Around her neck is a vine necklace, vines on each forearm, and vines wrapped around her calves. Her canvas tote bag has a pattern of three images: “I”, a heart, and a skullette shaped Earth. Venus’s very long and straight hair is pink with green streaks. Extras for the doll consist of a brush, doll stand, her diary, and Chewlian, her pet venus flytrap.

This grayscale edition of Frankie may lack color, but not style. Her hair is cut into an adorable bob and she is wearing a fabulous black and shiny silver monokini. It has a pattern of clouds & lightning on top, silver on the bottom, and black straps. Around her waist she has a black cover up with the same cloud & lightning pattern. Her translucent gray sandals feature nuts for the heels and the straps. Frankie accessorizes her outfit with a translucent gray nut-shaped bracelet and earrings. A doll stand is also included with the doll.

Draculaura is ready to sail away in her nautical themed outfit. Her pink & white striped one-piece swimsuit has boy leg style bottoms, a black mesh collar with white trim, and a pink bow in the front. Around her waist she wears a black mesh cover up with a pattern of pink anchors and other colorful images. Her pink sandals are adorned with anchor shaped heels. Accessories for the outfit features a white sailor cap with black strap, a pink anchor bracelet, and pink anchor earrings. Her beverage is kept in a red flower glass with a white pistil and straw. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and a Draculaura card with a map of Skull Shores.

Abbey is super cool in her frosty Roller Maze wardrobe. She’s wearing a light blue dress with pink & white lines that give it a fractured ice appearance. Neon green trims the top of the dress and attaches a jagged over-layer of black fishnet. Accenting the outfit is a variety of translucent items. There are pink skull knee pads, a pink necklace, a blue igloo helmet, and pink roller skates. The skates have snowy white soles with black and green wheels. This version differs from the doll in the 2-pack due to a lack of tinsel in the hair. Included with the doll is a stand and a trading card of Abbey.

Abbey and Ghoulia are teaming up for the Roller Maze. Together they will be unstoppable while also looking freaky fabulous. Abbey’s wearing a light blue dress with pink & white lines and neon green trim at the top. A black fishnet over-layer with jagged trim covers the top part of the dress. Her translucent accessories consist of pink skull knee pads, a pink necklace, a blue igloo helmet, and pink roller skates. The skates have white soles with  hanging snow and black and green wheels. Ghoulia has on a black, white, and green striped dress. It is adorned with a jagged frill collar, pink mesh sleeves, and covered in pink and black splotches. Accessories comprise of a yellow dripping bracelet, translucent green glasses, pink knee pads with skulls, a pink brain-shaped helmet, and roller skates. The black skates have pink soles with green and blue translucent wheels. This Kmart exclusive is almost identical to the individual releases. Abbey’s hair has tinsel which the other doll lacks and some versions have knee pads that are solid instead of translucent. Trading cards for both ghouls are included in the 2-pack.

Clawdeen looks ferocious wearing her wild Roller Maze outfit. It features a dress where half is black with two purple stripes down the front.
