The rest is green with black leopard print that is emphasized be a neon green mesh sleeve. Skating accessories comprise neon green knee pads with helmeted skulls, a neon green helmet with leopard print and spikes, and purple skates. The skates also have leopard print and spikes as well as green soles with black and green wheels. Included with the doll is a green stand and a trading card of Clawdeen.

For her Roller Maze debut, Frankie is sporting an amazing black dress embellished with a pattern of colorful neon nuts and one shoulder made of light blue mesh. A neon pink stripe runs down one side of the dress and a neon green stripe down the other.  Her skater gear entails light blue knee pads with skulls, a light blue helmet etched with lightning bolts, and roller skates. The skates are light blue with lightning bolts, have black soles, and feature translucent green and yellow wheels. Included with the doll is a neon green stand and a trading card of Frankie.

Ghoulia looks simply sweet in her black, white, and green striped dress. It features a jagged black collar, pink mesh sleeves, and pink and black splotches all over the dress. Skating accessories consist of a yellow dripping bracelet, translucent green glasses, pink knee pads with skulls, a pink brain-shaped helmet, and roller skates. The black skates have pink soles with green and blue translucent wheels. Included with the doll is a neon green stand and a trading card of Ghoulia.

Lagoona is ready to roll in her adorable Roller Maze ensemble. She is wearing a black dress with one teal strap, a pink stripe along the bottom, and an attached crop top. The single sleeve yellow top has a jagged hem and a pattern of pink and black piranha. Her teal skating gear consists of knee pads with helmeted skulls, a fish scale helmet with dorsal fin, and skates. The fish scale skates are teal with black tail fins and pink and yellow translucent wheels. Included with the doll is a teal stand and a trading card of Lagoona.

Operetta looks spectacular in her black & white halterneck dress. It features a pattern of colorful records, a black collar, and a black strip down the front with pink dots. Around her waist is a black belt with a record buckle. Skater accessories include black knee pads with helmeted skulls, a black helmet with music notes, and a white heart-shaped eye mask attached to the helmet. Her white spiderweb skates have purple music note heels with translucent red and green wheels. Included with the doll is a neon green stand and a trading card of Operetta.

Abbey looks like an icy princess with her stunning outfit and shimmery strands accentuating her long white hair. She’s wearing an off-the-shoulder dress with a black bodice and serrated collar decorated with golden designs. The skirt features multiple layers that include black holed-mesh, blue tulle, purple tulle, black tulle, and a white tulle top layer embellished with gold snowflakes and a multi-pointed hem. Shiny gold accessories consist of an icicle & snowflake circlet, ice crystal earrings, a snowflake pendant, an ice crystal belt, and icy wrist cuffs. On her feet are golden pumps with icicle designs and translucent white straps. Also included with this Walmart exclusive doll is a black brush, doll stand, and an ornate translucent white lantern.

Clawdeen looks magnificent with her long brown hair and stunning black mini dress. The dress features a pattern of gold crescent moons, a gold mesh halterneck, and a triple-layered open over-skirt. The skirt’s sheer purple top layer is embellished with gold crescent moons and zipper-like accents. The middle layer is white with black leopard print and the last layer is black holed-mesh. Accessories consist of a dangling gold crescent moon earring, a gold zippered headband, a gold belt, and wrapped around each forearm is a gold zippered armband. On her feet are translucent purple wedges with purple zipper straps and gold platforms. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and an ornate translucent purple lantern.

Draculaura is dazzling with her pink & black hair, pointed bangs, and golden strands. She is wearing a high-low dress that has a black bodice embellished with pink polka dots, pink trim, and gold string laced up the front. The triple-layered skirt begins with a sheer black layer decorated with spiderwebs and bat wing hearts. The middle layer is black holed-mesh with a serrated hem and the innermost layer is solid pink. Golden accessories feature a spiderweb and bat wing circlet with matching necklace. Other golden accessories include two flared spiderweb bracelets and fanged heart earrings. On her feet are gold diamond-patterned wedges with translucent pink spiderweb straps. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and an ornate translucent pink lantern.

Frankie looks priceless with her black, white & blue hair that is long and straight with sparkly gold streaks. She is wearing a sleeveless dress held by a turquoise tulle strap attached to a black tulle choker. The bodice is a split of dotted white cloth and black leatherette. The open-front dress has a triple tulle skirt with a layer of turquoise and two layers of black. The long double overlay features black holed-mesh over turquoise cloth decorated with a pattern of golden hex nuts and lightning. Golden accessories for the ensemble include hex nut dangle earrings, two hex nut bracelets, a hex nut headband, and a lightning bolt chest piece. On her feet are gold wedges with translucent turquoise straps. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and an ornate translucent blue lantern.

Gigi looks magical with pink & orange hair pulled into a high multi-banded ponytail. She’s wearing a lovely jumpsuit with a shiny top that is half blue, half pink, and detailed with black strips. The glittery black cummerbund-like waist leads into black knee-length harem pants. The pants are decorated with shimmery gold swirls and scorpion styled patterns. The outfit is accessorized with gold scorpion earrings, a gold scorpion bracelet, and an ornate gold lantern that is held by a hook. On her feet are pink gravity wedges with curled tips and gold buckles. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, Gigi’s diary, and Sultan Sting, her pet scorpion.

Howleen is adorable with her pointy ears poking through her black beanie. Her hair is long, straight and pink with blunt bangs. She is wearing a black dress covered with pink and blue paw prints, a yellow ladder-like zigzag, and a wide neon green hem. Over the dress is a dark purple leatherette jacket with silver accents. Hot pink fishnet tights are worn under the dress. She accessorizes the outfit with a gold stud earring, black bangle, purple bangle, and a light blue belt with gold pyramid studs. On one hand is a black fishnet glove and on her feet are black lace-up knee-high boots with a double row of gold pyramid studs along the tops.  Her gold purse features light blue accent straps and a gold chain handle. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, Howleen’s diary, and Cushion, her pet hedgehog.

Lagoona looks remarkable with her yellow hair, cute bangs, banded ponytail, and pink flower barrette. She’s wearing a strapless magenta dress with a serrated hem and pattern of black scale-like lines. The single sleeve and top layer of the dress are sheer turquoise. The sleeve is decorated with black trim and black frills along the neckline. Translucent accessories for the outfit consist of pink dragonfly earrings, a green sea turtle pendant, and a green sea turtle bracelet. On her feet are translucent turquoise wedges with green seaweed straps and heels. She also has green seaweed goggles and a translucent blue fishbowl purse that holds Neptuna, her pet piranha. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Lagoona’s diary.

Twyla is wearing a lovely ensemble that complements her wavy pastel green hair with blue stripes. She has on a 3/4 sleeve top that is dark purple with black vertical stripes dotted with spiders. The top’s black collar is accentuated by a black bow.  Continuing the outfit is a black triple-tiered skirt decorated with seafoam green squiggles & swirls. Each tier of the skirt is trimmed with purple tulle. Accessories consist of silver doorknob earrings, two lavender bangles, a black bangle, and a seafoam green bracelet with a dangling spiderweb dreamcatcher in the shape of a Skullette. Around her waist is a seafoam green belt with a skullette buckle and dangling spider.  Her rounded blue bag has a black handle and features a seafoam green spiderweb dreamcatcher on the side. On her feet are purple Oxford pumps with seafoam green laces, black platforms, and swirling heels. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, Twyla’s diary, and Dustin, her pet dust bunny.

Abbey is artistic and beautiful with her long white hair, pink & blue highlights, and silvery strands. She is wearing a short sleeve  black dress covered in a pattern of white ice crystals with blue or pink outer glows. The collar and hem are trimmed with blue faux fur. Accessories consist of translucent blue skullette earrings, pink ski goggles, and a white icicle belt. On her feet are blue lace-up boots with dripping ice platforms and white frosted icy cuffs. To create her white ice castle sculpture, Abbey has a blue chainsaw decorated with snowflakes. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and her art class journal.

Draculaura has a pink and yellow streak in her black hair that is styled into a ponytail with bangs. She is wearing a yellow top with horizontal stripes of dripping pink. The neck has a pink bow and the sleeves are trimmed with pink tulle. The skirt is black with yellow and pink splatter and decorated with a yellow tulle hem. Tied around her waist is a pink apron with black crisscrossed lines and a serrated hem. Accessories consist of pink skullette earrings and a yellow headband with bows. On her feet are white waffle textured booties adorned with studs. A pink skullette with crossed pink-tipped paintbrushes decorate the tops. The heels are pink paint tubes that squirt out the swirled pink platforms. To paint, Draculaura has a pink heart-shaped palette and a white brush with a pink tip. Her artwork is a Picasso styled self portrait that is in an ornate pink frame bedecked with spiderwebs, hearts, a bat, and fangs. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and her art class journal.

Robecca’s hair is black & blue with streaks of purple. She’s wearing a purple striped shirt with short puffy sleeves and two buttons on the front. Her black high-waist suspender skirt is decorated with a shimmery print of interconnected purple, blue, and silver wires, gears, and skullette sprockets. The suspenders are shiny blue and the hem is adorned with purple tulle. Accessories consist of dangling copper clock earrings and copper welding goggles with a bow on top. On her feet are blue knee high boots with many rows of studded straps, copper platforms, and copper heels. To create a metalworking masterpiece, Robecca has an old copper blowlamp. She has designed a robotic clock with a copper face. The mismatched creation has a copper leg, silver leg, silver arm, gold arm, and a gold crank. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and her art class journal.

Skelita’s dress features a purple bodice with a swirly white rib cage print. The wraparound skirt is black and covered with a pattern of skullette flowers that are pink, purple, turquoise, or orange. The hem is trimmed with a scalloped pink lace. Over the dress she has on a black & turquoise striped vest. Accessories begin with an orange-brown belt with a skullette flower. A matching headband with a turquoise skullette flower is worn in her black hair with streaks of brown and turquoise. On her feet are orange-brown sandals adorned skullette flowers, skullette pedestal heels, and turquoise skullette flowers on the foot straps. Skelita is a talented sculptor who has created an ornate skull shaped urn. It is pink with three orange skullette flowers and sits upon a turquoise spiderweb-styled pottery wheel. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and her art class journal.

Abbey Bominable Abbey and Heath make a great team while learning how to cook. Together they make devilishly good foods that can be eaten hot or cold. Abbey is wearing a short black dress with a black fur collar with black bow, short fur sleeves, a colorful pattern of crystal lines, and a pink mesh overskirt. To protect the dress she has on a blue apron with the Monster High logo and black mesh frills. She accessorizes with a pink earring made of measuring spoons, a blue spatula earring, and a pink bead bracelet. Her shoes are translucent purple heels with bluish-white spots. Heath Burns Heath is wearing a black jacket with pink & white on the collar, shoulders, hem, and cuffs. The sleeves also have orange & yellow flames rising from the cuffs. Under the coat is a gray tee with an image of orange & yellow flames.  Over his blue jeans he has a red apron with the Monster High logo. His shoes are black with red & orange flames on top and white soles. He protects his hand with a red spiderweb oven mitt. Extras for the dolls include a pink bone spoon, black bone tongs, a measuring cup with green liquid, a half blue & half red plate, a purple canister with a green lid and an eyeball, a plate of yak cheese, a Home Ick notebook, and a brush.

This 2-pack features Cleo and Ghoulia wearing lab coats while studying to be mad scientists. Cleo De Nile Cleo’s white lab coat is trimmed with yellow bandages, has bandages hanging from the right sleeve, and has images of gems on the right side. Under the coat is a short strapless dress made of turquoise wrappings and a yellow mesh overskirt. For each leg there is a leg warmer with the same turquoise wrappings as the dress. Her shoes are turquoise sandals with gold straps and gold studs around the edges. She accessorizes the outfit with a gold snake-shaped necklace, gold earrings with symbols from the periodic table, a gold bracelet, and a black triangle bracelet. Cleo also has gold safety goggles with a black strap and the head of a cobra on one side. Ghoulia Yelps Ghoulia’s white lab coat has a red & black brain wrinkle pattern on the collar and cuffs. Under the coat is a black dress with red trim and a colorful pattern of squares and symbols from the periodic table. Her white shoes have skullettes on the sides, blue laces, black toes, and red brain-wrinkled soles. Her accessories are white cat-eye glasses, a black hair band with a red brain, red earrings with symbols from the periodic table, a red bracelet, and a black bracelet. Accessories for the dolls include a beaker, flasks, skullette-shaped tubing, a Mad Science notebook, and a brush.

For the sleepover, Lagoona has straightened her long blonde hair with light blue highlights. She is wearing a black top with pink stitching on the edges. On the front, it is decorated with an image of a skullette wearing a sleep mask. Her shorts are aqua blue scales with a pink hem, pink waistband, and pink drawstring. Lagoona’s sleep mask is aqua blue with pink and white outlined bubbles. Her turquoise fuzzy monster slippers each have yellow eyes, a fanged mouth, and pink fins. She also has a pink cup filled with a white drink, marshmallows, and seaweed hanging over the sides.

Robecca looks relaxed wearing her pajamas and her hair in a ponytail. She has on a light blue tank top with black straps, black frills, and images of gears on the front. Her blue shorts have a black & blue gear pattern, black frill accents, and a black bow at the waist. Robecca’s brown sleep mask is designed to resemble steampunk goggles. Her copper monster slippers each have eyes, a mouth, and Victorian welding glasses. For the slumber party she has her iCoffin phone and gramophone dock so everyone can listen to music.

Spectra is looking spectacular for the sleepover with her long purple hair and purple outfit. Her light purple nightgown has puffy mesh sleeves, dark purple trim, and a purple bow by the neckline. The nightgown’s multi-point skirt is layered mesh with a pattern of light & dark purple chains. Spectra’s sleep mask is purple and detailed with a pattern of chains. Her translucent purple slippers are fuzzy monsters with blue eyes and silver chains. The doll also comes with a purple tombstone-shaped tablet.

Clawdeen hair is purple & brown and pulled to the side. She is wearing a form-fitting black dress with a pattern of purple claw marks, crescent moons, and gold star-like dots. The top of the dress and 3/4 sleeves are purple & black leopard print. The angled hem is adorned with layers of frilled purple mesh. Accessories begin with a spiked crescent moon gold earring and an intricate gold necklace. The necklace is a choker connected to rows of beads with crescent moon charms that hang on her shoulders. Around her waist is a studded gold belt with additional rows of beads and a variety of charms.  On her feet are gold peep-toe pumps decorated with wide ankle straps, rows of beads, studs, and a black crescent moon on each foot strap. Clawdeen’s light purple purse is a crescent moon with rows of dangling beads that end in little crescent moons. It has been 400 years since the last vampire queen ran away rather than rule. Now Draculaura has been declared the new heir to the vampire throne but is she really the true queen or just a stand-in? The ghouls will have to exit stage fright and go on location to Londoom, New Gorleans and finally Hauntlywood to find the real star and to see how the final scene ends.

Cleo’s hair is black with turquoise streaks. She is wearing a stunning off-the-shoulder dress that features a pattern of black & turquoise streaked strips highlighted by gold dots. Gold-flecked black tulle graces the top of the dress and trims the hem of the draped skirt. Accessories start with a gold headpiece with three studded rows and snake and scarab accents. Around her waist is an ornate gold belt with rising snakes and hanging beaded strands adorned with Egyptian charms.  On her feet are gold peep-toe pumps with studded platforms and heels. Each foot strap is enhanced by a black gem and the ankle straps are formed by intertwined snakes. Cleo’s gold purse features a scarab, intricate detailing, a beaded handle, and strings of dangling beads. It has been 400 years since the last vampire queen ran away rather than rule. Now Draculaura has been declared the new heir to the vampire throne but is she really the true queen or just a stand-in? The ghouls will have to exit stage fright and go on location to Londoom, New Gorleans and finally Hauntlywood to find the real star and to see how the final scene ends.

Draculaura’s hair is pink & black and worn in a high ponytail. She is wearing a black dress with a pattern of pink bats with white dotted wings. The sleeveless dress has pink bow straps, a serrated diagonal hem, and a shimmery pink underlayer with a serrated hem.  Accessories begin with dangling black beaded earrings and a beaded necklace with rows of dangling beads. Around her waist is an elaborate pink belt with a row of pink beads with diamonds, a beaded middle row, and bottom chain with hanging beads and charms.  On her feet are pink peep-toe heels decorated with strings of beads, a row of lips, and a black heart with bat wings on each foot strap.  Her pink beaded purse is in the shape of lips with fangs and is accentuated by strings of hanging beads. It has been 400 years since the last vampire queen ran away rather than rule. Now Draculaura has been declared the new heir to the vampire throne but is she really the true queen or just a stand-in? The ghouls will have to exit stage fright and go on location to Londoom, New Gorleans and finally Hauntlywood to find the real star and to see how the final scene ends.

Lagoona’s hair is long and blonde with pronounced blue streaks. She is wearing a lovely dress with a swirled pattern of black, pink, and turquoise. The sleeveless dress has wide silver straps and a black waist band. The tiered skirt features scalloped hems with a shimmery pink middle layer and a black bottom tier. Accessories begin with a black beaded headband adorned with a nautilus and its wiggling tentacles. Around her neck is a beaded turquoise necklace with multiple strands and a variety of aquatic charms. On her feet are pink peep-toe seashell heels with strings of beads, a black pearl on each foot strap, and spiral seashell heels. Lagoona’s purse is a black jellyfish decorated with a beaded strap and tentacles. It has been 400 years since the last vampire queen ran away rather than rule. Now Draculaura has been declared the new heir to the vampire throne but is she really the true queen or just a stand-in? The ghouls will have to exit stage fright and go on location to Londoom, New Gorleans and finally Hauntlywood to find the real star and to see how the final scene ends.

Clawdia is adorable with her wavy yellow hair and golden ensemble. She is wearing a metallic gold dress with patterns of black stripes, moons, and stars. Over the sleeveless dress is a red suit jacket held by two black buttons and trimmed in black. Accessories consist of two black hoop earrings, a black crossbones earring, black glasses, a black studded bracelet, and a gold necklace with a cutout circle. On her feet are red knee high socks accentuated by golden pumps covered with pyramid studs. Included with the doll is a red iCoffin tablet, a red notebook, and black skullette pen. There is also a black brush, doll stand, and Clawdia’s diary. Age: 19  Monster Parents: The Werewolf  Killer Style: Tribal Prep: I love to mix graphic tribal prints with some scholarly flair, and because Londoom is fangsolutely undead with fashion and literary history, both my brain and my wardrobe benefit. To paraphrase Spookspheare, "this is the stuff as screams are made on."  Freaky Flaw: Whenever I think, I chew. Pencils, pens, paper clips, gum... the corner of my iCoffin. One year Clawdeen got me a manicure for my birthday, but on the way home from the nail salon I got an idea for a story and well - let's just say little sis was not happy with what I chewed on that day.

Elissabat has lovely straight black hair with purple highlights. She is wearing a corseted dress with a purple top and a purple-laced black bodice. The ruffled skirt has a purple top layer and black mesh under layers. Over the sleeveless dress is a cropped top that is black & purple with sleeves that end in purple bell cuffs. Accessories consist of one short and one long pair of purple dangling earrings and a translucent purple bat wing heart bracelet. On her feet are black knee-high lace-up boots with platform heels and rows of ruffled bands. Included with the doll is coffin-shaped case with a DVD of her latest feature and a clawesome award. The gray trophy is a hand reaching from a movie reel. There is also a black brush, doll stand, and Elissabat’s diary. Age: 1,601  Monster Parents: A Vampire  Killer Style: I am fangsolutely in love with lace, ruffles, silk and satin, as long as it's frilly and it's black or deep purple.  Freaky Flaw: I have terrible stage fright, so I must be completely prepared before I ever stand in front of an audience. I've been told I'm a natural on stage and in front of a camera, but that's only because I spend hours making sure I have my lines down. It's the only way I can do what I do.

Honey is awesome with her big & beautiful teal & light green spiral curl afro. She is wearing a lovely dress with a purple top, black lace collar, and black accents. Her teal & white skirt features a pink & purple floral print, a shredded hem, and a shredded black under layer. Accessories consist of a black headband with an attached pink hat, pearl white stud earrings, a pearl bracelet, and a pink swamp moss belt. On her feet are pink ankle-strap pumps. Each scaled pump has eyes, nostrils, a snaggle toothed mouth, and a spiked tail for a heel giving them a gator-like appearance. Included with the doll is a gray dual reel camera with spiderweb accents and a black clapperboard with “Monster High”, coffin outlines, and other designs in white. There is also a black brush, doll stand, and Honey’s diary. Age: 115 in swamp monster years  Monster Parents: The Honey Island Swamp Monster  Killer Style: I am sweet in disposition, polite in manners, feminine in appearance and sociable in company. In short, I epitomize the modern southern ghoul. I am also strong, independent and capable - don't y'all forget it.  Freaky Flaw: I am a perfectionist. I believe there is always time to do something the right way and yes, I realize this can be tiresome for other monsters.

Viperine is fangtastic with her long pink & blond hair accentuated by the pink snakes that sprout from the back of her head. She is wearing a busy dress with a light blue top that features a black & pink floral & paisley print. The skirt is black with a pink, blue, and off-white print of Gorgon heads, flowers, and other designs. The bottom of the skirt has pink trim with a light blue ruffled hem. Accessories consist of a pink snake headband, translucent pink snake glasses, and a pink necklace formed by a writhing ball of snakes. On her feet are pink knee-high lace-up boots decorated with waffle-like platforms, white fangs on the toes, and wiggling snakes at the tops. Included with the doll is a light blue scaled case adorned with white fangs and a kissing snakes handle. There is also a pink makeup brush, a black makeup palette with eight skullette-shaped colors, a black brush, doll stand, and Viperine’s diary. Age: 17  Monster Parents: Stheno [steth-an-uh] - Sister of Medusa  Killer Style: Hippie Boho Chic. I like to be comfortable AND I never like scaling back when it comes to mixing different colors, patterns and fabrics together.  Freaky Flaw: Some people are huggers. I'm a biter. I just can't help myself - it's the way I show affection. I try to remember to just shake hands, but sometimes I forget.

Frankie’s hair is long, straight, and worn in a ponytail. The bangs and front are streaked black & white while the rest of her hair is white with a big blue streak. She is wearing a black shirt with the Monster High crest surrounded by white stitches. It is trimmed with yellow and sleeves are blue with black and white crisscrossed lines and stitches. Her miniskirt features the same pattern as her sleeves. Accessories for the outfit consist of black lightning bolt earrings, black and blue skullette-shaped bangles, and inverse gravity shoes. One shoe is black with a blue platform and the other is blue with a black platform. Frankie shows off her school spirit with an over-sized black & white hand. It has pink fingernails, the Monster High logo on the palm, and “#1” on the pointing index finger.

Slo Mo’s hair features blue spikes on top and the sides shaved short.He is wearing a purple t-shirt with the Monster High crest surrounded by black dripping goo. His shorts are blue and stitched with white.  On his feet are black high-top sneakers with white toe caps and soles. Slo Mo cheers for his school by waving a pennant. It is black & pink with white zigzag lines and the Monster High crest.

Spectra’s long straight hair is made up of varying streaks of purple and is held back with a blue headband. She is wearing a black top with pink trim that sports the Monster High crest wrapped in a pink chain. Her blended skirt is pink & purple with a reverse scalloped hem and a pattern of overlapping chains.  She accessorizes with dangling black skullette earrings, two blue skullette-shaped bangles, and two black ankle shackles. On her feet are pink pumps that are decorated with a chain link texture. A pink & white pompom helps Spectra cheer for her school.

Venus has very long and lovely pink hair that is streaked with green and shaved on one side. She is wearing a black tee decorated with the Monster High crest and a green vine. The collar is pink and the sleeves and hem are serrated. The front of the shirt has a pocket with a green & pink floral vine print. Her miniskirt is trimmed in pink and has the same print as the shirt pocket. Accessories consist of a black ivy earring, a green ivy earring, and green ivy arm wraps. On her feet are pink peep-toe boots with studded straps and wedge heels decorated with ivy. Venus cheers for her school with a blue skullette-shaped megaphone.

Lagoona’s long hair is blonde with blue streaks and pulled into a ponytail. She is wearing an adorable black dress decorated with pink sharks and shiny pink & blue bubbles. Over the dress is a shiny blue tie-front crop top with pink accents. Around her waist is a pink scale belt with a silver shark buckle and on each wrist is a shimmery pink & blue cuff. Her turquoise wedges have seaweed accents, shark bite heels, and three pink fish scale straps with seashell buckles. Other accessories consist of silver shark earrings, a turquoise seashell necklace, a silver compact, a black & turquoise iCoffin phone, and a silver & pink shark perfume bottle. Her black purse has a turquoise shoulder strap and is decorated with turquoise seaweed. The white & pink mouth-like flap features a black fish. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Lagoona’s diary.

Rochelle is beautiful wearing her one-shoulder party dress that is black decorated with a white filigree print and shiny purple designs. The folded neck has pink ribbon trim and the three irregular ruffles are pink leatherette. Around her neck is a black & white striped scarf and on each arm is a shimmery pink arm warmer with black trim. On her feet are pink peep-toe pumps that feature fleur-de-lis accents and silver fleur-de-lis heels. The pink & black wrought iron styled purse has double handles held by silver fleurs-de-lis. Other accessories consists of a pink fleur-de-lis bracelet, a pink compact, and a pink & black iCoffin phone. Silver fleur-de-lis clips keep her long pink hair with teal streaks out of her face. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Rochelle’s diary.

Spectra is gorgeous with her long purple hair, magenta streaks, and adorable top hat. The small black hat is decorated with a bow that is purple with black chain links. She is wearing a black sleeveless dress covered in a pattern of shiny silver and purple chains. Around her waist is a purple ribbon belt with silver buckle. Over the dress is a sleeveless trench coat that is translucent purple. On her hands are purple keyhole gloves and on her feet are silver pumps that feature purple platforms, multi-chain ankle straps, and chain link heels. Accessories consist of silver chain & padlock earrings, a multi-layered silver chain necklace, a silver compact, and a black & purple iCoffin phone. Her silver purse has a purple stripe on the sides, double ring handles, and is wrapped in silver chains. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, and Spectra’s diary.

Clawdeen looks fabulous with her two tone hair that is brown with a black underlayer. She is a Toys”R”Us exclusive that comes with three different ferocious outfits. She is wearing a green sleeveless tee with black tiger print and gold trim. Over the shirt is a black leatherette vest with a purple collar, purple hem, and gold zipper. Around her waist is a black belt with gold hoops that accentuate her purple capri pants. The pants lead into gold knee-high peep-toe  boots with black heels. The second outfit is a shimmery purple & black bandage dress; the black portions feature a golden leopard print. The dress has black & gold straps and a frilly black & gold hem. Lastly she has a purple long sleeve shirt with an image of a wolf on the front. It has a green & black tiger print collar, cuffs, and hem. Completing the wardrobe are dark blue shorts covered with shiny gold splatter. Clawdeen has two extra pairs of shoes. They are studded black pumps with fang-shaped heels and purple lace-up booties that have white skulls on the sides. Accessories consist of a black armband, green armband, black studded bracelets, gold bangles, green bangles, a gold multi-finger ring, and a purple fingerless glove on her right hand. Two translucent purple hoops are in her right ear and two translucent green hoops are in her left ear. The doll’s green purse resembles a boombox with black speakers and knobs. Clawdeen comes with a brush and a doll stand. The doll may also be referred to as “I Heart Fashion Clawdeen Wolf”. It's no secret that I love all things fashion related, and even though lately I've been designing my own line I still like to go to the maul, especially to check out the shoes. I must confess that shoe design is the weak part of my game. I think it's because they're kind of like ice cream to me. I know the ingredients, I know how it's made, but sometimes I'd rather just enjoy instead of focusing on all the details.  xx Clawdeen

Scarah has plenty of choices when she wants to look specter-ific, This Toys”R”Us exclusive comes with three outfits, three pairs of shoes, and lots of extras. Scarah is wearing a pink shirt with a skullette pattern and a pair of black shorts. Over the outfit is a white leatherette knee-length coat with a green belt. On her feet are white knee-high boots embellished with silver heels and silver zippers up the sides. The next ensemble is a shimmery green dress with a halterneck. The dress is accentuated with a white double chain necklace. Her third outfit features a patchwork top. Part of the top and one sleeve is a black skullette pattern. Another part is white with a pattern of pink, green, and black safety pins. One sleeve, the stripe down the front, and the rest of the top is pink. Covering her legs are black & light green tights with random small skullettes and a torn appearance. Shoes for the outfits include green wedges and silver heels. Accessories consist of white sunglasses, a black molecular necklace, two white square bracelets, two green square bracelets, and a pink bangle. The doll’s green tufted purse has a white up the side with a green skullette and white dots on the handles. Scarah comes with a brush and a doll stand. The doll may also be referred to as “I Heart Fashion Scarah Screams”. Sure, now being a more traditional ghoul my own self I'm not one to be chasing after every fashion will-o-wisp that comes floating over the moor, don't you know. But every once in a green moon I like to carry myself over to the maul and do a bit of looking around. I usually end up though at a fashionably frightening little boutique where the owner can practically read me mind, which is a good thing, since it's terribly hard to ask for help when the store lurk interprets every question as a pronouncement of doom.  xx Scarah

Cleo is lovely with her black bob cut hair and turquoise streaks. She’s wearing a sleeveless turquoise leotard covered with yellow and darker turquoise squiggly lines. Gold ribbons wrap around the top and one forms a single shoulder strap. Complwmenting the leotard are teal knee-length harem pants with the same squiggly line pattern. Accessories consist of dark gray sunglasses, turquoise triangle earrings, purple wing earrings, a purple studded choker,  a black ouroboros bracelet, and a purple cuff. Around her waist is a pyramid studded gold belt with a pointed front piece.  As the name suggests, Cleo has multiple pairs of shoes. The first pair are gold cage sandals with hourglass heels. The next are gold wedges with turquoise bandage wraps. The final pair are black wedge sandals with multiple purple straps.  To carry all her extras, Cleo has a turquoise tote decorated with black stars, yellow diamonds, and yellow bandage wrapped hearts. Also included with the doll is a black brush and doll stand.

Draculaura’s beautiful black has pink streaks and is worn in a side ponytail. Her outfit begins with a yellow spaghetti strap top and a pink damask print pencil skirt with four black buttons at the waist. Over the top is a black, pink, & yellow plaid capelet with white lace trim and a black ribbon fastener. Accessories consist of black sunglasses, yellow skullette earrings with bow cut-outs, pink skullete & crossbones earrings, and a black bracelet. Multiple pairs of shoes are included with the outfit. The first are black wedges with ankle straps and heart cut-outs in the heels. Next up are pink pumps with black platforms and heart shaped heels. The last pair are yellow wedges adorned with pink hearts. For all her accessories, Draculaura has a a pink & black striped tote decorated with fanged hearts and lips. The center of the bag has a black & white bat wing heart inside a white circle with pink polka dot hearts. Also included with the doll is a black brush and doll stand.

Catty looks glamorous wearing her elegant ensemble inspired by her Friday the 13th debut. Her single shoulder dress has a silver bodice held by a black tulle strap. The shimmery bodice is adorned with a black crack pattern and “13” in pink.  The long and shredded double-layered skirt is embellished with silvery white mesh around the waist. The solid pink layer of skirt complements the pink tulle over-layer that is enriched by shiny silver speckles. Accessories for the dress consist of two translucent pink hoop earrings, a translucent pink “13” earring, and an elaborate shiny magenta necklace. On her wrists are three studded magenta bracelets and one silver bracelet. For shoes she wears shiny silver knee-high boots etched with a cracked pattern.  Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, magenta microphone, and Catty’s diary.

Headmistress Bloodgood always looks her best when overseeing the students of Monster High. She keeps her black & purple streaked hair in a bun which allows her to easily remove and reattach her head depending on her mood. Her outfit begins with a white collared shirt, pink tie, shiny black leggings, and black riding boots. Over top is a long purple overcoat held closed by two gold buttons. The coat is embellished with black shoulder bands and pink strips that run from the collar to the sides. White ruffles decorate the collar and the pink cuffs. Nightmare, Bloodgood’s trusty companion, is always nearby. The horse is blue with dark bluish gray hooves and red eyes. His mane and tail are purple streaked with magenta. He wears a purple bridle and removable saddle. Each side of the saddle is decorated by a white skullette with pink bow.

Jane looks magnificent with her black hair, pink highlights, and wild wardrobe. Her hair is pulled into a pony tail with a hair bump and is held by a red hairband adorned with a skullette surrounded by feathers. She is wearing a purple & blue leaf print top with black faux fur shoulders and an asymmetrical hem. Beneath the top is a dress that features a pink bodice with diagonal stripes and a light blue mesh skirt. Under the skirt are black capri leggings with a serrated hem. Completing the outfit are mismatched blue wedges; the right is a gladiator sandal and the left is a winding snake-strap sandal. Jane loves to accessorize. She has a light blue bone with feathers in one ear and a light blue claw in the other. Around her neck is a red three ring choker attached to a statement necklace with claws. On one arm is a dark blue bracelet and the other has a black fishnet sleeve, pink bangle, and light blue bangle. Around her waist is a dark blue belt decorated with three skullettes; the center one is larger with a red bow and hanging feathers.  She carries a dark blue purse and walking stick. The quilted handbag has a red handle, feather, and skullette clasp. Inside the bag are three pieces of paper. The walking stick features blue feathers around a skullette knob with pink bow. The stick is also a working pen. Also included with the doll is a black brush, doll stand, Jane’s diary, and Needles, her pet sloth. Age: 15 or 16  Monster Parents: Doctor Boolittle  Killer Style: I suppose one would call my style jungle chic. I simply adore faux fur, animal prints and feathers. I also have an absolutely smashing walking stick I cannot stand to be without.  Freaky Flaw: Spending my formative fears on a jungle island with only the companionship of animals did little to prepare me for the company of other monsters in large groups. When I find myself in that situation my pulse races, I breathe very fast and I start looking for places to hide.  Pet: Needles is my pet voodoo sloth. I love him dearly but he is always getting stuck so I constantly must make a point of telling him to be scareful.  Favorite Activity: I love a good trek. There's nothing quite as peaceful and invigorating as exploring the wilderness and meeting the creatures that live there.

Abbey is ready to have fun at the festival with her hip sixties style. It begins with her straight white hair, pink and blue streaks, and blunt bangs. Wrapped around head is a black headband scarf decorated with beaded lines. Her groovy getup features a peasant top with a purple & light blue gradient, bell sleeves, and a serrated hem. Completing the outfit is a purple & light blue splattered miniskirt with a frayed hem. Translucent accessories consist of a blue snowflake earring, a purple ice crystal earring, and a blue icicle belt. On her feet are translucent blue knee-high boots made of dripping ice. Purple diamond-studded straps adorn the insteps and ankles. Around Abbey’s neck is a V.I.M. pass that gives her backstage access and pre-concert seating to the Monster High Music Festival.

Clawdeen is ready to boogie in her fabulous purple jumpsuit. The sleeveless suit features black trimmed armholes, a black collar, and a yellow design outlined in orange running down one side. The design is made up of skullettes, dots, diamonds, and crescent moons. The ensemble is completed by a pair of gold knee-high boots decorated with zippers, cut-outs, and black claw heels. Accessories for the outfit begin with four earrings: two gold hoops, a gold oval earring, and a gold hoop with three dangling chains. Two gold and one black bangle are on one wrist and a fingerless black glove is on the opposite hand. Around her waist is a black triple wrapped grommet belt. A V.I.M. badge hangs from a lanyard around her neck which gives Clawdeen backstage access and pre-concert seating to the Monster High Music Festival.

Draculaura Draculaura is pink perfection with her high ponytail and pink highlights. She’s wearing a sleeveless pink leatherette dress embellished with a pink tulle overskirt. Over the dress is a sheer black crop top with long sleeves and a pattern of hearts and heart outlines.  On her feet are pink wedges with bows in the back and heart cut-outs in the heels. Accessories consist of pink dangling bat earrings and a black bat-wing heart belt. Clawd Wolf Clawd is wearing a comfortable outfit that complements his brown & teal streaked mohawk. His tank top is black with teal trim and a pattern of teal outlined crossbones.  Black jean shorts with teal stitching and teal flip-flops complete the ensemble. Accessories consist of yellow shutter glasses, a teal watch, and a gold hoop earring. Draculaura and Clawd each have a V.I.M. badge that gives them backstage access and pre-concert seating to the Monster High Music Festival. Two black doll stands are also included with this Kmart exclusive.

Venus is punk perfection in a concert outfit that accentuates her long pink hair and unique style. She’s wearing a black one-shoulder dress decorated with irregular wedges of pink, purple, and green patterns. The hem is adorned with a black mesh frill. Over the dress is a pink crop top with a jagged hem and a print of light pink skullettes. The outfit is accessorized with a translucent green ivy earring, a translucent green spiked belt, and a pink studded bracelet. Wrapped around her forearms and calves are green ivy wraps. On her feet are black lace-up booties with folded cuffs and ornate pink soles and heels. Around her neck is a V.I.M. pass that gives Venus backstage access and pre-concert seating to the Monster High Music Festival.

Catrine looks purr-fect in her back-to-school outfit that complements her light purple hair with pink and purple streaks. She is wearing a sleeveless dress that features irregular black stripes separated by pink, blue, or shimmery purple.  Around the pink waist and along the hem are black scalloped ruffles detailed with shimmery purple. The dress’s blue ribbon straps are hidden by a black sweater shrug. Accessories consist of a black bracelet, lavender bracelet, a light blue tulle scarf around her neck, and a black bow on her tail. Her pink bag is adorned with black bows, side pockets, and two black handles secured by skullettes. On her feet are lavender peep-toe platform heels made up of a filigree of swirls. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, Catrine’s Scaremester diary, and a lavender coffin-shaped compact. Inside the compact are four ring pastels of different colors: aqua, pink, black, and white.

Clawdeen is ready to go back to school with her fabulous multi-colored hairdo and matching outfit. Her shoulder length brown hair has bright green highlights on one side and purple highlights on the other. Her outfit begins with a sleeveless green leopard print dress embellished with a wide black hem. The hem features a sparkly purple pattern and is trimmed with black tulle. Over the dress is a black leatherette jacket adorned with a gold zipper and a gold stripe down each side. On her feet are black knee-high boots accentuated by purple soles with upward claw-like heels. Accessories begin with a gold studded hoop earring, a black studded hoop earring, a gold zipper earring, a black zipper earring, a gold zipper necklace, two black bangles, and a gold studded bracelet. Around her waist is a gold zipper belt with a pull tab buckle. Clawdeen’s black purse is an oblong hexagon decorated with a zipper pattern and held by two gold pull tab handles. Also included with the doll is a purple iCoffin phone, a black brush, doll stand, and Clawdeen’s Scaremester diary.

Jinafire is stunning with her back-to-school ensemble and ponytail full of green & black hair. She is wearing a halterneck top that features a green and purple flame-like pattern. Wrapping around her neck and waist is a black strip decorated with gold skeletal dragons. Her shiny pants are red and accentuated with a long tapered hem that is a black & gold scale pattern. On her feet are jade pumps with Chinese guardian lions for heels. Accessories consist of red paper lantern earrings, a jade bead bracelet, and a red purse. The paper fan purse is embellished with gold and is held by a black shoulder strap. Also included with the doll is a red binder detailed with a golden dragon; a brush, doll stand, and Jinafire’s Scaremester diary.

Clawdeen is wearing her signature outfit that includes a black & purple jacket, skirt, and boots as well as a tiger-striped peach shirt. Her accessories and extras are a brush, doll stand, diary, and Crescent, her cat. O.F. Clawdeen is a reissue of the doll found in the Basic series with the same outfit and accessories. The primary difference between the two releases is the packaging. The Original Favorites box features a window that wraps around the side.

This resissue of Draculaura is just like the one from the Basic series. She is wearing the same signature pink, black, and white outfit and accessories. She also inlcudes the same extras like Count Fabulous, her pet bat, a pink brush, pink doll stand, and her diary. The main difference between the two releases is the packaging. The Original Favorites box features a window that wraps around the side.

Frankie is wearing a black & purple plaid dress with black & silver accessories. She comes with a brush, doll stand, her diary, and her dog-like pet, Watzit.  O.F. Frankie is a reissue of the doll found in the Basic series that includes the same outfit and accessories. The primary difference between the two releases is the packaging. The Original Favorites box features a window that wraps around the side.

Frankie is electrifying in her Picture Day wardrobe. She is wearing a lovely dress with black & white diagonal stripes and blue lightning bolts. It is embellished with a yellow collar, a yellow lightning bolt on the chest, and a short overskirt with a patter of black, blue & silver diamonds as well as blue bolts. Over the dress is a blue leatherette jacket with black cuffs, a yellow pocket, and a black and a yellow stripe on one sleeve. Her shoes with black heels and images of nuts are opposites; one is white with a blue toe and the other is blue with a white toe. Accessories comprise of a blue bracelet, black bracelet, silver screws for earrings, and a yellow belt with nut-shaped grommets and skullette buckle. Her blue & yellow purse has a black flap and a silver safety pin for a handle. Extras for the doll include a blue binder, black brush, black doll stand, student pictures in the form of stickers, and Frankie’s Fearbook.

Lagoona looks divine in her aquatic-themed attire. Her teal sleeveless dress features a colorful pattern of sea horses and aquatic plants. It is adorned with a shimmery pink seashell halter top and green tulle trim. Under the dress are shimmery pink fishnet capris and on her feet are translucent blue wedges made of bubbles. She accessorizes the outfit with a gold pearl bracelet, a pink bracelet, a gold rope belt, a translucent pink shell earring, and a translucent yellow semi-coiled earring. Her purse is a pink sea anemone with a yellow handle. Extras for the doll consist of a aqua blue binder, black brush, black doll stand, student pictures in the form of stickers, and Lagoona’s Fearbook.

Operetta looks stunning for her Fearbook picture. She is wearing a beautiful red dress spotted with black music notes and accentuated with a mesh polka dot over-layer and purple tulle on the trim. Around her waist is a black corset held with white laces and over the dress is a purple & white school jacket with the Monster High logo. On her feet are black fishnet socks under black & white oxford heels detailed with a vertical red stripe on each side. She accessorizes with a black earring made of dangling records, a red bead bracelet, and a black & red dripping heart-shaped purse. Over one eye is a black heart-shaped mask. There is also a variation where she wears a black spiderweb mask. Extras for the doll consist of a purple binder, black brush, black doll stand, student pictures in the form of stickers, and Operetta’s Fearbook.

Clawdeen is dressed up as the super strong, super fast, and super fashionable Wonder Wolf. Her hair is long and brown with lots of green highlights. She is wearing a shiny purple halterneck top with a green collar and a golden wolf skullette emblazoned on the front. Attached to the top are purple shorts covered with a variety black, white, yellow, and green comic book themed graphics. On her feet are gold knee-high boots decorated with pyramid studs, purple trim, and purple platforms and heels.  The costume is accessorized with two gold studded hoop earrings, two gold starburst earrings, a purple studded headband, a purple studded bracelet, and a purple studded armband. Around her waist is a gold belt that features the phases of the moon. Her golden shield features a purple wolf surrounded by the phases of the moon and a skullette. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and a Wonder Wolf mini comic book.

Frankie is dressed up as Voltageous, the superhero that battles evil with the power of electricity. Her hair is streaked black & white and she wears a shimmery silver dress with a blue Frankie Skullette on the chest. The black sleeves and triangular wrap have blue polka dots and black lightning bolts outlined in yellow.  Complementing the dress is a hard wing-like cape made up of yellow lightning bolts. Her lightning bolt boots are silver, trimmed with light blue, and have Tesla coil heels with spur-like lightning bolts. Accessories for the outfit consist of a light blue lightning bolt headband, light blue starburst earrings, and two silver wrist cuffs. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and a Voltageous mini comic book.

Spectra is dressed up as Polterghoul, the superhero that goes bump in the night. She wears a purple mask of eyeshadow and her hair is long, straight, and purple.  The costume begins with a black sleeveless dress covered with gray polka dots and shiny silver trim. Over the dots are purple starbursts and a silver skull on the chest. The costume’s cape is made up of strings of purple chains that are held by a neck choker and shackles at the wrists. Accessories consist of a purple chain headband, purple starburst earrings, and a silver ball & chain belt. The outfit is completed with silver knee-high boots that are wrapped with purple chains and accentuated by purple chain platforms and heels. Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and a Polterghoul mini comic book.

Toralei is dressed up as Cat Tastrophe, the crafty kitty of chaos. The villainous troublemaker has long orange hair and hides her identity by wearing  a black cat-eye mask with whiskers. Her black & gray spotted jumpsuit is covered with jagged horizontal orange stripes. It has a black collar and a cat-like skullette emblazoned on the chest. The suit is accessorized with black fingerless gloves, a red studded collar, silver studded armband, silver studded mouse bracelet, two black stud earrings, and a black hoop earring. Worn around the waist is a silver pyramid-studded utility belt with dangling orange feathers. The red zippered knee-high boots have black platforms and claw-like heels.  Also included with the doll is a brush, doll stand, and a Cat Tastrophe mini comic book.

Wydowna is going to Comic Con as Webarella, her favorite comic book superheroine. The cosplay costume begins with a shiny silver sleeveless top detailed with a red spiderweb.  Under the top is a red skirt held by a white belt with a skull buckle featuring six red spider eyes. Attached to the belt is Webarella’s silver lasso. On her feet are silver studded knee-high spiderweb boots with red heels. The costume is accessorized with silver spiderweb earrings, a red fingerless glove, and six bracelets, one for each arm. The bracelets consist of two white double hoops, a silver double hoop, a red double hoop, a spiked red band, and a spiked silver band. Wydowna has also brought a change of clothes to the event. She has a white, red & black sleeveless dress with a collage of comic book phrases like “Boom!”, “Pow!”, and “Bamm!”. To complement the dress there is a wide black spiderweb belt, silver pants, and red & black spiderweb heels. This exclusive of the 2013 San Diego Comic-Con also includes a black brush, Wydowna’s diary, a mini Webarella comic, and Shoo, her pet fly.

Catrine is a lovely sight with her inventive and artistic ensemble. She has on a top made up of black, blue, pink, purple, and white uneven horizontal lines. Wrapped around her neck is a pink scarf decorated with a pattern of interconnected black swirls and scrolls. Her circle skirt is two-thirds black with purple, white, and blue spatter; the bottom third uses the same pattern as her top. She wears wrapped purple pumps with flowers and bows on the back, pink platforms, and pink paintbrush heels. She accessorizes with black sunglasses and a pink double belt. The belt has pouches holding paint brushes and supplies. Her black decorative purse features a purple skyline of Scaris, France and a handle made of ornate scrolls. Also included with this Walmart exclusive is a doll stand, artwork, and Catrine’s sketchbook.

This Clawdeen is the Walmart exclusive reissue of the Sweet 1600 doll. She is wearing the same amazing black & purple outfit that features a tuxedo jacket, leopard print pants, and fanged shoes. Many of the accessories from the original are not included, but it does have a new purse. The black purse features purple straps, gold buckles, and gold accents.

This is a Walmart exclusive reissue of the original Sweet 1600 Draculaura doll. She is wearing her stunning black, pink, and white lace birthday dress, pink tiara, and frosting-themed shoes. The shoes are mostly pink and lack the white frosting accents of the original. She is lacking many of the accessories from the original, but does include a new purse. The heart-shaped purse is pink with dark pink bows and a black strap.

This Walmart exclusive is a reissue of the Sweet 1600 Frankie doll. She is wearing the same black & blue plaid party dress and similar stitched shoes. One shoe is black and the other is blue whereas the original shoes were black & blue.  The doll lacks many of the accessories from the original, but does include a different purse. The black hexagon purse features a blue & silver lightning bolt flap and silver strap.

Draculaura is in a crazy candy-themed frightmare. Her pink & black hair has a black licorice bow and features two long ponytails wrapped in black licorice. She is wearing an elaborate sleeveless dress that begins with a black bodice trimmed with pink lace. Below the bodice are black & pink stripes with diagonal black lines inside the pink. Next are wider black & pink stripes that lead into a tiered skirt. The leatherette skirt has two dripping black layers and a dripping pink middle layer. Over the dress is a black mesh cropped jacket decorated with pink trim, a pink bow, and gooey pink leatherette shoulder accents. Candy accessories consist of a pink dangle earring, a black dangle earring, a black licorice belt with a swirl, a black armband, and a winding pink armband. Long dripping striped gloves cover her hands; the right glove is pink and the left is black. On her feet are pink fishnet socks and black ankle-strap wedges with gooey pink cut-out heels. Her black purse is a dripping heart with a fanged face and a pink twisted bow handle. With this Target exclusive is a brush, doll stand, and a Sweet Screams diary that tells the tale. Also included is Count Fabulous, Draculaura’s pet bat who has been transformed into hard candy.

Frankie has been pulled into a candy-themed frightmare and looks super sweet. Her very long white hair is white with black striped bangs and red streaks. Decorating her hair is a black & white swirled candy barrette with red & black hard candy accents. She is wearing an adorable white dress with dripping black diagonal stripes. The sleeveless dress has black straps and a black faux fur hem. Over the dress is a red leatherette jacket with a wide collar, black cuffs, and an irregular dripping hem. Candy accessories consist of dripping black hard candy earrings, a black & red striped tie necklace, a black belt with dripping swirls, a red beaded bracelet, and a winding red bracelet. A red fingerless glove is on her right hand and a black fingerless glove is on the left. On her feet are peep-toe heels with gooey black wedges and dripping red straps that wind up her legs. Her purse is a piece of wrapped red dripping candy that features a face with a zigzag mouth and candy eyes. With this Target exclusive is a brush, doll stand, and a Sweet Screams diary that tells the tale. Also included is Watzit, Frankie’s pet who has been transformed into a candy pet with candy cane legs.

Draculaura is ready for some scary cool fun in the sun. She’s wearing a lovely black & white striped swimsuit embellished with splatter and pink bat outlines. The suit has pink ruffles at the leg holes and a pink ruffled halterneck that flows down to a translucent pink belt with a bow. Her hair is black with pink bangs, pink streaks, and pig tails. She accessorizes with translucent pink sunglasses and translucent pink wedges with ankle straps. Her swimming supplies include a pink bottle of SPF 500 sunscreen and a towel. The towel features irregular black & white stripes and pink outlines of bats and hearts. Draculaura carries everything in a translucent pink cutout bag shaped like a bat.

Frankie has her black & white hair pulled into a ponytail and even added a blue under layer that matches her swimming ensemble. She’s wearing a one-piece swimsuit that features a yellow & black hex nut print. The suit is accentuated by a lightning bolt halter strap that is translucent blue, extra long, and hangs down the front. Translucent accessorizes include yellow lightning bolt sunglasses, a four-bangle blue bracelet on each wrist, and stitched yellow shoes. Frankie’s bag is made up of translucent yellow hex nuts. Her towel matches her swimsuit but also has a pattern blue lightning bolts.

Holt may have flaming hair but he isn’t afraid to spend some time in the water. He’s wearing a red sleeveless shirt emblazoned with flames and a black & white checkered skullette on the front. His swim shorts are gray with black flame outlines and feature a translucent orange & yellow flame protruding from each leg. Holt’s translucent orange accessories consist of flaming sunglasses, sandals with flame-like straps, and a single-strap turntable backpack. His black beach towel is decorated with a pattern of orange & yellow flames.

Lagoona is adorable with her teal highlighted blond hair and tentacle themed ensemble. She is wearing a one piece swimsuit that features a filigree print made up of light blue & pink tentacles. The suit is trimmed with pink plastic and the single shoulder strap is embellished by light blue ruffles with pink polka dots. She accessorizes with translucent teal tentacle sunglasses and a translucent pink tentacle headband. On her feet are translucent pink wedge sandals and she carries a translucent teal seashell bag. Lagoona’s white beach towel is decorated with a pattern of intertwined light blue tentacles.

Rochelle’s one-piece swimsuit accentuates her pink hair and teal highlights. The pink striped suit features a sweetheart neckline, black halter strap, and a strip of decorative scrolls down the front. Around the waist is a double layer of teal ruffles. Translucent teal accessories consist of sunglasses, a bracelet, and heels adorned with swirls, spirals, and fleurs-de-lis on the ankle straps. Her bag features cut-outs and swirls that create a wrought iron fence appearance. Rochelle’s pink towel is decorated with a pattern of wrought iron swirls.

Venus is wearing a wild one-piece swimsuit that features black, white, pink, yellow, and green vertical zigzags. The suit’s neckline is a translucent green collar decorated by a white zigzag outlined in black. Her long straight hair is green & pink and kept in a ponytail with a hair bump on top. Translucent green accessories consist of triangular sunglasses, ivy arm wraps, and ivy leg wraps. On her feet are translucent pink wedges etched with zigzags. Venus’s towel features black, white, pink, green, and green teeth-like zigzags. She carries the towel in a translucent pink bag decorated with pointy teeth and ivy handles.

Nefera has long and beautiful teal hair with black & white streaks and gold tinsel highlights. Her lipstick is red and her eyeshadow is light teal and gold with black swirl accents. She is wearing a form-fitting dress that is a shimmery black & blue with a pattern of twisting teal snake-like lines. The dress has an asymmetrical hem and two black straps with one strap forming a long decorative strip down the front. Over the dress is a metallic gold chest piece with snake accents and a large city skyline epaulet. Accessories begin with an ornate black headband made of snakes and crystals. Her matching gold earrings are dangling snakes with crystals. She wears elbow length fingerless teal gloves and translucent teal wedges. The wedges have crystal shard platforms and snake straps that wind up her legs. Nefera comes with a brush, doll stand, and a piece of the comet. The piece is translucent purple crystals shaped like a pyramid. As the Night of the Comet approaches, Nefera scares-up a terror-ible scheme and uses its powers to entomb Catty's voice forever!!  Nefera de Nile doll  Daughter of the Mummy  The monsters take a MUSICAL bite out of the city. When Cleo is invited to attend a fancy gala celebrating the return of a magical comet, she brings her beast friends along! But it's not all fun and frightseeing when Nefera uses the comet's powers in a die-abolical plot against Catty! Can the monsters and their new city ghoulfriends unwrap the mystery of the comet in time to help her?

Abbey’s lovely white hair is in a ponytail with a pink & blue streak. She is wearing a form-fitting black dress decorated with a print of white sparkly stars and black snowflakes inside dripping diagonal pink lines. The short sleeves are black mesh and the hem is light blue. Translucent accessories consist of a purple ice crystal belt and a dripping blue ice bangle. On her feet are translucent purple boots with jagged wedge heels and ice crystal cuffs. She comes with a black mug overflowing with a frosty pink beverage.

Frankie’s straight white hair has blunt bangs and streaks of black. She is wearing a patchwork top with a half black and half blue collar. Parts of the top are blue with black hex nuts and diagonal white stitches. Other parts are black with white hex nuts and diagonal blue stitches. Her black trimmed skirt features lightning bolt stripes of black, white, yellow, and blue. Accessories consist of a yellow stitched bracelet and a blue bangle. On her feet are strappy platform heels with one pump black and the other white. Her hot beverage is in a blue to-go cup with a white lid and white sleeve with handle.

Robecca’s long hair is black & blue. She is wearing a sleeveless dress that features a black & yellow striped top with copper gears in the yellow and frilled white armholes. The skirt is blue with designs made up of decorative pink, black, and blue cogs and gears. Copper accessories consist of a red gem pendant and a wrist cuff. Both pieces are made up of cogs, gears, wires, and other mechanical parts. On her feet are cream peep-toe pumps with black platforms and heels and decorated with rows of studs. Her light blue mason jar mug features a skullette on the side.

Toralei’s red & orange hair has an asymmetrical cut, an under layer of black, and striped bangs. She is wearing a wild pink & black zebra print tank top and a red & black houndstooth miniskirt. Accessories consist of a red belt with two rows of pyramid studs and a pink studded bracelet. On her feet are platform pumps decorated with straps, pyramid studs, and claw-like heels. Her pink beverage is inside of a silver cauldron with a handle.

Twyla’s hair is a lovely bluish purple with big streaks of light teal. She is wearing a purple romper with a pattern of light blue spiderwebs and black spiders. A black bow is tied around the collar and under it is a square of light blue tulle. Accessories consist of a light blue beaded bracelet, a purple bracelet, and a black belt with a light blue buckle. On her feet are light blue Mary Janes trimmed with rows of studs and wedge heels. Her blue spiderweb mug has three ghostly marshmallows floating in hot cocoa.

Venus’s curls are blended pink & green with one side shaved short and colored pink. She is wearing a form-fitting sleeveless pink dress decorated with a print of black thorny vines, light pink ivy, and light green leaves. Over the dress is a sleeveless black top with four large cutouts in the front. Accessories consist of green vines wrapped around each of her forearms and calves. On her feet are pink pumps with ivy laces, ivy wrapped heels, and platforms with mouth-like teeth. Her translucent green mug with a gray lid is filled with a green seedling.

Cleo’s long black hair is highlighted with streaks of turquoise and purple. She is wearing a form-fitting black dress decorated with triangles made up of blue, pink, purple, and gold bandage wrappings. The sleeveless dress has a simple blue strap and a black strap adorned with turquoise tulle. She accessorizes with a purple scarab choker pendant, a turquoise triangle bangle, and a turquoise belt with rows of gem-like studs. On her feet are gold strappy wedge sandals with gem-like studs. Cleo comes with a golden coffin-shaped tray with a turquoise goblet and blue bowl. Inside the bowl is bunch of delicious pink grapes.

Draculaura’s dark hair has pink streaks and a ponytail on each side of her head. She is wearing a black sleeveless top trimmed in yellow and decorated with a pattern of light and dark pink bats. Her pink skirt has a yellow hem and a pattern of white fanged lips. Accessories consist of a yellow winged heart necklace and attached ascot, two yellow double bangles, and a pink dripping bracelet. On her feet are pink peep-toe pumps with winged hearts, and heels dripping into hearts. Draculaura comes with a pink coffin-shaped tray, a bat-winged grilled cheese, and a goblet. The goblet has a pink spiderweb cup and a clear stem.

Howleen’s bright pink hair has light blue streaks and is worn in a high ponytail. She is wearing a purple shirt with short black sleeves, yellow trim, and a pattern of black claw marks and yellow paw prints. Her black skirt has blue trim and features a pattern of crossbones that transition from purple to blue. She accessorizes with a spiked pink wrist cuff. On her feet are pink high tops with blue laces and etchings of skullettes, hearts, flowers, and paw prints. Howleen comes with a blue coffin-shaped tray, a yellow milk carton, and a winged haunt dog.

This is the third release of Cleo in the series. She is very similar to the previous dolls, but lacks many of the extras. Cleo still has her green & yellow dress, copper tights, and shiny green heels. Her accessories include a bronze armband and a bronze scarab necklace. She is packaged in a small window box which includes her party photos.

This reissue of Frankie features the same fabulous outfit as the original. She is wearing a pink jacket over a black & white zigzag dress. Her tights are pink fishnets and one shoe is black with a gray sole and the other is gray with a black sole. Cleo’s accessories include blue lightning bolt earrings, a black & white pearl bracelet, and a black necklace with silver pendant. Many of the extras from the original are not included with this release. She is packaged in a small window box which includes her party photos.

This Lagoona reissue features the same dazzling outfit and fin-like hairdo as the original. She has a darling blue sleeveless dress with pink frills at the top and a flowing pink hem. Around her waist is a sand colored lace wrap and her shoes are a translucent blue and pink. Lagoona’s accessories include a gold seaweed arm wrap, pearl earrings, and a pearl necklace. Many of the extras from the original are not included with this release. She is packaged in a small window box which does include her party photos.

Clawdeen has wavy brown hair with an amazing streak of purple. She is wearing a form-fitting sleeveless black dress that is decorated with a print of orange, green, and purple fossils. A green saw tooth strap runs diagonally from the hem and over one shoulder. She accessorizes with a golden arm cuff made from a spinal column and ribs. On her feet are purple lace-up booties with toothy soles and spinal columns for heels. Included with the doll is a white dinosaur skull and a green folder with “Monster High” on the side. She does not have a stand or brush. Field trips are a clawsome opportunity to learn something new through interactive exhibits, guided tours and historical artifacts. They're also a creepy cool way to get a perspective on the past, present or future, and did we also mention it gets you out of class for the day?  Clawdeen thinks the Haunted History Museum is a scream.

Gigi has lovely pink hair with a streak of orange that has been tied into a ponytail. She is wearing a a short purple & magenta sleeveless dress decorated with images Scorpio and other constellations. Around the waist of her dress is an asymmetrical piece of blue tulle.  She accessorizes with a gold necklace that has intertwined beaded strands, star accents, and a scorpion pendant. On her feet are golden pumps with telescope heels, intertwined ankle straps, and scorpion adornments. Included with the doll is a gold telescope and a purple lunch bag with the Monster High crest. She does not have a stand or brush. Field trips are a clawsome opportunity to learn something new through interactive exhibits, guided tours and historical artifacts. They're also a creepy cool way to get a perspective on the past, present or future, and did we also mention it gets you out of class for the day?  Gigi totes has the stars in her eyes at the planetscarium!

Toralei’s bob cut hair is dark orange with a teal streak accentuated with black stripes. She is wearing a a form-fitting sleeveless red dress decorated with a print of black fish skeletons and teal claw marks. On her feet are translucent teal peep-toe shoes with skeletal cutouts, fish accents, and large teeth-filled mouths for heels. Included with the doll is a white anglerfish skeleton on a purple base and a translucent teal shark head water bottle. She does not have a stand or brush. Field trips are a clawsome opportunity to learn something new through interactive exhibits, guided tours and historical artifacts. They're also a creepy cool way to get a perspective on the past, present or future, and did we also mention it gets you out of class for the day?  Toralei thinks the ascarium is purrfect fun even if they don't give samples.

This playset features Frankie and the Recharge Chamber where she can recoup her energy. Frankie lacks the typical white in her hair and instead has straight blue hair with yellow and black highlights. The stitches on her body are also different; they are blue instead of silver. She is wearing a short sleeveless black dress decorated with blue and yellow streaks of lightning. She accessorizes with blue lightning bolt earrings and yellow pumps with lightning bolt cutouts and heels. Around her waist is a silver belt with a double row of holed hex nuts and a dangling chain. Pink, blue, or purple skullette lightning charms can be added to the belt. The Recharge Chamber is a blue coffin-shaped chamber resting on a black circular pedestal. The inside is tufted gray with lightning bolt accents. It has neck and leg clips to hold Frankie in place. The clear doors of the chamber are etched with lightning bolts and sparks. The doors are framed in pink and topped with a heart. Beneath the doors is gray with a black skullette button outlined in pink. The top of the chamber has twisting translucent magenta tubing and the back is etched with a stitched skullette surrounded by lightning. On either side and supporting the chamber are yellow lightning rods topped with skullettes. When Frankie is inside the chamber and the skullette button on the front is pressed, her hair stands up on end. The chamber requires 3 AA batteries to light up and create hair-raising static electricity. A brush is also included with the playset.

Frankie has very long white hair with streaks of black. Her inspiration is Clawdeen Wolf and she creates the look with a wolf ears headband, removable white fangs, and an ferocious outfit. She is wearing a piecework jumpsuit with one arm, one leg, and half the top all black. The rest of the jumpsuit is yellow with a pattern of yellow & blue crossbones outlined in black. Accessories consist of a studded blue bracelet and a shiny silver belt decorated with bolts. On her feet are shiny silver knee-high boots embellished with hex nut grommet straps and yellow platforms with a lightning bolt reverse heel. Included with Frankie is a yellow brush and doll stand.

Ghoulia has lovely light blue hair with darker streaks. It is long and straight and styled with bangs and two ponytails. Her inspiration is Draculaura and she begins the vampire motif with a cute blue dress that features a pattern of red brains with black bat wings. The puffy black sleeves have red trim by the neckline and a red ribbon bow is tied around the waist. The wrapped skirt has a ruffled hem and a black underskirt. Accessories consist of a black headband with bat wings, black cat-eye glasses, removable white fangs, and a red bloody heart bangle. On her feet are  blue wedges with red skullette accents and straps that wind up her calves and end in bows. Her parasol has a blue canopy and skull tip, a black shaft, and a black bat handle. Included with Ghoulia is a yellow brush and doll stand.

Operetta has beautiful red hair that is long and straight with a wide black streak down the middle. Her inspiration is Frankie Stein which creates an electrifying rockabilly ensemble.  She is wearing a sleeveless plaid dress created from crisscrossed lines of music. One half of the dress is pink with black music and the other half is black with pink music. Running down the front is a shiny white strip with buttons and decorating the hem is black tulle. Under the dress are legging with one black leg and one pink leg. Accessories consist of a silver headband with riveted lightning bolts, a black face mask adorned with stitches, a silver choker with neck bolts, and a red hex nut bangle. Around her waist is a red & black polka dot belt with a hanging necktie. On her feet are red double strap pumps with black tips and bolt accents. Her quilted pink purse has studded handles and features a silver skullette inside a silver circle.  Included with Operetta is a yellow brush and doll stand.

Scarah has light green skin and bob cut black hair with a streak of orange that features black stripes. Inspired by Toralei Stripe, she has created a wild werecat wardrobe. She is wearing a white leatherette vest decorated with a shiny silver stripe. One half of the collar is embellished with an orange & gray checkered pattern outlined in black. Her black pants have a print of interconnected skullette safety pins plus orange & gray checkered patches. Accessories consists of a black headband with light green & orange cat ears and an orange studded bracelet. Around her waist is an orange belt with three rows of pyramid studs. Attached to the back of the belt is a removable light green tail. On her feet are white peep-toe wedges adorned with rows of studs and orange straps. Her black studded purse features three orange straps with buckles that create a cat face. Included with Scarah is a yellow brush and doll stand.

Clawdeen’s brown hair has purple highlights and is worn in a ponytail. She is showing her support of Frankie by wearing a black tank top featuring a green image of Frankie with “Save Frankie” in yellow rectangles. Her purple capri pants have a pattern of green and black hex nuts. Accessories consist of yellow bolt earrings, dangling black & yellow stitch earrings, a yellow lightning bolt headband, a black arm warmer, a purple stitched bracelet, and a gold multi-bangle bracelet. On her feet are gold booties with fur cuffs and purple claw cutouts for heels. She carries a purple “Save Frankie” sign with an image of Frankie and a lightning bolt handle. Included with Clawdeen is a yellow brush, doll stand, and a wearable purple bracelet decorated with stitches, “Monster High” and a skullette.

Draculaura’s hair is black with pink highlights and is worn in a high ponytail with a yellow bow. She is wearing a black shirt that sports a pink image of Frankie with “Save Frankie” in white rectangles. The collar and short sleeves are trimmed with pink frilled lace.
