Clawdeen has lovely curly brown locks and is wearing a classic outfit. She is 17 inches tall and just as gorgeous as her normal sized counterpart. Her outfit begins with a pink & black tiger striped halter top worn under a black jacket. The jacket has a fur collar, gold zipper trim, and purple hem. Complementing the top is a short shimmery purple skirt with a black tulle hem. She accessorizes with four gold hoop earrings, a gold necklace with purple pendant, and a black collar with translucent amber studs. Around her waist is a black belt with gold studs and on her feet are black knee-high boots. The boots are peep-toed with wedge heels and are decorated with purple straps. Included with Clawdeen is a black doll stand. Killer Style: I'm a fierce fashionista with a confident no-nonsense attitude. I'm also gorgeous, intimidating, and absolutely loyal to my friends.  Freaky Flaw: My hair is worthy of a shampoo commercial, and that's just what grows on my legs. Plucking and shaving is definitely a full time job, but that's a small price to pay for being scarily fabulous.  Pet: Crescent, a scary cute little kitten as fuzzy as I am.  Favorite Activity: Shopping and designing fashions. One day I hope to create and be in charge of my very own fashion empire.

Draculaura is a beautiful 17 inch tall ghoul with straight black hair. Her hair is styled with pink highlights, blunt bangs, and two long ponytails.  She is wearing a pink vest top decorated with two silver buttons and a white lace jabot. The black mesh sleeves are accented with white mesh cuffs. Her short white skirt has pink stitching and under the skirt are black mesh tights. Accessories for the outfit consist of white safety pink earrings and a silver & pink gem necklace. On her feet are pink knee high boots adorned with black straps, black laces, and black heart accents. Included with Draculaura is a black doll stand. Killer Style: I love to splash my black outfits with some cherry pink, and I even carry a frilly umbrella so I can take an occasional walk in the sun.  Freaky Flaw: Since I can't see my reflection in a mirror, I have to leave the house not knowing if my clothes are just right. Of course, after 1,600 years of practice I've gotten pretty good at it.  Pet: Count Fabulous is my BFF (Bat Friend Forever). He's a very proud and proper bat, but I just can't help dressing him in the cutest little outfits.  Favorite Activity: I love smiling, laughing, and encouraging my friends.

Elissabat has straight black hair with purple highlights and blunt bangs. This 17 inch Elissabat is just as stunning as her shorter Hauntlywood version and is wearing the same outfit. Her ensemble begins with a corseted dress that features a purple top and a purple-laced black bodice. The skirt has frilly layers of black mesh that are topped with a purple peplum. Over the dress is a cropped top with a black & purple print and sleeves that end in flared purple mesh cuffs. Accessories consist of a translucent purple bracelet and two pairs of purple tear drop earrings; one pair short and the other pair long. On her feet are black knee high boots with rows of ruffled bands and wedge heels. Included with Elissabat is a black doll stand. Killer Style: I am fangsolutely in love with lace, ruffles, silk, and satin... as long as it's frilly and it's black or deep purple.  Freaky Flaw: I have terrible stage fright so I must be completely prepared before I ever stand in front of an audience. I've been told I'm a natural on stage and in front of a camera, but that's only because I spend hours making sure I have my lines down. It's the only way I can do what I do.  Pet: I played the part of a dragon whisperer in a film once. It was a great role but I've never translated that into a real unlife pet.  Favorite Activity: Acting! It might seem strange that I like acting if I have stage fright, but I love inhabiting the characters I play.

Frankie is fabulous as a 17 inch tall ghoul. She has straight black & white streaked hair and is wearing her classic plaid outfit. Her dress is black & blue plaid with white, red, and gray lines. The collar and shoulders are white with black stitch accents. The dress features and a black & white polka dot tie adorned with a silver skullette clip. The short sleeves and trim of the skirt are made of black mesh. Accessories consist of silver dangle earrings with blue skullette charms, a silver & blue striped bangle, and a black belt. The belt is decorated with a double row of silver studs, hanging chains, and a silver lightning bolt buckle. On her feet are black & white striped pumps. Included with Frankie is a black doll stand. Killer Style: My friends say I have the perfect figure for fashion. I'm not really sure what that means yet, but they've taken me shopping for some scary cute clothes that are absolutely to die for.  Freaky Flaw: Sometimes my stitches come loose at the worst possible moments. Yes, it's still happening.  Pet: Wazit - I'm not sure all of the things he's made from, but his pet license is 10 pages long.  Favorite Activity: Anything that I get to do with my friends.

But that's only the beginning of their aquatic adventures! Now, the ghouls find themselves with fintastic fishy forms, and Lagoona must face her childhood bully... and her worst fear! Will they continue to make waves, or reveal their true bravery and make their way back to stand on dry ground?

Lagoona’s hair is yellow blonde with streaks of pink and blue and is pulled into an off-center ponytail. She has pale blue skin and webbed fingers. Protruding from her back are translucent blue cutout fins with a wing-like appearance. From the waist down she has the body of a sailfish that is dark blue and scaled. Decorating her hips and upper fish body are yellow squiggly lines and a pink crescent with a serrated design. Her tail fins are translucent blue with small cutouts and swirled tips. She is wearing a high neck crop top top that is a deep blue with a pattern of interconnected squiggly pink starfish. Translucent pink accessories include a beaded bracelet, a wavy clam shell belt, and an elaborate statement necklace. The necklace has a flower pendant and multiple strands of beads that wrap around her torso. Lagoona’s wing-like fins are glow-in-the-dark and she is able to stand on her tail fins. She does not come with a brush or doll stand. The ghouls are swimming in troubled waters after a whirlpool pulls them from Monster High all the way to Lagoona's home in the Great Scarrier Reef. But that's only the beginning of their aquatic adventures! Now, the ghouls find themselves with fintastic fishy forms, and Lagoona must face her childhood bully... and her worst fear! Will they continue to make waves, or reveal their true bravery and make their way back to stand on dry ground?

Toralei has amazing orange hair with black stripes that is pulled into a tight ponytail which allows her ears to poke through. She has light orange skin with a darker patch on her face.  Her fingers are webbed and fanning out from her back are narrow wing-like orange fins with black outlined white stripes. From the waist down she has a lion fish body that is orange with black and white tiger stripes. Her billowy translucent tail fins are half orange and half black. She is wearing a sleeveless black top that features pink and green splatter with spiny tentacles. Complementing the top is a translucent green tentacle necklace. Toralei’s wing-like fins are glow-in-the-dark and she is able to stand on her tail fins. She does not come with a brush or doll stand. The ghouls are swimming in troubled waters after a whirlpool pulls them from Monster High all the way to Lagoona's home in the Great Scarrier Reef. But that's only the beginning of their aquatic adventures! Now, the ghouls find themselves with fintastic fishy forms, and Lagoona must face her childhood bully... and her worst fear! Will they continue to make waves, or reveal their true bravery and make their way back to stand on dry ground?

Rochelle’s wavy hair is soft pink with light blue streaks. Her speckled skin and wings have a glowy translucent appearance and a light blue mask is painted on her face. She is wearing an off-the-shoulder dress with a black ruffled collar connected to a stitched neckline. Covering most of the wrought iron patterned dress is a teal tulle layer with a pink hem. Accessories consist of fleur-de-lys chain earrings, a translucent blue bracelet with an hourglass charm, and a pink chain belt with hanging chains and fleur-de-lys accents. On her feet are translucent blue pumps with lavender fleur-de-lys chain heels. Included with Rochelle is her diary, a translucent blue brush and doll stand. The chain link stand gives her the appearance of floating. There also is a full size blue chain bracelet with a boogie sand hourglass charm. Age: 415  Killer Style: Being from Scaris, I love to mix the rot iron and stained glass together. It gives my look a certain timeless quality, does it not?  Freaky Flaw: I am very protective of my friends and sometimes I get in the way when they do not have a need for my protection. I also have the... how do you say... "chip on the shoulder."

Iris has long straight hair that has shades of green and brown. It is pulled into a ponytail in the back and has a pink streaked braid that wraps around her head. She is wearing a colorful 3/4 sleeve top that features an image of an eye with a rainbow iris. Her white pants are decorated with a pattern of eyeballs that have blue, green, yellow, and pink irises. Worn around her waist is a green rope belt and on her feet are turquoise booties with eye accents. The second outfit has a sleeveless pink top with a one-eyed Skullette outline. The black skirt is decorated with a white cracked print embellished with pink-bowed Skullettes. Complementing the outfit is a big-buckled turquoise belt and black ankle-strap pumps. The final outfit begins with a form-fitting strapless black dress with a print of colorful batwing eyeball outlines and a sparkly peplum. Over the dress is a magenta jacked with a black fractured print. Completing the ensemble are knee-high magenta boots with black wedges, bow straps, and stud accents. Additional accessories consist of eyeball earrings, a white chain necklace with a batwng eyeball, and multiple bracelets. There is an orange bracelet, a studded magenta bracelet, and four bangles that are green, yellow, pink, and blue. Her purse is black, double-handled, and made up of black eyeballs.  Iris comes with a brush and a doll stand. The doll may also be referred to as “I Heart Fashion Iris Clops”. The maul is okay for other ghouls, but when Iris has her eye on expanding her wardrobe, she heads to the planetscarium gift shop where the fashions are surprisingly stellar! Whenever she gazes upon an out-of-this-world outfit, she grips it fright so even her clumsy hands won't drop... oops!

Amanita is a sight to behold with her stunning features and amazing ensemble. Her curly hair is dark purple with hints of blue and her skin is a wonderful luminous green. She is wearing a semi-sheer lavender dress with frilly sleeves, black shoulder guards, a frilly black lace neckline, and two black bands around the waist. The skirt transitions from lavender to a green and black floral print with a jagged hem. The print features leaves with prickly ivy and is accentuated by strips of purple lace ruffles. Under the dress is a tube top and miniskirt. The top is green with a leafy black ivy print and the skirt is black leatherette. Black accessories consist of a Corpse Flower hair clip, dangle earrings, a vine necklace, and a spiked bangle. On her feet are black peep-toe pumps with leaf straps and flower bulb heels. Complementing the shoes are green vine anklets with purple flower accents. Her black purse features a floral design and a vine shoulder strap. Included with Amanita is a brush, doll stand, iCoffin phone, a purple modeling portfolio with her headshot, and her diary. Killer Style: Amanita Nightshade's carefully cultivated look makes every other flower in the garden of style look like a weed by comparison. It isn't as if they are lacking in color, but their arrangement appears merely budding when planted next to Amanita's full bloom of fashion.  Favorite Activity: Amanita loves being adored and celebrated for her inherent beauty - both inside and out.  Freaky Flaw: Amanita believes there's nothing so wonderful as the sound of her own melodic voice, but there are many who feel that perhaps their voices are equally important. Amanita spent many years pondering this and yet still sees little merit in the argument.  Pet: Amanita has an adoring maggot that is die-ring as both pet and accessory.

Design amazing outfits for Frankie with dresses, stencils, stickers, and markers. Frankie has straight black & white streaked hair that is pulled back on top. Makeup features purple eyeshadow and pink lipstick. She has stitches on one cheek, grayish-white skin, raised stitches on her arms, legs and neck, silver neck bolts, and lacks articulation at the elbow and wrist. She is wearing a cute dress with a blue sleeveless top and an asymmetrical skirt. A black & white houndstooth print with skullette accents decorate the skirt. Around her waist is a silver double belt adorned with rivets and a lightning bolt buckle. On her feet are black Mary Jane platform pumps with double straps. Frankie comes with four additional dresses. The first two are simple sleeveless dresses. One is light blue with a yellow neckline and a shredded hem. The other is yellow with a light blue neckline and a v-hem. The third is a pink one-shoulder dress with an asymmetrical hem. Completing the collection is a one-shoulder dress with pink trim and a black & white print filled with cogs, gears, and skullettes. Included with the doll is a brush, 4 cardboard hangar forms, 2 stencils, 1 sticker sheet, and 3 fabric markers; the markers are pink, blue, and black. Use stencils or draw freehand to create dress patterns!  Apply stickers for a clawesome finishing touch!  Frankie looks Voltageous in dresses you designed!

Love in Scaris features Garrott and Rochelle rekindling their romance in the City of Frights. Garrott du Roque Garrott has blue hair, mottled gray skin, teal around his eyes, bluish lips, and a gold earring in his left ear. Protruding from his back are small gargoyle wings. He is wearing a black leatherette jacket with an upright collar and a mint green shirt poking out the bottom. Around his neck is a dark red scarf decorated with a black rose and spiderweb print.  His pants are dark blue and his brown boots have black laces and skull accents. He holds a black rose as a gift for Rochelle. Rochelle Goyle Rochelle has light green and pink streaked hair pulled into a side ponytail. In her hair is a turquoise dripping headband with a large black skull-centered rose. Complementing her speckled skin is light turquoise eyeshadow and light pink lipstick. Gargoyle wings protrude from her back. She is wearing an off-the-shoulder dress that has a pink & black striped bodice with a ruffled turquoise tulle neckline. The skirt has black stripes with a scroll print and white stripes with a turquoise and pink swirl print.  On her feet are turquoise peep-toe pumps with ankle straps and spiral designs. Her pink bag has swirls and cutouts creating a wrought iron design. Included in this Toys”R”Us exclusive are two doll stands and Garrott’s diary. Rochelle is going back to Scaris, relax it's just for a visit, where she'll get to hang out with her true love Garrott du Roque. Although long distance relationships can even the most rock solid romance, there appear to be no cracks in the foundation of their affection for each other. For even a monster with a heart of stone cannot help but be in love while strolling through the City of Frights. C'est tellement romantique!

Clawd has soft and velvety brown hair that is shaved short. Covering his hair is a turquoise cap with holes where his ears poke out. He is wearing a sleeveless yellow top with faded black lines and dashed white lines. His plaid shorts are teal with bright green lines, black claw marks, and black suspenders. On his feet are brown slip-on loafers. His carnival fundraiser is the strongman game. The mini high striker is red with a winged bell at the top and the lever is struck with a star etched turquoise mallet. The prize for ringing the bell is a pink flower with a translucent yellow stem. Clawd does not come with a brush or doll stand. Step fright up, Boos and Ghouls!  The school dance has been cancelled, so the student body is putting on a spooktacular fair to raise money. The costumes will be clawesome, the games freaky-fun, and the prizes to die for - but the beast prize will be saving the dance.

Draculaura has lovely straight black hair blended with lots of pink highlights. She is wearing a sleeveless dress that features a top with black, white, and light blue irregular stripes. The pink skirt is decorated with an intricate black print of filigree hearts and bats. She accessorizes with a big bow around her neck that matches the print of her skirt. On her feet are pink pumps with light blue platforms and cutout hearts for heels. Her carnival fundraiser is a balloon pop game. It has a black dart board and four balloons; two pink, one magenta, and one light blue. To pop the balloons she has a pink heart-adorned dart. For a prize there is a fuzzy pink stuffed-bat with black wings, a black face, and pink button eyes. Draculaura does not come with a brush or doll stand. Step fright up, Boos and Ghouls!  The school dance has been cancelled, so the student body is putting on a spooktacular fair to raise money. The costumes will be clawesome, the games freaky-fun, and the prizes to die for - but the beast prize will be saving the dance.

Skelita has wavy black hair with a streak of turquoise. She is wearing a sleeveless dress that complements her skeletal figure. The bodice is orange with a white rose print and a ruffled striped layer that is turquoise, orange, red, black, and white.  The skirt is striped like the ruffles, but also has an orange & white floral print as well as a intermittent flowers and turquoise skullettes. On her feet are red sandal wedges with woven straps. Her carnival fundraiser is a down-a-clown game with three colorful targets; one orange, one red, and one blue. The targets are knocked over with a masked red ball and the prize is a fuzzy turquoise pinata. Skelita does not come with a brush or doll stand. Step fright up, Boos and Ghouls!  The school dance has been cancelled, so the student body is putting on a spooktacular fair to raise money. The costumes will be clawesome, the games freaky-fun, and the prizes to die for - but the beast prize will be saving the dance.

Draculaura has long straight hair that is dark pink with black highlights. Her makeup features light pink eyeshadow and dark red lipstick. A dark red heart decorates her left cheek. Draculaura is a budget doll and lacks articulation in her elbows, wrists, and knees. She is wearing a pink molded tank top with spiderweb details. A white strip with black hearts runs down the front. Over the tank she wears a short white & black polka dot cape with a pink bow, pink hearts, and a serrated hem. Her pencil skirt is black with shimmery vertical stripes. On top of the skirt is a shorter overskirt that is sheer pink with a spiderweb print. Accessories begin with pink sunglasses, a black bat wing & spiderweb headband, and a black bat wing & spiderweb statement necklace. On her feet are pink shoes with black wedges and straps that weave up her legs. Her second pair of shoes are pink wedges with ankle strap bows and cutout hearts in the heels. Her light blue handbag is coffin-shaped with heart accents. Completing the ensemble is a parasol with a silver shaft, batty handle, skullette cap, and a pink canopy held shut by a heart-buckle strap.

Frankie has long and straight hair that is streaked black & white. Her makeup features soft pink eyeshadow and pink lipstick. On her right cheek are gray stitches. Frankie is a budget doll and lacks articulation in her elbows, wrists, and knees. She is wearing a molded black tank top decorated with a silver lightning bolt and a string of light blue hex nuts. Over the top is a cropped silver vest. Her blue skirt has a zigzag print and over it is an asymmetrical skirt. The overskirt is sheer blue with a pattern of yellow lightning stripes. Accessories consist of blue sunglasses, a blue hex nut headband, and a yellow hex nut pendant. On her feet are yellow wedges with stitched together cutouts. Her second pair of shoes are blue high tops with studded silver toe boxes and bolted silver heels. She has a yellow stitched skullette binder and a silver six-sided purse adorned with screws, electrical outlets, and a lightning handle.

Ari has long straight purple hair with pink highlights. She has pale translucent skin, pink eyeshadow, and violet lips. Her off-the-shoulder dress is purple with a pink trimmed neckline and a ruffled hem with black trim. The printed front is decorated with gray chains, magenta cakes, and swirled lollipops.  She accessorizes with a pink chain headband adorned with a layered cake topped with lavender frosting. On her feet are pink waffle pumps with ankle strap bows, heart accents, and gooey heels. Ari is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows, wrists, and knees.

Catrine has long lavender hair with blue highlights and streaks of magenta. She has a pale complexion, pink eyeshadow, blue eyeliner, lavender lips and a lavender nose. A black birthmark decorates her left cheek. Her outfit is a blue sleeveless dress with red trim, red straps, and a blue ruffled hem. The front of the dress is gray and features a print of donuts, cartons of milk, paint palettes, brushes, and colorful splatter. She accessorizes with an orange headband with two red-frosted donuts with sprinkles. On her feet are adorable blue booties with cat-faced toe boxes and yarn soles. Catrine is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows, wrists, and knees.

Cleo has long straight black hair with a streak of dark turquoise. She has a tan complexion, blue eyes with silver shadow, pink lips, and a light blue gem on her right cheek. Her halterneck dress has a reddish-pink strap, neckline, and ruffled hem. The front of the dress is light turquoise with a print of creepy cupcakes, candy corn, and other treats. She accessorizes with a golden headband topped with a blue frosted cupcake that has a gold crown. Cleo is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows, wrists, and knees.

Ari has long crimped hair that is purple with streaks of bright blue. She has a translucent complexion with pink eyeshadow, pink and blue eyeliner, and deep pink lips. Her off-the-shoulder dress is black with a blue trimmed neckline and a colorful print. The print features sheet music, music notes, and chains. Completing the dress is a shiny blue hem. She accessorizes with a pink chain headband adorned with a treble clef and a pink keyboard belt with dangling chains. On her feet are translucent magenta pumps that have chains, lots of straps, sheet music accents, and music note cutouts in the heels. When Clawdeen dreams of opening a salon for monsters AND normies, Frankie gets a charge out of fixing up the old power station. But then Moanica plots to ruin their plans, so Twyla lends a shadowy hand to stop her. Now the ghouls have to save the normie town and open their salon... all while getting a voltageously ELECTRIFIED makeover!

Draculaura has long crimped hair with pink streaks and blunt bangs. It is pulled into a high ponytail with the help of a pink winged-heart bow. She has turquoise eyeshadow, yellow and turquoise eyeliner, dark pink lipstick, and a dark pink heart outlined in turquoise. Her black dress has a sweetheart neckline, clear blue shoulders, a pink tulle hem, and a colorful print. The print features pink, blue, and yellow outlines of bats and hearts. She accessorizes with a translucent yellow belt with a bat wing bow and spiderweb etchings. On her feet are translucent pink wedges with studded straps, drippy accents, and bat cutouts in the heels. When Clawdeen dreams of opening a salon for monsters AND normies, Frankie gets a charge out of fixing up the old power station. Now the ghouls have to save the normie town and open their salon... all while getting a voltageously ELECTRIFIED makeover!

Silva has crimped light blue hair with a streak of yellow in the front and a streak of pink with yellow on the side. Most of her hair is pulled into a high ponytail with a spiked black band. Her gray skin tone is complemented by blue eyes with purple accents, blue eyeshadow, pink lips with fangs, and a little black nose. She is wearing a unique dress with a shiny light blue bodice that has a shredded trim. The rest of the dress is black decorated with neon colored wolves. Finally, there is a ruffled yellow hem on the asymmetrical skirt. Accessorizes consist of bright pink earrings and a translucent pink fur-like shawl. On her feet are translucent yellow pumps embellished with cutouts, studs, and wild clawed heels. When Clawdeen dreams of opening a salon for monsters AND normies, Frankie gets a charge out of fixing up the old power station. Now the ghouls have to save the normie town and open their salon... all while getting a voltageously ELECTRIFIED makeover!

Frankie has long crimped hair that is white with streaks of black, yellow, and blue. It is held in a high ponytail with a lightning encrusted band that is translucent pink. She has yellow eyeshadow, pink eyeliner, and hot pink lips. Her sleeveless dress has a black bodice with multicolored lightning stripes. The skirt is black with colorful crisscrossed lines embellished with lightning bolts. At the waist is a translucent pink peplum and the hem is trimmed with a neon yellow tulle. She accessorizes with one yellow and one neon pink lightning bolt earring. Around her neck is a translucent yellow lightning scarf. Wrapped around her left forearm is a blue lightning wrap amd on her feet are translucent yellow wedges. The shoes have hex nut accents and lightning straps that wind up her legs. Sitting in her right hand is a translucent yellow Znap figure. When Frankie’s right arm is raised she emits one of four types of lights and sounds. When Clawdeen dreams of opening a salon for monsters AND normies, Frankie gets a charge out of fixing up the old power station. Now the ghouls have to save the normie town and open their salon... all while getting a voltageously ELECTRIFIED makeover!

Clawdeen has crimped voluminous hair that is purple with streaks of black. She has pink eyeshadow, green eyeliner, and deep pink lips. Her one-shoulder dress is black and features multicolored irregular stripes. It has a clear yellow ruffle along the neckline and long pink tulle decorates the asymmetrical hem. She accessorizes with yellow spiked crescent moon cutout earrings and a translucent orange belt with studded strands and spikes. On her feet are translucent purple peep-toe pumps with studs, wide ankle straps, and jagged edges. Additional items include a translucent purple beastie friend and six hair accessories. Clawdeen can wear a translucent pink crescent moon hair comb, a green crescent moon cutout headband, a green fanged-lip hair clip, or a translucent green spiral clip with a wolf accent. There are two hair extensions: one is green with a Skullette clip and the other is orange with a black bow-paw clip. When Clawdeen dreams of opening a salon for monsters AND normies, Frankie gets a charge out of fixing up the old power station. But then Moanica plots to ruin their plans, so Twyla lends a shadowy hand to stop her. Now the ghouls have to save the normie town and open their salon... all while getting a voltageously ELECTRIFIED makeover!

Twyla has full and crimped aquamarine hair with purple streaks and highlights. She has a ghostly lavender complexion with purple eyeshadow, yellow eyeliner, and deep pink lips. Her right hand are forearm are gray with wispy tendrils rising up her arm. She is wearing a black dress that features a geometric spiral print accentuated by pink and green bugs. The dress has green straps and a shiny pink peplum with a tulle trim. Accessories consist of translucent pink bug earrings and a pink spiderweb-bow statement necklace. On her feet are translucent turquoise wedges with lots of studded straps and cutout heels. Additional items include a translucent pink beastie friend and six hair accessories. Twyla can wear a translucent purple bow-ear headband, a translucent yellow bug comb, a translucent blue dust ball & bow clip, or a black spiral clip with a Skullette key accent. There are two hair extensions: one is teal with a pink skull clip and the other is salmon pink with a dust bunny clip. When Clawdeen dreams of opening a salon for monsters AND normies, Frankie gets a charge out of fixing up the old power station. Now the ghouls have to save the normie town and open their salon... all while getting a voltageously ELECTRIFIED makeover!

Clawdeen has wavy brown hair with streaks of pink. Her brown complexion is complemented by fanged deep pink lips. She is wearing a purple sleeveless dress that has a green choker and a purple mesh neckline and waist. The front has a lavender animal print decorated with crescent moons, zippers, paw prints, and green emojis. She accessorizes with a pink baseball hat adorned with crossbones and emoji emblems. On her feet are purple booties with furry cuffs and emoji accents. Clawdeen is a budget doll and lacks articulation at her wrists, elbows, and knees.

Draculaura has long straight black hair with streaks of pink. She has pale pink skin, pink eyeshadow, fanged red lips, and a red heart on her cheek. Her blue strapless dress has pink bow straps and a black tulle hem. The front of the dress features a print with little black hearts, safety pins, bats, pink bows, and dark pink emojis. She accessorizes with a big red headband bow decorated with bats, hearts, and emoji bats. On her feet are translucent pink strappy pumps with cutout heels adorned with hearts. Frankie has long straight hair that is streaked black and white. She has pale bluish skin, pink eyeshadow, red lips, and a gray scar on her cheek. She accessorizes with gray sunglasses that have an emoji accent. On her feet are blue boots with studs, straps on her calves, emoji emblems, and screw heels. Frankie is a budget doll and lacks articulation at her wrists, elbows, and knees.

Lagoona has long wavy yellow hair with streaks of turquoise. She has pale turquoise skin, pink eyeshadow, and deep pink lips. Her pink sleeveless dress has a turquoise ribbon waist and an aqua blue hem. The front of the dress has a print with bubbles, sunglasses, seashells,  blue seahorses and fishy emojis. She accessorizes with coral pink emoji dangle earrings. On her feet are translucent turquoise wedge sandals. Lagoona is a budget doll and lacks articulation at her wrists, elbows, and knees.

Cleo has long black hair with gold highlights and blunt bangs. Her makeup features light blue eyeshadow and plum lipstick. She is wearing a sleeveless dress that is turquoise blue with a gold cross strap, gold trim, and decorative gold strips. It features a lavender print with lines and zigzags accentuated by black dots and Egyptian cats. She accessorizes with a wide gold bracelet and gold platform pumps with Anubis heels. Cleo’s pet is an adorable kitten with black stripes, big blue eyes, and cute little fangs. The kitten wears an elaborate gold collar and comes with a golden milk dish.

Draculaura has long black hair with pink highlights. Her makeup includes pink eyeshadow, reddish pink lipstick, light pink blush, and a light blue heart on her left cheek. She is wearing a sleeveless dress that has a pink top adorned with magenta hearts. Separating the top from the ruffled skirt is a pink strip with a bow. The wine colored skirt is decorated with a pink heart and spiderweb print. Light blue accessories consist of a beaded bracelet and drippy wedges with wavy edges and straps. Draculaura’s pet is a sweet pink poodle with blue eyes, a purple face, and purple wings. She has a light blue collar and two purple winged heart barrettes. To carry the fluffy pooch there is a quilted pink carrier with winged heart accents.

Frankie has long swept back hair that is streaked black and white. Her makeup features light blue eyeshadow and red lipstick. She is wearing a sleeveless blue plaid dress. It has black straps, red lines, yellow lightning bolts, and white button designs. On her feet are red pumps with stacked heels and button accents. Frankie’s pet is a patchwork teddy bear that is stitched together with different shades of blue. He has a red nose & tongue, silver head bolts, a stitched lightning bolt on his chest, and stuffing leaking out. Frankie carries a light blue spool-shaped bag with a silver medical symbol in case her bear needs emergency repairs.

Lagoona has long wavy yellow hair with a streak of turquoise. Her makeup features pink eyeshadow, coral pink lipstick, and soft pink blush. She is wearing a lovely sleeveless dress with a coral pink hem and trim. It has a wavy turquoise print with pink flowers, spiral seashells, and sea turtle shadows that are pink or blue. Coral pink accessories include a seashell bracelet and strappy fish scale wedges. Lagoona’s pet is a remarkably cute sea turtle. She is pink with a turquoise shell and has a coral pink bow on her head. For a toy, the turtle has a small turquoise ball.

Clawdeen has wavy brown hair with streaks of purple. Her light brown complexion is complemented by lavender eyeshadow and purple lipstick. She is wearing a cute sleeveless dress with a dark purple back, a section of black bodice, and a patchwork zipper print. The print has purple and lavender patches decorated with skullettes, crossbones, paw prints, and crescent moons. Lime green accessories consist of a double buckle wrist cuff and a double buckle belt with two rows of pyramid studs. On her feet are tall strappy purple wedges with seven buckled straps. Cleo has straight black hair with blunt bangs and a blue under layer. Draculaura has long straight black hair with blunt bangs and pink streaks. Her skin is pale pink with soft pink eyeshadow, pink lipstick, and a pink heart on her left cheek. Frankie has black & white streaked hair with a stripe of blue that is pulled into a high ponytail. She accessorizes with one blue and one yellow hex nut lightning bolt earring, a yellow bracelet, and yellow booties with lightning bolt heels. Frankie does not include a doll stand or brush and lacks articulation at the elbow and wrist.

Ari can’t wait for her first day of school. She has long pink, purple, and lavender hair that is held back with braids. Complementing her translucent skin is pink eyeshadow, blue eyeliner, and purple lipstick. She is wearing a beautiful dress with a black & blue piano key ruffle around the neck. The body is lavender with a print of silver chains and magenta diamonds surrounded by lined sheet music. The hem is purple with a black tulle ruffle. Accessories consist of a translucent pink bracelet and a silver belt with music notes and hanging chains. On her feet are translucent pink boots with chains on the toes and tassels on the sides. Her translucent pink bag has a chain handle, chain accents, and a long fringe. Ari does not come with a brush or doll stand. How do I boo? I rock! I use music to inspire monsters to be themselves! And if it makes them want to dance too, even better!  Personal Style: Boohemian Rocker. When I'm belting out pop ballads under hot stage frights, I like to wear cool, gauzy fabrics that float around me, while still looking shriek and modern.  Monster Quirk: I can turn solid, but not for long. When I try to blend in with normies, there's always a ghost of a chance that I'll spook out and be discovered.  There was a time when monsters unlived in hiding because they feared being "different." But then the ghouls met, and they understood that it's clawesome to be different! So they created a school where all monsters are welcome, all uniqueness is celebrated... and where everyone can boo!

For her first day of school, Draculaura has straight black hair with pink streaks. It is pulled back into pigtails and has blunt bangs. She has subtle pink eyeshadow, red lipstick, and a red heart on her left cheek. Her adorable dress features a pink & black polka dot bodice with batty accents and short white sleeves. Around the waist is a black peplum with a reverse scalloped hem. The pink skirt has a black net print decorated with a pattern of blue hearts and black bows. Her first accessory is a pair of blue heart earrings; each with a single wing. Around her neck is a blue and black molded cravat and on her feet are hot pink booties with blue laces and bat wing heels. Her pink knobby handbag is shaped like a bat wing bow. Draculaura does not come with a brush or doll stand. How do I boo? I soar! I can fly, so I have a bat's eye view of everything. I think that's why I always see the good in the world.  Personal Style: I love to contrast edgy black with cheerful pink. My taste in fashion is sweet... with just a little bite.  Monster Quirk: I can't seem my reflection in a mirror, so I always risk looking a little batty. But thanks to centuries of practice, I'm scary-good at applying lip gloss.  There was a time when monsters unlived in hiding because they feared being "different." But then the ghouls met, and they understood that it's clawesome to be different! So they created a school where all monsters are welcome, all uniqueness is celebrated... and where everyone can boo!

Frankie looks fantastic for her first day of school. She has black and white streaked hair with bangs that are pulled back. Her makeup includes pink eyeshadow, light pink blush, and red lipstick. She is wearing a white collared shirt with pinstripe stitches under a blue vest with a yellow “F”. Her black & blue argyle skirt has white stitched lines and yellow lightning bolt accents. She accessorizes with yellow nut & bolt earrings and a black lightning bolt necktie. Around her waist is a silver triple-wrap belt with a hanging chain and screw head buckle. On her feet are stitched black shoes with yellow laces and nut & bolt heels. Her stitched yellow purse is decorated with lightning, hex nuts, and Skullettes. Frankie  does not come with a brush or doll stand. How do I Boo? I try! I mean I try everything! I like to explore and experience and live everything the world has to offer.  Personal Style: Now that I have a school where I belong, I love my outfits to be a little preppy... and a lot stylish. I think electric blue plaids are especially voltageous!  Monster Quirk: Sometimes my stitches come loose and it's like my limbs have a brain of their own. When I offer you a hand, don't be shocked if I mean it literally.  There was a time when monsters unlived in hiding because they feared being "different." But then the ghouls met, and they understood that it's clawesome to be different! So they created a school where all monsters are welcome, all uniqueness is celebrated... and where everyone can boo!

Draculaura has long black hair with pink highlights and pale pink skin. Her makeup features pink eyeshadow, red fanged lips, and a red heart on her left cheek. She is wearing a molded black tank top sporting a pink skullette. Her pink skirt has a light blue stitched waist and a serrated hem. On her feet are pink high tops with bat wing accents. Draculaura does not include a doll stand or brush. She is a budget doll and therefor has less articulation. How do I boo? I soar! I can fly, so I have a bat's eye view of everything. I think that's why I always see the good in the world.  Personal Style: I love to contrast edgy black with cheerful pink. My taste in fashion is sweet... with just a little bite.  Monster Quirk: I can't seem my reflection in a mirror, so I always risk looking a little batty. But thanks to centuries of practice, I'm scary-good at applying lip gloss.

Draculaura’s hair is long and black with pink highlights. She has pale pink skin, pink eyeshadow, red lips, fangs, and a red heart on her left cheek. Her cheerleading outfit has a molded black tank top decorated with a pink skullette. The pink skirt has a light blue stitched waist and a serrated hem. Her molded high tops are pink with bat wing accents. Draculaura comes with a black & pink pennant with the Monster High crest and a black & white cheer hand. The hand features pink fingernails, the Monster High logo on the palm, and “#1” on the pointing index finger. A doll stand or brush is not included. She is a budget doll and therefor has less articulation.

Frankie has long black & white streaked hair and pale green skin. Her makeup consists of pink eyeshadow, light pink blush, and dark pink lipstick. On her right cheek is a stitched scar. She is wearing a molded cerise tank top with a blue outline of the Monster High crest. Her black skirt has a blue stitched waist and a serrated hem. On her feet are molded blue high tops with jagged heels and embossed lightning bolts. Frankie does not include a doll stand or brush. She is a budget doll and therefor has less articulation. How do I Boo? I try! I mean I try everything! I like to explore and experience and live everything the world has to offer.  Personal Style: Now that I have a school where I belong, I love my outfits to be a little preppy... and a lot stylish. I think electric blue plaids are especially voltageous!  Monster Quirk: Sometimes my stitches come loose and it's like my limbs have a brain of their own. When I offer you a hand, don't be shocked if I mean it literally.

Frankie’s straight hair is streaked black and white. She has pale green skin, pink eyeshadow, pink blush, and dark pink lipstick. Her cheerleading outfit features a molded cerise tank top with a blue outline of the Monster High crest. The black skirt has a blue stitched waist and a serrated hem. Her molded blue high tops have jagged heels and embossed lightning bolts. Frankie comes with a blue skullette-shaped megaphone and a black & pink pennant with the Monster High crest. A doll stand or brush is not included. She is a budget doll and therefor has less articulation.

Djinni has purple and teal streaked long and wavy hair. She is wearing a glitter gold eyeshadow, pink lipstick, and has sun & moon marking on one side of her face. Her skin is lavender with magenta tattoos on her neck and arms and smoky designs on her legs. Her first outfit, which she is wearings, is a black with gold sparkle dress. The tulle shoulder ruffles extend to the waist; one is lavender and the  other is magenta.  She accessorizes with jagged lavender earrings, a gold statement necklace, a gold spiked belt, and two magenta bracelets. Her lavender purse features a scorpion emblem and on her feet are pink gravity shoes with pointy toes. The second outfit features a light blue tank top with a wide gold flap collar. Complementing the futuristic top are glittery yellow leggings. The next item is a high-necked dress with a purple and gold scorpion print bodice. The bodice has open sides with a v-hem that attaches to a pink skirt. The final outfit has a sleeveless top that is shimmery black on top and purple on the bottom. The black skirt is adorned with a jagged purple tear print with yellow outlines. Completing the wardrobe are two black bracelets and strappy knee high sandals with scorpion tail accents down the backs.

Frankie has black & white streaked hair that is pulled into a high ponytail. She is wearing khaki coveralls with orange lightning bolt stripes and a name tag with “Stein” on the chest. On the right shoulder is a Ghostbusters logo patch. The legs have real cargo pockets and a sheer yellow cloth is tied around her left leg. She accessorizes with yellow lightning glasses, blue lightning hoop earrings, and a silver dog tag. Around her waist are two belts. The first is silver with a lightning bolt buckle and the second one is a blue utility belt with a Skullette carabiner. She wears black wrist cuffs and black molded fingerless gloves. On her feet are high black boots with orange lightning down the fronts, zippers on the sides, and jagged lightning platforms. Ghostbusting accessories feature an iconic black proton pack with a translucent yellow cable that connects to the gun. The proton pack opens and can store the translucent green slimer figure. Frankie’s last item is a black clip-on walkie-talkie. Who Ya Gonna Call? Frankie Stein!  It's not every day that there are ghosts at Monster High! Oh, wait, yes it is. But, paranormally, there aren't trespassing ghosts who zip around the howlways and classrooms leaving a trail of... ewww... slime!  Clawdeen found the little green slimer in her locker next to her ruined shoes. Then Ghoulia spied him wreaking havoc on the computer lab. Drac tried to catch him, but have you ever tried to fly when you've got slime on your wings? And Cleo - let's just say she took one look at the mess and felt royally ill.  So supernaturally, they called Frankie! She's a ghoul who doesn't mind lending a hand - sometimes literally - and a little ectoplasm dripping off her stitches isn't going to spoil her school spirit.  Frankie got to work! She strapped on a proton pack and fired neutralizing particles like a pro... until it was hard to tell who caused more mayhem - Frankie or Slimer.  Frankie chased down the howl, past the clawditorium and into the creepateria...  Every monster who had lunch that period was treated to a spooktacular show! Slimer bounced from tray to tray, gobbling down tater tots, chomping pizza slices, tossing Shriek salads, and wow, can he guzzle milk! All the while, Frankie was hot on his oozy tail, doing flips, somersaults, even the occasional pirouette!  But then Frankie had a voltageous idea! "Hey Slimer," she called out to the happily munching ghost, "why don't you join us? Grab a bite and fang out!" Slimer stopped. No one had ever asked him to eat with them before! So Slimer joined the ghouls and had a grave time! And he ate every last bite... off everyone else's trays. But the ghouls didn't mind - he's really kind of cute once you get to know him... after he stops sliming you.

Draculaura has extra long straight black hair with thin streaks of pink. She has a pale pink complexion, dark eyeshadow, dark red lips, and a dark red heart on her cheek. Her sleeveless dress has pink and light blue stripes embellished with a black bat print. The skirt has a black waist and two tiers trimmed with a black tulle hem. On her feet are light bluee knee-high socks and black booties. The booties have pink laces and drippy wedge heels. Thirty hair accessories accompany Draculaura. There are clips, combs and hair ties that are black, blue, or pink. She also has three hair extensions; one pink, one light pink, and one light blue.  There are hair pieces with flowers, bats, hearts, webs, and wings. They can be combined with other hair accessories to create elaborate hairdos. Draculaura lacks articulation in her elbows and wrists.

Skelita has long black and teal hair that is pulled into pigtails. On the top of her head is a pink, yellow, and green headdress made up of skulls and flowers. Holding her pigtails are hair clips that match the headdress. Her skeletal features are accentuated by light blue eyeshadow, pink lipstick with stitch accents, and flowery sugar skull makeup. She is wearing an amazing dress that has a sleeveless black bodice decorated with colorful flower outlines, a pink neckline, and a blue crochet ruffle trim. The shiny black skirt features a dense pattern of pink, purple, and blue flowers with green leafy accents. Under the skirt is a sheer white petticoat with an embroidered lace hem made up of sugar skulls and heart designs.  On her feet are decorative pink wedges. They are covered with woven straps and have yellow emblems with “MH” and festive skulls. Skelita comes with her diary and an ornate black stand adorned with Skullettes, flowers, and a sugar skull on the base. I scream to dance among the humans...  Every autumn, when there is a bite in the air, the undead are invited by their living familia to cross over to the human world for a monstrous reunion. This spooktacular celebration is Dia de los Muertos - the Day of the Dead - and it is my favorite howliday - filled with bootiful costumes, to-die-for feasts, and, of course, dancing!  Ever since I was a bebé, I have attended the reunion with Abuelita - my grandmother - but this year she is unable to make the journey. I am un poco worried that without her, I will not receive my own welcome. But being a hopeful monster, I will dress up, put marigolds in my hair, and wait for my candlelit invitation to appear and guide me to the human world...

Lagoona has lovely blonde hair with turquoise highlights. It is long and wavy and pulled into a side ponytail. Her makeup features pink eyeshadow and pink lipstick. She is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows and wrists. Her outfit is a sleeveless black romper with a turquoise scale print on the front. Around her waist is a pink twisted rope with a seahorse accent. On her feet are coral pink wedges with double straps, seashells on the fronts, and spiral seashells etched on the heels. Safety equipment includes turquoise seashell elbow and knee pads and a pink helmet. The helmet is decorated with a Skullette on the front, wave designs, and a dorsal fin. Scooter/Surf Board The surf board is pink with a Skullette emblem, bubbles, and a turquoise outline. At the back is a turquoise fin and a cutout bite mark.  To convert the board into a scooter there are three turquoise tentacle wheels with silver Skullette brackets that clip to the bottom. The handlebars are pink tentacles with a white starfish attached to a silver retractable stem that clips to the top of the board. Lastly, Lagoona has a pink coral backback. It is oversized and designed to store all the pieces of the scooter when it is used as a surf board. How Do I Boo? I float! I'm very chill in and out of the water. I try not to sweat things, but when I do I just swim it off.  Personal Style: I keep it casual, from sporty cute to surfer chic, so I'm always up for whatever's going on that sounds fun.  Monster Quirk: When I'm out of water too long, I develop frightfully dry skin. I slather on so much skin cream, sometimes I'm as slippery as an eel-monster.  Lagoona is always a ghoul on the go... whether shes hanging 10 on her trusty surfboard, or zipping around on her speedy scooter. So leave it to Lagoona to sport a 2-in-1 combo: Her surfboard transforms into a scooter, and the extra parts are stored in her shell-shaped backpack.

Frankie has long thick hair that is mostly black with a section of white on the right and a yellow streak in the front. Two yellow plugs attach to her hair and connect to her hair extensions. One extension is pink and the other is blue. Her makeup includes pink eyeshadow and pink lipstick. She is wearing a cute sleeveless dress that features a tartan pattern. The blue, turquoise, and white pattern features black hex nuts interconnected with blue stitched lines. On her feet are blue lace-up booties with striped platforms, stitch accents, and a row of hex nuts up each heel. Accessories consist of a silver brush, a silver electronic hair tool, and 6 light-activated stencils: 3 blue and 3 yellow. The hair tool has a UV light that activates when the tool is closed. The stencils slide into the hair tool which can be used to create designs in Frankie’s hair and extensions. Frankie lacks articulation at her elbows and wrists. A doll stand is not included.

Zomby Gaga has long wavy hair that is pink with soft purple highlights and tied into a high ponytail. Her undead complexion is complemented by sparkly purple and silver eyeshadow. Veiny lines extend down from her hairline, her nose is colored black, and her pink lips are striped and extended with stitches. A bony tattoo decorates her neck and on her hands are bones, spiderwebs, and “Lady Gaga” spelled out on her fingers. She is wearing a black tuxedo with a white collared shirt and black bow tie. The jacket has flared sleeves and the pants have bell bottoms. On her feet are black lace-up booties with high platforms and stiletto heels. She accessorizes with black sunglasses and a bubblegum bubble. Zomby Gaga’s second outfit is much more casual. The sleeveless flannel shirt dress is red and black plaid embellished with “Born This Way” and irregular double white lines. Underneath the dress are black fishnet tights. The doll is inspired by Zombie Boy (Rick Genest) and the ensemble worn by Lady Gaga in the Born This Way music video. Lady Gaga is Zomby Gaga!  Age: Like my love, my age is infinite.  Killer Style: I believe in staying true to myself! What I wear is an expression of my thoughts, loves, hopes and dreams. My fashion changes from day to day, just like my mood and tastes!  Monster Quirk: Even when I feel sad and alone I can't hide who I truly am and I wouldn't have it any other way, because - like the real you - the real me is brave, strong, and BORN THIS WAY.  Favorite Activity: I want to inspire every monster to join me in a worldwide kindness movement! Let's all spread love, bravery and acceptance.  Inspired by the artistry of Zombie Boy!

Cleo has straight black hair with a turquoise under layer and gold streaks in her bangs. Her tan complexion is complemented by gold and turquoise eyeshadow, dark turquoise lips, and a gem on her cheek. She is wearing a sleeveless blue dress with a coral pink choker and a colorful print. The print features snake swirls and gold treble clef lines. The long sheer overskirt is gold with turquoise music notes and a serrated hem. Golden accessories consist of a crowned cobra headband, snake earrings, and an elaborate chest piece. A coral pink snake wraps around her wrist and on her feet are golden platform pumps with striations and snake straps. Her musical instrument is a bronze harp decorated with snakes, sarcophagi, and gems. A turquoise snake wraps around the pillar and the top of the harp is a removable comb. Cleo lacks articulation at her elbows and wrists.

This 2-pack features Amanita and Nefera hanging out at the Scream & Sugar cafe. Amanita Nightshade Amanita has long bluish purple hair that is magenta streaked and pulled to the back. Her light green skin is complemented by swirled magenta eyeshadow, green eyeliner, green lipstick, and leafy vine accents around her eyes. She is wearing a wonderful satin dress with blue and magenta diagonal stripes decorated with a black leaf print. The neckline is black lace and hanging below the wide scalloped hem is a black lace underskirt. Accessories consist of a light purple corpse flower headband, black spoon and fork earrings, a light green bracelet, and molded black elbow-length gloves. On her feet are black cupcake-like pumps with vine accents. Nefera de Nile Nefera has long straight teal hair with blunt bangs and streaks of purple. She wears teal eyeshadow, purple lipstick, and a diamond on her left cheek. Her outfit begins with a glittery gold sheer tunic with black trim and a black belt with a scarab buckle. Under the tunic is a tube top that matches her high-waist leggings. The top and leggings have brown, turquoise, and purple wavy lines covered with a hieroglyphic print. She accessorizes with a large gold Egyptian choker and a gold wrist cuff. On her feet are golden pumps with brick etchings and fan designs. Food related extras include two goblets and two desserts. The gold goblets have two-headed monsters writhing out of the tops; one is light purple and the other is light green. The first dessert is a toothy black cake with eyes sitting upon a gold plate. The last item is a blue pie in a purple tentacle pan with gold tentacles rising out of the top.  The 2-pack does not come with doll stands or brushes.

Gooliope has voluminous blue hair with streaks of yellow and purple. She has blue eyes with curly lashes, blue and yellow eyeshadow, and red lipstick. Her dress has a white bodice with pink coral lines, wavy blue & yellow lines, and a ruffled black tulle collar. Separating the bodice from the skirt is a shimmery gold ribbon belt. The black skirt features a colorful print with sailor Skullettes, “blob” banners, bubbles, and other designs. The longer under layer has the same pattern as the bodice as well as a ruffled black tulle hem with gold glitter. Golden accessories consist of a tugboat headband and hoop earrings. The earrings are large dripping life preservers held by Skullettes. On her feet are gold booties with dripping cuffs, red rope laces, rope details, jeweled platforms, and skull heels. Her gold anchor purse has a chain handle, a pirate Skullette, and seaweed accents. Gooliope stands 17 inches tall and comes with an oversized black doll stand.

Dayna has long wavy blonde hair with gold tinsel highlights. Her golden skin is enhanced with light blue eyeshadow, shimmery eyeliner, and red lipstick. She is wearing a strapless dress with a molded black bodice that features a sweetheart neckline and a gem encrusted front. Around her waist is a shiny gold belt with a Skullette buckle. The long black skirt is decorated with a metallic gold print of Skullettes, hearts, and gems. Beneath the skirt is a sheer black under layer. The dress can be rotated and transformed into a new look. The alternate version has a shimmery gold neckline with black tulle trim, a shimmery gold waist, and a bodice with light blue and white diagonal stripes. The blue skirt has a treasure map print with octopuses, sailing ships, red “X” marks, dashed lines, and Skullette & crossbones shaped islands. Accessories begin with a treasure chest headband. It is topped with a blue feather and opens to reveal gold coins. She also has blue swing earrings with green parrots. Painted black gloves cover her hands and on her feet are blue platform booties. The booties have wide cuffs, compass accents, and map etchings with a red “X”. The platform heels can be removed to expose stacks of gold coins. Dayna does not include a brush or doll stand. I've lived me whole life on the sea. It's me home and, truth be telled, it's me mate. The waves talk to me, and the stars in the sky be me guide. It's a life of adventure and there's treasure to be found! But today I spied treasure that isn't gold - a ship awash with friendly monsters!

Draculaura has black hair with pink streaks that is curled and pulled to the back. She has shimmery eyeshadow, pink lips, and her signature heart under her left eye. Her nautical themed dress has a white top with short sleeves double striped with pink. The wide sailor collar is black and trimmed with pink. Decorating the pink and white striped skirt are stars, broken hearts, anchors, bats, and rope hearts. The skirt is trimmed with two ruffled tulle hems; one blue and one black. Accessories start with a white headband sailor cap decorated with a pink heart & anchor emblem. The yellow earrings are rope hearts with bats and the matching necklace is a rope bow tie outline. Molded pink elbow length gloves with blue dots cover her hands. On her feet are sheer pink knee high socks with heart-shaped polka dots. Her golden rope shoes have high platforms and bat accents. The pink cutout tote bag has gold rope straps with heart-shaped handles. Count Fabulous, her pet bat is included. He has a pink bow on his head and is wearing a white shirt with pink hearts, a pink scalloped collar, and a pink hem. Shiver me tombers! The ghouls set sail after Draculaura finds a map featuring a big treasure-y X! But when the seas get choppy, it doesn't take long to discover that none of these wannabe-pirates have sea legs - not even Lagoona! And Rochelle is more anchor than sailor! It's only a matter of time before their adventurous vacation is all washed up!

Lagoona has long blonde hair with pink streaks that is pulled into pigtails. Her makeup consists of light purple eyeshadow and a light pink lipstick. She is wearing a white & coral pink striped top with 3/4 sleeves and turquoise trim. Her white skilts have double leg stripes and a black, yellow, and turquoise print that features stars, ship wheels, and “Monster High” banners. Accessories begin with a large pink coral headband embellished with a black ship’s wheel. She wears gold earrings made up of dangling stars, a black tulle scarf, and molded black gloves. Striped socks match her top and her turquoise shoes are boat-like with swirly wave heels and gold star accents. Her white beach tote has pink lines and turquoise wave designs. Lagoona comes with her pet piranha. Neptuna is pink and fuchsia with large turquoise eyes. Shiver me tombers! The ghouls set sail after Draculaura finds a map featuring a big treasure-y X! But when the seas get choppy, it doesn't take long to discover that none of these wannabe-pirates have sea legs - not even Lagoona! And Rochelle is more anchor than sailor! It's only a matter of time before their adventurous vacation is all washed up!

Rochelle has pink hair with teal streaks and blunt bangs. It is pulled into a high ponytail that is held to the side with a bow-shaped tentacle. She has blue eyeshadow and pink lips. Her adorable dress has a boat neck top that is blue with gold trim and a wide ruffled collar with blue & white stripes. Complementing the top is a  black skirt covered with “Monster High” banners and octopuses surrounded by pink or blue. Under the skirt is a shiny blue layer with a sucker print and a sparkly black tulle hem. Accessories begin with a gold tentacle hoop earring and a translucent blue heart-shaped eye patch covered with suckers. A black & blue polka dot scarf is tied around her neck and on top of her head is a large headpiece with a sailing ship surrounded by squirming tentacles. She has light brown molded gloves with sucker accents and around her waist are wrapped gold ropes with a large anchor. On her feet are elaborate knee high boots with a light brown wood texture. They are wrapped in rope, encrusted with stars, decorated with anchors, and have pirate heels. The last item is a gold treasure chest purse with a beaded handle and an octopus emblem. Rochelle comes with her pet gargoyle gryphon, Roux. He is a light speckled gray and has lavender eyes. Shiver me tombers! The ghouls set sail after Draculaura finds a map featuring a big treasure-y X! But when the seas get choppy, it doesn't take long to discover that none of these wannabe-pirates have sea legs - not even Lagoona! And Rochelle is more anchor than sailor! It's only a matter of time before their adventurous vacation is all washed up!

Catrine has wavy lavender hair with streaks of pink and purple. She has big blue eyes, light pink eyeshadow, and a dark pink lipstick. Her blue dress has an adorable print that features blue anchors with ropes, birds, pink flowers, pink mice holding “Catrine” banners, and colorful stars. A black bow tied halterneck and a black double-striped hem complete the dress. She accessorizes with a black beret decorated by a pink bow. One ear pokes through the beret and holds it in place with a silver stud earring. Her other ear has a silver twine ball earring. Around her neck is a large silver anchor necklace with a pink bow accent. On her feet are blue weaved wedges with pink bows and anchor accents. Her blue handbag has rope handles and a pink anchor and bow emblem. The swashbuckling mateys are on a hunt for buried treasure. But being a pirate is harrrrd work - especially when their vessel gets tossed by monstrous waves! Their cruise of a lifetime is turning out to be all wet!

Clawdeen’s long brown hair with purple streaks is pulled into a side ponytail. Her makeup is light with a soft purple eyeshadow and a salmon pink lipstick. She is wearing an elbow-sleeve top that has squiggly purple and white stripes and thin black lines. Her black capri pants have pink stitching and golden accents on the legs. Accessories begin with a black pirate hat adorned with a paw print & crossbones. The has is attached to a coral pink headband bandana. A gold necklace with a crescent moon, compass, and little treasures decorates her neck. Around her waist is a coral pink sash with a gold paw print & crossbones. Her purple pirate boots have peg leg heels and are embellished with gold crescent moons, compasses, and crossbones. Crossbones, compasses, chains, and paw prints also decorate her coral pink tote. The swashbuckling mateys are on a hunt for buried treasure. But being a pirate is harrrrd work - especially when their vessel gets tossed by monstrous waves! Their cruise of a lifetime is turning out to be all wet!

Gil has pale scaly hair with a translucent blue mohawk fin that is hanging to the right. He has dark teal eyebrows, pink eyes, and light blue lips. Translucent blue gills are on his neck and translucent blue fins protrude from his forearms and calves. He is wearing a sleeveless shirt that is blue and aquamarine striped with a black anchor and red rope graphic. His black board shorts feature a print that has fish skeletons with red and white stars. Accessories consist of translucent green breathing goggles and a silver chain necklace with a fish hook and shark tooth charm. On one hand is a silver wrist wrap made up of ropes, chains, and a fish hook. His scaly turquoise loafers have silver eyelet patches on the sides. He carries a turquoise duffel bag with a pink netted pouch.

Clawdeen has beautiful straight brown hair with purple highlights. Her nightie features a green leopard print bodice with black straps and a frilly black mesh neckline. A shimmery purple strip separates the bodice from the black skirt. The skirt is decorated with irregular purple and green spots and a purple hem. Accessories consist of a sleep mask that matches the spotted pattern of her nightie and purple slippers. The fuzzy slippers are adorned with cute monster ears. Clawdeen does not include a doll stand or brush and lacks articulation at the elbow and wrist.

Draculaura has long straight black hair streaked with dark pink. She is wearing a cute pink nightie with an elaborate chain link print. The print features tiny pink polka dots, skullettes, and pink hearts. The neckline and frilly hem are black with red polka dot hearts. The neckline is also adorned with a red bow and the hem is trimmed in red. Accessories consist of a sleep mask that matches the print of her nightie and pink slippers. The fuzzy slippers are embellished with bat wing accents. Draculaura does not include a doll stand or brush and lacks articulation at the elbow and wrist.

Frankie has long straight hair that is streaked black & white with blue highlights. Her nightie has blue straps, a yellow strip by the waist, and lightning bolt stripes. The yellow, blue, white, or black lightning stripes are separated by thinner stripes of black or yellow. Accessories consist of a sleep mask that matches the lightning print of her nightie and blue slippers with neck bolts poking out the sides. Clawdeen does not include a doll stand or brush and lacks articulation at the elbow and wrist.

Draculaura has black hair with pink streaks, blunt bangs, and is pulled into a high ponytail. Her light pink skin is complemented by pink and turquoise eyeshadow, bright pink lipstick, and her signature heart under her left cheek. She is wearing a molded pink bodice adorned with a black bat wing neckline and a black & pink heart-shaped bow. Pink hearts run down the front and pink & white ruffles are along the sides.  The fuschia skirt has light pink scalloped stripes and a ruffled black tulle hem. The front of the large pink train is decorated with hearts and black bats. On her feet are pink pumps with heart accents, side cutouts, and knobby heels. The front of the top has a lever that creates a brand new look. The bodice becomes a black corset with pink laces and blue heart buttons. The lever hangs over the skirt and is decorated with blue & pink winged hearts. Most importantly, the train extends upwards and transforms into wings. A brush or doll stand is not inlcuded with Draculuara. There was a time when monsters unlived in hiding because they feared being "different." But then the ghouls met, and they understood that it's clawesome to be different! So they created a school where all monsters are welcome, all uniqueness is celebrated... and where everyone can boo!

Skelita has long black hair with brown highlights. Her bony features are accentuated by light blue eyeshadow and red lipstick outlined in black. Dots surround her eyes and swirly designs and stitched decorate her face. She stands 28 inches tall and has a button on the back of her head that when pressed will change the color of her eyes.  Her lovely dress has a black halterneck top with pink and purple trim and a shimmery print of gray flowers and curled designs. The triple-layered skirt features colorful patches with drippy hems and adorable prints. Patch designs include spiders, stars, flowers, safety pins, skeletons, and Skullettes. She accessorizes with a burnt orange statement necklace, a brown belt, and a bracelet. The belt and bracelet are etched with Skullette designs. On her feet are green wedge sandals with brown heels.

Ari has long magenta hair with streaks of purple. Her makeup consists of pink eyeshadow, light blue eyeliner, and lavender lipstick. She lacks articulation at the wrists, hips, and knees. Ari lights up and sings when activated. There are four modes: vocals; music & vocals; music, vocals & lights; and lights only. She is wearing a sleeveless lavender dress with an asymmetrical hem. The short dress is molded and adorned with embossed chains. Over it is a sheer magenta dress with a shimmery silver chain design and a blue asymmetrical hem. Silver accessories begin with a double chain headband decorated by a chain flower and a necklace with a purple gem charm. The gem is also a button to activate her music and lights. Around her waist is a silver belt with four studded rows, two dangling strands, and music note accents. On her feet are translucent blue knee high boots made up of wedge heels and interconnected chains. Also included is a silver microphone and a silver pedestal adorned with chains and Skullette emblems. Ari’s feet clip into the pedestal which allows her to stand. Monster Parents: Ghosts  How Do I Boo? I rock. I use music to inspire monsters to be themselves! And if it makes them want to dance too, even better!  Once upon a tomb, monsters unlived in hiding... afraid they would be in danger if humans new they existed. But Draculaura and her ghoulfriends dreamt of a school where everyone was welcome, and a world where monsters and humans could co-exist. All went frightfully well, until Moanica - a zombie with her own horrific agenda - snatched popstar Ari and tried to take over the school! Now, the ghouls must save Ari and take back Monster High... in time for the big dance!

Draculaura Draculaura has long black hair with streaks of pink. It has side swept bangs and is pulled into a ponytail. She wears turquoise eyeshadow, pink lipstick, and a soft pink blush. Under her left eye is a pink heart. Her sleeveless dress has a sweetheart neckline with a black mesh top. The pink dress is decorated with black bats outlined in turquoise.  Turquoise accessories include dangly heart earrings, a heart bracelet, and a belt with a winged heart cutout. On her feet are tall black boots with batty heels and winged heart accents. She carries a fanged pink handbag with little wings and a bat handle. Moanica D’Kay Moanica’s long hair is light purple with thick streaks of light green. She wears purple eyeshadow and dark purple lipstick. Her outfit begins with a yellow top that features an image of a rib cage and heart. Over the top is a green, black, and gray camo vest. Completing the ensemble are black jeans covered with white and gray splatter. Pink accessories consist of worm earrings, a double chain with rib cage pendant, a rib cage bracelet, and a brain wrinkle belt. On her feet are pink wedge booties embossed with a brain wrinkle design. She carries a pink brain purse held by a long shoulder strap. The 2-pack has a brush, but doll stands are not included. Abbey has straight white hair with streaks of pink. It is pulled into a high ponytail and features side swept bangs with a purple streak. Complementing her blue skin is lavender eyeshadow and pink lipstick. She is wearing a long sleeve dress with a purple bodice that has a white ice crystal print. The blue skirt is covered by a sheer purple top layer decorated with shimmery ice crystals. Accessories consist of a furry white scarf, furry white wrist cuffs, and a translucent purple snowflake belt with beaded icicles. On her feet are translucent purple ice booties with furry cuffs. Her masquerade mask is a white snowflake. Abbey does not come with a brush or doll stand.

Clawdeen has long brown hair with purple streaks that is pulled to the back with tied strands. Her makeup includes lavender eyeshadow and pink lipstick. Decorating her right eye are green crescent moons and white starry dots. She is wearing a ferocious tiger striped dress that is yellow and purple with green highlights. The chest and neckline is black mesh and crisscrossed by gold trim. The bottom of the dress has a ruffled purple hem that is long, sheer, and decorated with different phases of yellow moons. Purple accessories consist of a molded fur shrug and peep toe pumps. The pumps are covered in spikes and have crescent moon heels. Her green masquerade mask is a wolf face with a nose, whiskers, and pointy teeth. Clawdeen does not come with a brush or doll stand. Cleo has long black hair with streaks of gold. It features blunt bangs, blue side streaks, and a hair bump tied in the back. She wears turquoise eyeshadow, turquoise eyeliner, and red lipstick. Under her right eye is a turquoise gem and under her left eye are five turquoise diamonds. She is wearing a single shoulder dress that is reddish orange with yellow lines that create a mummy wrapped look. Over the dress is a sheer drape with a blue and gold Egyptian print. Accessories begin with a wide gold necklace with gem and snake accents. Around her waist is a gold belt adorned with a winged scarab. On her feet are burnt pink pumps with winding snake straps. Her masquerade mask is a blue Eye of Horus. Cleo does not come with a brush or doll stand. Once upon a tomb, monsters unlived in hiding... afraid they would be in danger if humans new they existed. Deuce  has green scaled hair and a snake mohawk. The snakes are hanging to the right and get progressively darker. He is wearing a tuxudo-themed shirt with a white collar, yellow lapel, yellow trim, and a gray snake print. Complementing the shirt are a pair of gray jeans. Accessories consist of a yellow skull & snake bow tie and a gold snake bracelet. On his feet are pearl white boots with black soles and wrapped snake accents. His masquerade mask is a pair of red sunglasses. Deuce does not come with a brush or doll stand.

Lagoona has long yellow blonde hair with light turquoise streaks. A portion is pulled to the back and her bangs form a side swept curl. She wears purple eyeshadow, salmon pink lipstick, and below her left eye are three green starfish. Her sleeveless dress features two different prints separated by black outlines. One print is turquoise with green aquatic plants and the other is salmon pink with green dots and fan-like scales. She accessorizes with a coral pink arm wrap made up of tentacles and turquoise ankle-strap wedges with decorated with pearls and starfish. Her masquerade mask is coral pink stars with bubbly starfish accents. Lagoona does not come with a brush or doll stand.
