Moanica has purplish pink hair with a streak of neon green. It has side swept bangs and is pulled into a high ponytail with a curled split. Her gray skin is accentuated by pink & magenta eyeshadow, purple lipstick, and soft pink blush. Her form fitting dress features a splattered camo design that is black, bright green, pink and white. The single shoulder strap and frilly hem are black tulle decorated with a metallic purple print. She accessorizes with dangly green tombstone earrings and a studded pink belt with a large flower. A black painted glove covers one hand and on her feet are pink brain wrinkled pumps. Her masquerade mask is black with drippy spirals. Moanica does not come with a brush or doll stand.

This playset features Draculaura at the dance party celebrating the opening of Monster High, the school where everyone is welcome. The party has a dance floor, stage, photo booth, banner, and refreshment table. Draculaura Dracululaura has beautiful black & pink streaked hair. It is long and straight with blunt bangs. Her makeup includes pink eyeshadow, pink lipstick, and a pink heart around her left eye. She is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows and wrists. Her dress has a lovely pink & white splatter-striped bodice with a black tulle neckline. The pink skirt has a serrated hem and a blue spiderweb print accented by winged hearts. Blue accessories consist of earrings and a bow-heart broach. On her feet are blue wedges with ankle strap hearts. Dance Party The party dance floor is black, etched with swirls, and has a light-up Skullette in the middle. There are two black doll stands attached to purple Skullette bases. When the dance floor dial is turned, dolls using the stands will twirl and spin. Attached to the dance floor is a raised pink stage with a green bat wing microphone resting on a black chain stand. The stage is framed by blue coffin-like speakers and tied-back curtains. It is topped in black with spiderwebs, swirls, and a silver skullette with black bat wings. The photo booth has a black swirled frame, an argyle backdrop, and is topped with translucent pink Skullette and heart shaped balloons. With the photo booth is a green three-legged stand with a black camera on top. The stand has a holder for a cell phone so you can take actual photos of the party.  Connecting the stage and photo booth is a Monster High banner framed in purple. It is decorated with swirled spiderwebs, dangling spiders, and cute bats. The round refreshment table has a purple dripping tabletop etched with spiderweb swirls and a bat wing heart. It rests upon a black pedestal with four claw feet. Snacks include three monstrously pink cupcakes sitting  on a silver pedestal and a bubbly green bowl of punch. Party accessories include three masquerade masks on sticks. There is a blue cat ear mask, a green bat wing mask, and a red vampire lips mask. There are also two Skullette & heart balloons. The balloons can be held by ghouls or attached to the banner for decoration.

Draculaura has long pink hair with streaks of black. It is pulled into a ponytail and embellished by black hat with a spiderweb Skullette decoration. Her makeup features pink eyeshadow, pink eyeliner, a red heart around her left eye, red lipstick, and a red heart on her left cheek. Her black dress has pink straps, a sweetheart neckline, and a white print with check patterned bats connected by strings of dots. The tulle overskirt layers are asymmetrical with serrated hems. There is a pink layer and a black layer with a metallic pink print. She accessorizes with pink spiderweb swirl earrings and a hard pink neck piece with flared shoulders, flared collar, and a heart cutout at the chest. She wears black painted gloves with pink hearts and on her feet are black spiderweb pumps with winged heart accents. Three party accessories are included with Draculaura. There is a pink “Monster High” speech bubble, a blue Skullette mask, and a purple masquerade mask with spider designs. A doll stand is not included. Now, the ghouls must save Ari and take back Monster High... in time for the big dance!

Frankie has long white hair with angled blunt bangs and black streaks. It is held back with a top bun and decorated by a blue lightning bolt bow headband. Her makeup features blue eyeshadow, gray eyeliner, pink lipstick, and a yellow lightning bolt around her left eye. Her black collared halterneck dress has a mesh neckline and features a black, blue, and yellow diagonal print with white hex nuts. The yellow waist accentuates the black tulle overskirt that is graced by a metallic blue print. She accessorizes with yellow gear earrings and blue painted elbow length gloves with raised gears. On her feet are silver peep toe pumps with screws, studded ankle straps, and yellow lightning bolt accents. Three party accessories are included with Frankie. There is a black stitched lightning bolt mask, a yellow Skullette mask, and a silver mechanical masquerade mask. A doll stand is not included. Ari has thick wavy purple hair and glowy translucent skin. Her makeup consists of pink eyeshadow, light blue eyeliner, and lavender lipstick.  Her sleeveless dress is violet with a purple mesh neckline, blue trim, and an asymmetrical hem. The front features a floral print created by a pattern of blue, red, and silver chains. She accessorizes with a silver belt and translucent blue boots. The belt has four studded rows, two dangling strands, and music note accents. The boots have wedge heels and rows of interconnected chains that go all the way up to her knees.  Ari is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows and wrists. A brush or doll stand is not included. Once upon a tomb, monsters unlived in hiding... afraid they would be in danger if humans knew they existed. But Draculaura and her ghoulfriends dreamt of a school where everyone was welcome, and a world where monsters and humans could co-exist. Draculaura has wonderful pink hair with with a big black streak down the middle. She wears it in a high ponytail that is accentuated by a black spiderweb skullette decoration. Her makeup includes pink eyeshadow, a pink heart around her left eye, deep red lipstick, and a deep red heart on her left cheek. She is wearing a black dress with a sweetheart neckline, red ribbon straps, and a pink mesh peplum. The front of the dress features a white print with check patterned bats connected by strings of dots. Complementing the outfit is a hard pink neck piece with flared shoulders, flared collar, and a heart cutout at the chest. On her feet are black pumps adorned with spiderweb designs and hearts with spiderweb bows. Draculaura is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows and wrists. A brush or doll stand is not included.

The Cleo doll has crimped black hair with blue highlights and a pink under layer. Her tan complexion is complemented by turquoise eyes, blue and yellow eye makeup, pink lips, and a gem on her cheek. She is wearing a sleeveless dress that has a yellow vinyl neckline and a yellow boxy hem. The rest of the dress is black with a colorful print that includes triangles, squares, pyramids, cat sarcophagi, ankhs, and the Eye of Horus. Accessories consist of a squiggly yellow headband with a large gem and a translucent teal snake winding up one leg. On her feet are pink peep-toe pumps with pyramid studs and geometric etchings.

The Venus doll has bright pink crimped hair that streaked with black and yellow and shaved on one side. She has light green skin, blue eyes, jagged pink and yellow eye makeup, and prickly pink lips. Her sleeveless dress is black in front, yellow in back, and has a pink mesh neckline with yellow trim. The black front is decorated with a vine print that has pink Venus flytraps and yellow pricklers. The hem is trimmed with a serrated pink mesh. Accessories consist of a green flytrap hair bow and a green vine belt with a flytrap bow. On her feet are translucent yellow pumps with cutouts and jagged trim.

Beetrice has long black hair with streaks of yellow. She has a yellow complexion, purple eyes with light blue shadow, pink lips, and a heart on her cheek. Antennae poke through her hair, her wings are translucent blue, and she has a yellow and black striped insect abdomen. Her strapless molded top is black and her molded skirt is yellow. The skirt features Skullette bees and a honeycomb design. Accessories consist of pink button hairpieces and pink knee high boots with irregular edges and cutouts. The doll stands about 5.25 inches tall and comes with a yellow beehive. The hive has black pupilless eyes, a black mouth, and can be used as a seat.

Lumina has long pink hair streaked with violet and pulled to the back. She has pink skin, orange eyebrows, pink eyes, and orange lips. Curled antennae protrude from her hair, translucent orange wings are on her back, and she has an orange insect abdomen. Her molded halterneck top is turquoise and her molded skirt is salmon pink. The skirt is decorated with fireflies and yellow Skullettes. She accessorizes with a black safety pin headband and turquoise peep-toe pumps with curled heels. The doll stands about 5.25 inches tall and comes with a pink mushroom. The plant has one big eye and can be used as a seat.

Wingrid has long purple hair with streaks of yellow-green pulled into a high ponytail. Her pale blue complexion is complemented by blue eyebrows, green eyes with green shadow, and pink lips. She has four insect-like arms and translucent purple dragonfly wings. Her molded halterneck top is violet and her molded skirt is black. The skirt is decorated with colorful dragonflies, Skullettes, and flowers. She accessorizes with a black bug-inspired headband and black peep-toe pumps with curled heels. The doll stands about 5.25 inches tall and comes with a yellow plant. The plant has red eyes and can be used as a seat.

Cleo has long straight black hair with turquoise highlights. Her tan complexion is complemented by blue eyes, pink shadow, pink lips, and a turquoise gem on her cheek. She is wearing a black dress with a single black mesh shoulder. It is decorated with a colorful print of bugs and insect wings. The skirt has a blue waist and a sparkly black mesh overlay. Accessories consist of yellow bug eye glasses with wings and gold peep-toe pumps with scarabs, ankle straps, and curled heels. Cleo’s wings are translucent blue with purple, magenta, and yellow details.

Toralei has straight orange hair with blunt bangs and a section of turquoise. She is sandy brown with green cat eyes, turquoise shadow, dots under her eyes, a dark brown nose, brown stripes on her cheeks, and a pink nose. Her black dress has a choker collar with a black mesh neck, a ruffled red hem, and black tulle trim. The front of the dress features a pattern of red and orange claw marks decorated with blue and yellow butterflies. She accessorizes with bug eye glasses that have antennae. On her feet are coral peep-toe pumps with skeletal accents, ankle straps, and fish bone heels. Toralei’s wings are translucent yellow with a colorful animal print.

Twyla has wavy powder blue hair with a magenta streak. She has lavender skin, aqua blue eyes, aqua shadow, purple eyeliner, and coral pink lips. Her halter strap dress is dark purple with a purple dream catcher print decorated with colorful butterflies. It has pink trim on the bodice and the skirt has a shredded mesh overlay. She accessorizes with a purple beetle headband and pink booties with curled details. Twyla’s translucent wings are light blue with purple and pink spots and bug accents.

Clawdeen has long wavy brown hair with a wide streak of purple. She has a brown complexion with yellow eyes, purple eyeshadow, and pink fanged lips. Her signature look begins with a yellow-green tank top that is decorated with angled zipper lines. Over it is a black jacket with mesh sleeves and a purple faux fur collar. The pants are covered with a purple, violet, and blue animal print. She accessorizes with gold hoop earrings, a gold crescent moon pendant, a black strap bracelet, and a purple handbag with a small strap and a crescent moon accent. On her feet are gold boots detailed with zippers and studs.

Cleo has long black hair with tinsel highlights and a tan complexion. She has turquoise eyes with gray shadow, red lips, and a gem on her cheek. Her signature look has an aqua blue top with a glittery pyramid print, black mesh shoulders, and a black ribbon waist. The capri pants have a mummy wrap print made up of black, blue, green, and turquoise. Gold accessories include a pyramid stud headband, triangle dangle earrings, a regal necklace, and a coiled snake bracelet, Her gold triangle purse has geometric ridges and a round handle. On her feet are blue sandals with diamond patterned wedges, gold accents, and winding sash straps.

Lagoona has long blonde hair with turquoise highlights. She has pale blue skin with turquoise eyes, light purple eyeshadow, pink lips, and freckles. Her signature look is a one-piece outfit that has a cropped coral pink hoodie with a fish scale print and “13” on the chest. The sleeves and midriff are striped with white and light blue wavy lines. Her teal shorts have a black floral print with a pink hem and knee-length black mesh. Accessories consist of a teal bead bracelet and a blue duffel purse decorated with a coral pink seashell and squid. On her feet are blue high tops detailed with scales and beads.

Clawdeen has straight brown hair with purple highlights. Her brown complexion is complemented by lavender eyeshadow and pink fanged lips. She is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows, wrists, and knees. Her molded top is bright green with leopard print and the Monster High crest. Her purple skirt has a black stitched waist and a serrated hem. On her feet are molded gold high tops decorated with zippers and leopard print etching.

Cleo has straight black hair with golden highlights. She has tanned skin with mummy-like features, turquoise eyes with gray shadow, deep red lips, and a gem on her cheek. Cleo is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows, wrists, and knees. Her molder one-shoulder top is aqua blue with a blue print and the Monster High crest.  Her blue skirt has a gold stitched waist and a serrated hem. On her feet are gold high tops embellished with zigzags and pyramid studs.

Lagoona has wavy blonde hair with light turquoise highlights. She has pale turquoise skin, turquoise eyes with purple shadow, pink lips, and freckles. Lagoona is a budget doll and lacks articulation at the elbows, wrists, and knees. She is wearing a molded pink halterneck top with deep pink bubbles, scales, and the Monster High crest. Her turquoise skirt has a pink stitched waist and a serrated hem. On her feet are coral pink high tops with seashell accents and bubbly heels.

Draculaura has long straight hair that is a blend of black and deep pink. She has a pale pink complexion, purple eyes with purple shadow, fanged lips, and a pink heart on her cheek. Tops Her top is pink with frilly white sleeves, a blue collar with black bow, and a light blue heart print. She also has a pink tank top with drippy pink stripes and winged hearts. Pants & Dresses She wears baggy blue shorts with a black waist and suspenders. There is also a sheer pink overskirt with a serrated hem and a deep pink skirt with light blue trim and a black tulle hem. Her dress is yellow with pink trim, a halterneck strap, and a print of fanged lips. A black pair of pants with a pink waist is her last piece of clothing. Accessories Accessories begin with baby blue glasses and a pink purse. The lip-shaped purse has fangs and crystal accents. Two pairs of shoes are included. The first pair are pink wedges with bow ankle straps and heart cutouts in the heels. The second pair are strappy baby blue wedges with wide straps that twist up the calves. Many outfits are possible with the clothes and accessories. Check out the gallery for some of the amazing ensembles.

Frankie has long straight hair that is streaked black & white. She has pale green skin, one green and one blue eye, pink eyeshadow, and red lips. On her right cheek are gray stitches. She is a budget doll that lacks articulation in her elbows, wrists, and knees. Tops Frankie has two tops. The first is blue with black stitch stripes, a white collar, and short white sleeves. The sleeveless top is gray with a yellow, blue, and white neckline. The same colors trim the hem with a zigzag stripe. Pants & Dresses Her wardrobe has a dress, skirt, pants, and shorts. The dress features a black & white zigzag print, yellow trim, and a red zigzag belt. The puffy skirt is blue plaid with yellow-green lines. The pants are blue with yellow trim and yellow pocket stitches. The last piece of clothing is argyle shorts with light and dark blue diamonds, yellow zigzags, and black lightning accents. Accessories Accessories begin with a studded silver belt that has a bow buckle. The silver handbag has a hex nut pattern and a stitched strap. Two pairs of shoes are included. The first are strappy black pumps with spikes and bolts for heels. The second pair are silver high tops with yellow laces, stitches, and traction tread soles. Many outfits are possible with the clothes and accessories. Check out the gallery for some of the amazing ensembles.

Abbey has long crimped hair that is streaked pink, blue, white, purple and black. She has a light blue complexion, icicle eyebrows, and purple eyes. Her makeup consists of blue eyeliner, a magenta shadow mask, purple dots, tusk accents, and pink lipstick. Her outfit features a blue dress with a shimmery winter print. The skirt is detailed with a furry black & white chevron pattern. Accessories include a white mammoth bone headpiece, a black & white fur stole with a red crystal clasp, and matching furry black & white leg warmers. On her feet are pink booties with silver laces, cleats, and translucent ice heels with woolly mammoths inside. Accompanying Abbey is Shiver, her pet woolly mammoth. He is lavender with white fur, magenta eyes, and curled tusks. He is in an adorable sitting pose.

Venus has long pink and green hair that is pulled into a high twisted ponytail. Her light green complexion is complemented by blue eyes, light gray eyeshadow, and pink lips with prickly fangs. She is wearing a pink jumper with polka dots under a cropped black mesh jersey with the Monster High emblem and a blue neckline. On her feet are pink peep-toe boots with serrated soles and claw heels. She accessorizes with silver wrist cuffs. To recuperate, the doll has a pink sippy cup and a green towel. Casketball The casketball net is purple with a green and white backboard that has teeth and “Monster High”. They sit upon a purple octopus-like pole that has suckers and squirmy tentacles at the base. Also included is a blue ball.

The 2-pack features Cleo de Nile and Ghoulia Yelps. It is an exclusive of the Mattel Shop. Cleo de Nile Cleo has long black hair with blunt bangs, glitter highlights, and teal streaks. She has a tan complexion, light blue eyes, elaborate eye makeup, deep red lips, and a turquoise gem on her cheek. Her outfit is a black jumpsuit with elbow length sleeves and knee length legs. It is detailed with a print of winding golden lines and turquoise graphics. She accessorizes with coral snakes on a gold statement necklace, gold armbands, and a gold cage peplum. On her head is an ornate gold headband decorated with a teal cobra. Her sandals have sparkly teal soles and golden straps with coral accents that wind up her legs. Accompanying Cleo is Hissette. The cobra is gold with a turquoise crown and jewelry. Ghoulia Yelps Ghoulia has long wavy hair that is streaked light and dark blue. She has a pale gray complexion, pale blue eyes, and red lips. Her outfit has a gray shirt with a breast pocket, black cuffs and trim, red buttons, and a drippy hem. The knee-length shorts are a pinstripe blue decorated with a turquoise skull print. Accessories consist of a bright green explorer hat, red zombie arm earrings, blue cat eye glasses, a turquoise scarf, and a red brain belt. On her feet are black knee-high boots with red laces and bright green heels. She carries a black torch with orange flame and a gray satchel with a red zombie hand graphic.  With Ghoulia is Sir Hoots A Lot. The owl is bright green with yellow eyes and blue accents. If you have ever been trapped in a pyramid for thousands of years, you know how dreadfully boring it can be. If you were also trapped in that pyramid with only your pet cobra to keep you company and aid in your pranks against your rather abhorrent sister, you can imagine how "poor" (but actually quite wealthy) Cleo felt - entombed in an opulent palace with all of the luxuries her royal family had to offer, but no one there to admire and worship her. If you know all of that, you understand why she began to scream of a mysterious and bespectacled ghoul who would one day rescue her, befriend her, and, of course, idolize her. It was surely her destiny.  It is a little know fact that zombies are among the brainiest monsters in the world. They are often buried in deep thoughts and are able to solve mysteries and piece together puzzles much faster than their slow gait or moaning dialect would imply. As Ghoulia often says"urghhhghgh ghrrrhhhh uhhhh," which roughly translates to "I'm busy and enunciation is overrated." And, in fact, Ghoulia has been monstrously busy lately because she found what only a zombie with her superior intellect would consider "a clue." Donning her hat and calling Sir Hoots-A-Lot, she sets off on an archeological expedition to dig up a grave treasure - the princess destined to be her true ghoulfriend.

The 2-Pack features Frankie Stein and Draculaura dressed for some exciting experiments. Frankie Stein Frankie has white hair with black streaks that is pulled into a long ponytail. Her pale green complexion is complemented by one green and one blue eye, gray shadow, green eye liner, and green lips. She is wearing a sea green lab coat dress with a print of pink buttons, black stitches and colorful splatter. The look is completed with molded black leggings and silver knee-high boots with lightning details. Her lab accessories include blue lightning goggles and a jar with a translucent green monster. Draculaura Draculaura has straight pink hair with black streaks. She has pale pink skin, purple eyes with gray shadow, fanged pink lips, and a heart on her cheek.  Her pink dress has a serrated white lapel, a black waist, serrated hem, and a scientific print. The print has winged hearts, beakers, atomic symbols, and formulas. Pink booties, batty pink goggles, and a pink laptop complete her lab outfit. Draculaura's solo experiments in science class can go kind of batty. But with Frankie as her lab partner, they're sure to be voltageous!

Clawdeen Wolf Clawdeen has brown hair with streaks of purple that is pulled to the back. Her light brown complexion is complemented by sandy brown eyes with purple and pink shadow, fanged pink lips, and black and pink eye grease.  Her outfit features a cropped white top with pink mesh shoulders, pink and white jagged stripes, and the Monster High crest. The black sweats has a white waist with pink drawstring, pink leg stripes, and white cuffs. She accessorizes with a pink & black Skullette bow and a pink & black pompom. On her feet are purple high tops. Clawd Wolf Clawd has dark brown hair with a high and tight cut. He has brown skin, fanged lips, sandy brown eyes, and black and red eye grease. His uniform has a black tank top with saw tooth trim, a pink and white jagged stripe, and “12” with a jagged blue outline. The matching black shorts have a pink hem. On his feet are turquoise high tops. Sports accessories consist of a gold football and a light blue helmet and shoulder pads. The helmet has red, white, and blue stripes, and the pads have pink claw marks.

The 3-pack features Clawdeen Wolf, Barker Wolf and Weredith Wolf getting ready for bed. Clawdeen Wolf Clawdeen has long brown hair with streaks of purple. Her brown complexion is complemented by yellow eyes, lavender shadow, and pink lips. She is wearing a sleeveless top that is purple with one yellow shoulder. The front is decorated with jagged black diagonal stripes and yellow details. Her yellow capri pajama pants have a gray animal print and purple trim. Accessories consist of yellow bone hair clips and purple monster slippers. Barker Wolf Barker is light brown with goldenrod hair adorned with light blue stripes. He has green eyes, a brown nose, and fangs. His sleeveless shirt has jagged diagonal stripes and his shorts are blue. Both are trimmed with orange. He has an orange creature sleep mask and a red toothbrush. Weredith Wolf Weredith is a furry light brown with dark brown ears, markings, and tail. She has big yellow eyes and small fangs.  Her top is lavender with light blue marks and diagonal jagged black stripes with yellow eyes. Her diaper is pinned with yellow bones. She comes with a yellow baby bottle and a soft pink blanket. The Wolf family is packed with siblings all trying to get ready for bed at once! It's total chaos but also a howling good time!

The 3-pack features Cleo, Lux, and Sandy de Nile spending time together. Cleo de Nile Cleo has long straight black hair with golden highlights. Her tan complexion is complemented by turquoise eyes, light pink lips, and a turquoise gem on her cheek. She is wearing a sleeveless sweater dress that is purple in the back and has pink trim. The front features a teal and purple design detailed with hieroglyphics. On her feet are multi-strapped turquoise sandals. Lux de Nile Lux has spiked black hair with purple streaks and a golden headband. He has tanned skin, slate blue eyes, and bandage wrapped limbs. His sleeveless red shirt has gold trim and a blue & yellow pyramid print. Black shorts with colorful hieroglyphic designs and red sandals complete his look. Sandy de Nile Sandy has tan skin, big turquoise eyes, and bandage wrapped limbs. On her head is a large gold Egyptian headdress. She is wearing a purple onesie decorated with a pyramid lined waist. On the chest is an eye with lashes and a turquoise iris. Accessories for the dolls include a blue blanket, yellow travel cup, a green drink box, and a teal baby bottle. The de Niles are a closely wrapped family who think a night of watching movies or playing games together is creeperific fun!

Ebbie has blue hair with sky blue streaks that is pulled into high ponytails. She has aqua blue skin with purple eyebrows, blue eyes with blue shadow, purple freckles, and purple lips. Instead of legs she has a fish body with scales and a flowing tail fin.  She wears a sleeveless swim top that has wavy black and pink stripes. It is decorated with white dots, bubbles, and a yellow hem. Over her eyes she wears a pair of gray sunglasses. Accessories consist of a translucent green beach ball and a pink crab-shaped pool.  The doll is about 5.5 inches tall. The Blue family feels at home on any beach, and enjoys sharing those go-with-the-flow times playing in the sun and surf together.

Fangelica has wavy purple hair with streaks of black that is pulled to the back. She has pink skin, magenta eyebrows, purple eyes with pink shadow, and fanged deep red lips. Her sleeveless turquoise top is complemented by a pink wrap that holds the bat wings on her back. Her black trimmed skirt is purple with a print of black winged hearts, confetti, streamers, and little white hearts. On her feet are black sandals with bat wing accents. Baking accessories consist of a light blue hand mixer with skeletal beaters and a purple bowl. The dripping pink monster cake rests on a light purple pedestal. The doll is about 5.5 inches tall. The kitchen is a fangtastic place for Dracula and his two daughters to bond while whipping up a tasty bites from traditional to Drac's fave - vegetarian.

The 2-pack features Lagoona and Kelpie Blue ready for a day at the beach. Lagoona Blue Lagoona has blonde hair with light turquoise highlights. She has pale turquoise skin, teal eyes, pink shadow, and coral pink lips. She is wearing a two piece swimsuit that is pink and turquoise with a scale print complemented by skeletal seahorses. The top has orange “V” straps and the shorts have orange trim with a teal tulle peplum. Accessories consist of tentacle sunglasses and bubbly orange sandals. Her beach bag is translucent yellow with stripes and a Skullette. Kelpie Blue Kelpie has super curly has that is part blonde and part turquoise. She has lavender skin, blue eyebrows, green eyes, purple freckles, and purple lips.  Her one-piece suit has one black strap, diagonal pink, white, and turquoise stripes, and a spiky black scaled heart graphic. Around her waist is a sheer pink cover up. She accessorizes with a pink headband, dark sunglasses, and teal sandals. Her beach bag is coral pink and can be used to carry a blue travel cup and sandwich.

Pawla has curly brown hair with streaks of turquoise. It is pulled into two big poms and complemented by a purple cat-face sleep mask. She has a brown complexion with yellow eyes, freckles, and pink fanged lips. Her oversized forearms and legs are furry and she has a bushy tail. Her sleeveless nightgown features turquoise and black zigzag stripes. The stripes are decorated with pink paw prints, claw marks, and yellow cat eyes.  Accessories consist of a gold bow around her neck, a pink moon storybook, a purple monster pillow, and a yellow werebear. The bear has a pink bow and only one button eye. The doll is about 5.5 inches tall. The Wolf family is packed with siblings all trying to get ready for bed at once! It's total chaos but also a howling good time!

Pharrah has purple and black hair pulled into a high ponytail. Her tan complexion is complemented by purple eyes, lavender lips, and a gem on her cheek. She is wearing a sleeveless coral pink dress with a gold waist and a “V” hem with gold trim. The front is adorned with yellow designs accentuated by turquoise triangles. Accessories consist of a gold bow headband, a golden necklace, and crimson pink shoes with bow ankle straps. A board game comes with Pharrah. It sits on a purple table and features a desert-themed board with Egyptian symbols. Two mummy game pieces and a golden die are also included.

Sandy de Nile has a tan complexion, turquoise eyes, and bandage wrapped limbs. On her head is a gold Egyptian headdress with a snake emblem. She is wearing a purple onesie with lavender stripes and a yellow ankh on the chest. A golden high chair comes with Sandy. It has a tufted turquoise seat, an ornate headrest, and Bastet statues at the base. Food and accessories include a monstrous slice of cake on a turquoise plate, a lavender sippy cup, and a gold fork. The de Niles are a closely wrapped family who think a night of watching movies or playing games together is creeperific fun!

Abbey looks magnificent with her straight white hair pulled to the back and decorated with a streak of blue and purple. She has pale blue skin, purple eyes, gray shadow, and fanged dark blue lips. Her outfit has a black faux fur shawl and a beautiful dress. The dress is purple with a pointed black hem and a print of purple, blue, and black puff balls. Translucent accessories include a black headband with purple crystals and a choker with epaulettes. A cross strap connects the choker to the belt.  On her feet are translucent blue crystal boots with icy cuffs. Floral embellishments can be attached to the belt, strap, or boots. Her furry blue purse has a purple moth accent and is inspired by Shiver, her pet woolly mammoth.

Rochelle has wavy pink hair with streaks of pale turquoise. Her speckled complexion is complemented by pink eyes, gray eyeshadow, and pink lips. She is wearing a dress with a sleeveless turquoise top embellished by pink ruffles down the front. The double-layer skirt is violet-red with a pink and turquoise print that features flowers, fleurs-de-lis, and dragonflies. Accessories consist of a black filigree headband with turquoise fleur-de-lis flowers, a black belt and suspenders, and pink booties detailed with fleurs-de-lis. Pink flowers, magenta flowers, and a turquoise dragonfly can be used to decorate her accessories. She also has a turquoise handbag of Roux, her pet gargoyle, with a black bow.

Venus has long straight hair that is streaked green and pink with one side shaved short. She has pale green skin, blue eyes, gray eyeshadow, and soft pink lips with prickly fangs. Her dress features a pink and magenta floral print with green flytrap accents. The dress is embellished by black trim with pink dots and a black tulle hem. She accessorizes with a light green ivy headband with a pink flytrap and a green ivy chest wrap. On her feet are black booties with embossed ivy. Pink flowers can be used to decorate her accessories. Her purse is an orange pot that has a blue fly and holds Chewlian, her pet Venus flytrap.

The School Spirit 2-pack features Draculaura and Twyla wearing peanut butter and jelly themed outfits. Draculaura Draculaura has long black hair with a center streak of violet that is pulled into a high ponytail. She has pale pink skin, light purple eyes with pink shadow, pink fanged lips, and a heart on her cheek. Her raglan shirt is white with black sleeves and a “D” on the chest. The pink skirt is decorated with peanut butter and jelly splatter and peanut butter sandwich halves. On her feet are pearl white shoes. Twyla Twyla has aqua blue hair with a streak of purple that is pulled into a high ponytail. She has lavender skin, aqua blue eyes with pink shadow, and pink lips. Her outfit begins with an aqua gingham check top embellished with a purple “T” and a purple bow. The skirt is dark purple with purple jelly splatter and jelly sandwich halves. On her feet are purple high tops. Accessories Food accessories include two lunch bags, a jar of peanut butter, a jar of jelly, and two sandwiches. The sandwiches are heart-shaped, dripping with jelly, and have wings.

Cleo has black hair pulled into a top bun with her blunt bangs streaked blue and teal. She is tan with turquoise eyes, gold and blue eyeshadow, pink lips, and a gem on her cheek. Her ballet dress is turquoise with a colorful print and a single black tulle shoulder strap. The skirt consists of strips with two tulle under layers; one pink and one black.  Accessories consist of a gold tiara, gold decorative body armor, blue bandage wrist wraps, and a gold ribbon wand. On her feet are golden slippers with inverted pyramid pedestals and straps that wind up to her knees.

Draculaura has black hair with pink highlights pulled into a high curled ponytail. She is pale pink with purple eyes, pink eyeshadow, light blue liner, fanged pink lips, and a heart on her cheek. Her bodice has a sweetheart neckline, pink & light blue stripes, and black winged hearts. The pink skirt features a spiderweb print with blue bow designs and small heart dots. Under the skirt are two tulle layers: one pink and one black. Accessories consist of a pink tiara, a black ascot, black spiderweb bracelets, light blue leg warmers, and a pink bouquet of roses. Around her waist is a pink belt with a winged heart buckle. On her feet are pink slippers with bat wing pedestals.

Moanica has lavender hair with streaks of bright green styled into a double-curl updo. She has a gray complexion with green eyes, pink & copper eyeshadow, and magenta lips. Her pink & purple print dress is decorated with green designs and yellow biohazard symbols. The skirt has a jagged hem and two tulle under layers; one green and one black. Accessories consist of a skeletal flower tiara, a pink studded choker & belt harness, spiked purple wrist wraps, and a black masquerade mask. On her feet are purple platforms with bone details and spiked straps that wind up her legs.

Cleo has long black hair with teal streaks that is pulled back and held with a yellow “POW” hair band. She is tan with turquoise eyes, silver shadow, and pink lips. A star and dots decorate one eye and a turquoise gem is on her cheek. Her sleeveless dress has teal acrylic shoulders, a black back and bodice, and a yellow front with a comic book print. The print has “BAM”, pink gems, Skullette mummies, speech bubbles with yellow gems, and pink polka dots.  On her feet are yellow double-strap pumps with cutout exclamation bubbles for heels.

Draculaura has long black hair with pink streaks that is in a high ponytail. She has pale pink skin, purple eyes, and fanged dark pink lips. A star and dots enhance one eye and a red heart is on her cheek. Her sleeveless dress has a red collar, ruffled red acrylic shoulders, and a pink back. The blue front features a print with “Ha!”, speech bubbles, fanged hearts, and polka dot hearts. On her feet are pink double-strap pumps with cutout speech bubbles for heels. Draculaura accessorizes with a speech bubble handbag that is plum colored and decorated with heart indents and a fanged heart.

Frankie has long straight hair that is streaked black and white. She has pale green skin, one green and one blue eye, pink shadow, and bright red lips. Under one eye is a blue star and dots. Her sleeveless dress has a blue collar, yellow acrylic shoulders, and a blue back. The front is white with blue polka dots and a print of scissors, Skullettes, lightning bolts, and word bubbles with “POW” and ZAAAP”. Frankie accessorizes with “BAM” speech bubble earrings; one blue and one yellow. On her feet are yellow booties with cutout lightning speech bubble heels.

Lagoona has yellow blonde hair with streaks of turquoise pulled into a ponytail. Her pale turquoise skin is complemented by turquoise eyes, pink shadow, freckles, and hot pink lips. A pink star and dots are under one eye. She wears a sleeveless dress adorned with a turquoise back and an acrylic turquoise overlaid hem. The pink front features a print with “WOW”, fish bone thought bubbles, Skullettes, and turquoise polka dots. On her feet are pink pumps with bubble accents and heels with “WOW” thought bubbles. Lagoona accessorizes with a thought bubble handbag that is chartreuse and decorated with an embossed fish bone.

Ari has big, puffy, and curly lavender hair streaked with magenta curls. She has pale translucent skin, light purple eyes, pink eyeshadow, blue eyeliner, and pink lips. Her music themed dress has a green & white striped top decorated with keyboard stripes. The green, blue, and purple ombre skirt features sheet music and chain designs. A green band and a black tulle peplum is around her waist. Ari accessorizes with a translucent blue fan, a magenta bag with chain strap, and translucent blue strappy chain shoes with tea cup bases. Translucent tea time accessories consist of a purple tray holding a magenta sugar dish and a floating yellow teapot.

Clawdeen has long brown hair with a central purple streak pulled into a high ponytail. Her brown complexion is complemented by yellow eyes with purple shadow and fanged pink lips. She wears a white & pink leopard print top decorated with desserts, tea cups, plates, and silverware. The purple & black skirt features letters that spell out “beast” and other monsterific words. The dress is completed by a purple waist and a black tulle peplum. Accessories consist of purple sunglasses and translucent purple pumps adorned with spikes and claw heels. Tea time accessories include a pink tea pot and a translucent green floating cake in a dessert dome.

Lagoona has blonde hair with turquoise highlights held in a ponytail with a turquoise sea flower clip. She has pale turquoise skin, turquoise eyes, light purple eyeshadow, freckles on her cheeks, and light pink lips. Her outfit features a pink tiered ruffled top with a black tulle neckline and black trim. The dark green pencil skirt has a print with green octopuses, coral pink fish, and other aquatic designs. On her feet are translucent pink shoes with ankle straps. Lagoona has two tea time accessories. She has a translucent pink floating tea cup with a stirrer and a pink dessert. The dessert sits on a tiered stand that is translucent black and dripping.

Draculaura has black and dark pink hair with curled ends and blunt bangs. She has pale pink skin, purple eyes, light blue eyeshadow, fanged red lips, and a baby blue heart on her cheek. Her pajama dress features a magenta hood with black eyes and ears. The dress is light blue with pink and yellow polka dots, a pink heart on the chest, and a fluffy pink hem.  The blue, yellow, and pink striped sleeves have black bat wings.  The second outfit is a pink dress decorated with graphics of blue monster faces, cobwebs, yellow fur balls, and bats. It has a black bat collar and a light blue hem. Accessories consist of two pairs of shoes. There are light blue pumps with batty ankle straps and black knee high boots. The boots have drippy heels and winged bat-like collars. Count Fabulous, Draculaura’s pet bat, is also included. He is pink with yellow eyes and a light blue bow on his head.

Twyla has aquamarine hair with a streak of purple & magenta. She has a lavender complexion with aqua blue eyes, blue eyeshadow, scalloped eyeliner, and hot pink lips. Her plush pajamas are blue with a light blue patch and a pattern of pink specks and light blue spiders. The sleeves have black, pink, and light blue zigzag stripes and the furry pink hood has eyes and light blue ears.  The second outfit is a sleeveless blue dress with light blue trim and a frilly light blue tulle hem. The dress is decorated with a print of monster faces, spiderwebs, spiders, and deep pink zigzags. Two pairs of shoes are included. There is a pink pair of wedge pumps with studded pink accents and black boots with a monstrous face, toothy soles, and zigzag embossed heels. Dustin, Twyla’s pet dust bunny, comes with the doll. He is purple with a blue nose and turquoise eyes, one is a button and the other is a line.

Venus has very long hair that is streaked green and pink with the right side shaved short and dyed pink. She has light green skin, light blue eyes with light shadow, and prickly pink lips. Her pajama jumper is pink with a splatter print, black eyes, and a blue & white mouth patch on the stomach. It has zigzag striped sleeves that are pink, green, and black with light blue furry cuffs. The light blue hood has black eyes and green flytrap-like ears. The second outfit is a light blue off-the-shoulder dress with pink straps, pink trim, and a serrated pink tulle hem. The dress is embellished with a print of cute monsters, Venus flytrap mouths, and black, pink, and green zigzag shapes. Two pairs of shoes are included with the outfits. The first is a pink pair of booties with toothy platform soles and vine covered heels. The second pair are light blue boots with a monster face, toothy etched soles, claw heels, drippy accents, and Venus flytrap collars. Chewlian, Venus’s pet Venus flytrap, comes with the doll. He is green with pointy teeth, black eyes, a mohawk of leaves, and sits in a pink pot.

Alivia has blue & black streaked hair with blunt bangs. It is held in a ponytail with a coral pink gear bow. She has pale green skin, one green and one blue eye, pink lips, and silver bolts at her temples. Her sleeveless orange dress features a blue & gray plaid print on the front. It is decorated with gears, yellow lightning bolts, and a blue ruffled hem. On her feet are black boots with thick platforms and stitch accents. With Alivia is Gigawatt, her pet that is a mix of a mouse and a bunny. He is orange with stitches, green eyes, a turquoise patch around one eye, and one bunny and one mouse ear. Alivia can carry him around with her blue and coral pet carrier.

The Monster Family 2-pack features Draculaura and Fangelica preparing for a birthday celebration. Draculaura Draculaura has long black hair with streaks of pink. She has pale pink skin, purple eyes with plum shadow, fanged violet lips, and a red heart on her cheek. She is wearing a black form-fitting dress with an ombre bat print. Magenta tulle details include the single shoulder and an asymmetrical peplum. A deep pink party hat and pink booties with swirly heels finish the outfit. Fangelica Fangelica has purple hair with streaks of black that is pulled into high pigtails. She has pink skin, magenta eyebrows, blue eyes with pink shadow, and fanged dark red lips. On her back are pink bat-like wings. Her party dress is light blue with drippy purple stripes and a batty print. Accentuating the dress is a pink bat wing collar, a pink mesh peplum, and a bubble skirt. She completes the look with a light blue party hat and plum sneakers with thick wafer cone soles and drippy designs.  Accessories Birthday accessories include magenta balloons shaped like a heart and a Skullette, a slice of cake on a plate, and a purple present with a cutout bat-wing bow. Inside the present is a pink Count Fabulous figure.

In this Monster Family 2-pack, Frankie and Alivia are having a barbecue. Frankie Stein Frankie has black & white streaked hair worn in a high ponytail. She has pale green skin, one green and one blue eye, chartreuse eyeshadow, and soft pink lips. Her sleeveless dress is striped blue and white with a print of black stitched lines and watermelon wedges. Over the dress is a coral pink patchwork apron with a scalloped trim. On her feet are blue peep-toe pumps with lightning edge heels and grommeted buckle straps. Alivia Stein Alivia has blue & black streaked hair that is pulled back with bangs. She has pale bluish green skin, one green and one blue eye, pink lips, and silver bolts at her temples. Her sleeveless dress is black in back and plaid in front. It is decorated with pulsing white lines and a colorful gear print. Pink straps, a frilly pink ascot collar, and a ruffled pink hem complete the dress. On her feet are stitched black boots with thick platforms. Accessories Barbecue accessories begin with a silver grill detailed with bolt handles and a screw pedestal. A blue tray holds three ears of corn which can be held by the skeletal hand-shaped tongs.

Howleen has pink & orange streaked hair with a parted bob cut. She has a tan complexion with yellow eyes and fanged pink lips. Her sleeveless dress is black with a dotted print on the front that features colorful crossbones. It has a pink hem and is accessorized by a turquoise double-belt with safety pin and crossbone accents. On her feet are pink high tops.  With Howleen is Cushion, her pet hedgehog. She is light beige with pink eyes, light blue quills, and a pink bow. Howleen can carry her around with her pink and turquoise pet carrier.

Ari has long straight hair that is streaked purple and magenta. She has pale translucent skin, light purple eyes, pink shadow, lavender eyeliner, and magenta lips. Her molded lavender swimsuit has a floral print on the front that is teal, turquoise, and magenta with music note and teardrop accents. The print is separated by a wide magenta stripe with rows of lavender chains. Ari is a budget doll. She has limited articulation and lacks accessories.

Clawdeen has long brown hair with streaks of purple. Her brown skin is complemented by yellow eyes, pink shadow, lavender eyeliner, and fanged deep pink lips. She wears a molded purple swimsuit with colorful dripping splatter that forms a Skullette, crossbones, a paw print, and a crescent moon. Additional details include a neckline with gold and black chains and a double strap belt at the waist. Clawdeen is a budget doll. She has limited articulation and lacks accessories.

Draculaura has long black hair with pink highlights. She has pale pink skin, purple eyes, pink eyeshadow, light blue liner, red fanged lips, and a pink heart on her left cheek. Her molded pink swimsuit has a sweetheart neckline and halterneck straps. The front is decorated with a blue spiderweb design and an ascot bow with a fanged black heart. Draculaura is a budget doll. She has limited articulation and lacks accessories.

Frankie has straight black hair with streaks of white. She has pale green skin, one green and one blue eye, light pink eyeshadow, and red lips. On her right cheek are gray stitches.  Her molded swimsuit is blue with black & white stripes, a red collar neckline, and a lightning bolt tie. Additional details consist of stitching, a yellow zigzag, and a “F” on the chest. Frankie is a budget doll. She has limited articulation and lacks accessories.

Lagoona has long yellow hair with streaks of turquoise. She has pale turquoise skin, teal eyes, pink eyeshadow, pink blush, freckles, and hot pink lips. Her molded coral pink swimsuit is decorated with turquoise seahorses, pink fish skeletons, bubbles, and black & white details. The neckline features  a pink & turquoise scale print. Lagoona is a budget doll. She has limited articulation and lacks accessories.

Draculaura has black hair pulled into a ponytail and decorated with pink and yellow highlights. She has pale pink skin, yellow eyeshadow, purple eyes, fanged pink lips, and a heart on her cheek. She is wearing a molded pink bodice adorned with a black bat wing neckline and a black & blue heart-shaped bow. Baby blue hearts run down the front and pink & blue ruffles trim the sides.  The black skirt has a pink and blue heart print and a ruffled yellow tulle hem. The large train features a pink and black spiderweb mosaic design. On her feet are black pumps with heart accents, side cutouts, and knobby heels. The front of the top has a lever that creates a brand new look. The bodice becomes a pink corset with yellow laces and black heart buttons. The lever hangs over the skirt and is decorated with black-winged pink hearts. Most importantly, the train extends upwards and transforms into wings

Lagoona has yellow blonde hair with coral pink streaks that is worn in a ponytail. Teal blue eyes, turquoise shadow, coral lips, and teal freckles complement her pale turquoise skin. She is wearing a striped turquoise dress with a pink flower print and a coral pink hood with a hard plastic edge. The hood can be pulled down to her shoulders to create a cape-like shawl with black tulle frills.  The dress can be pulled further down to her waist to reveal a molded sleeveless top that is black with coral pink, turquoise, and scales. The hood then acts as a layered skirt with a black tulle peplum. Pulled even lower the dress becomes a shimmery scaled skirt that has a big coral pink hem with black tulle accents. Coral ankle-strap pumps accentuate each variation of the outfit. The final transformation is into a mermaid. Pulled completely down, the dress gives Lagoona a black waist with a shimmery scaled tail and coral pink tail fins. Translucent wing-like coral fins are added to her back to complete the look.

Clawdeen has brown hair with purple highlights that hang in two long ponytails. She has tan skin, yellow eyes, pink eyeshadow, and fanged deep red lips. She is wearing a molded black top detailed with gold zipper stripes, purple leopard print, and a wolf waist buckle. The purple fur collar is adorned with gold dots and a crescent moon. Her purple skirt is decorated with diagonal rows made up of gold phases of the moon. The waist and hem are trimmed in black. On her feet are purple pumps with claw toes boxes, furry ankle straps, and howling wolves for heels. Clawdeen’s molded gold train features moon phase cutouts, embossed howling wolves, and fluffy purple fur trim. When you swish her purple tail a golden wolf mask lowers over her face and her train flips up to create a lavish collar.

Pennywise is a Monster High doll inspired by the character from the IT Chapter Two film. She has lots of tightly curled orange hair and an intense stare. Her clown-themed face paint has black eyeliner, a red nose, and red lips. She wears a stunning grey clown suit with a large tulle collar, billowy shoulders, frilled cuffs, a gathered organza skirt, and white-gloved hands. The sleeves and capri pants have metallic stripes and red pompoms decorate the bodice. Red accents embellish the waist, sleeves, and cuffs. On her feet are grey and white lace-up boots. Each boot is detailed with a toothy platform and a red pompom on the toebox. Accessories include a red balloon and a paper boat with “SS Georgie” on the side. This Skullector doll has 11 points of articulation and includes a doll stand.  Dolls ordered from the Mattel Creations website also included a Pennywise print. The print is individually numbered and limited to 1300. You'll float too, Ghoul...  Hiya, you in the Loser's Club, is my lurking a bit too freaky for you? Down in my gutter? You know what they say, one person's sewer is a clown's home sweet home.  Don't you want to join me? Are you not intrigued by my killer style and my gore-geous smile?! You say you are fierce, that you are not afraid. Prove it. Show me you are unique. Show me you are a monster too. All you've got to do is float. Come on... we all float down here.

The Grady Twins are inspired by characters from the 1980 The Shining film. Each girl has big brown eyes, full lips, ad beautiful brown hair accentuated by an axe barrette. They have matching outfits that feature babydoll dresses. Each light blue dress is detailed with white dots, sheer sleeves, and a pleated bodice. A pink ribbon with a bow is at the waist and white lace trims the collar, sleeves, and skirt. On their feet are white knee-high stockings and black mary jane shoes. The shoes have green hedge-like platforms with animal-shaped heels. Several accessories are included with the twins. There is a key to room 237, a page from Jack’s typewriter, and a tennis ball. These Skullector dolls have 11 points of articulation and include doll stands. Dolls ordered from the Mattel Creations website also came with a Grady Twins print. The print is individually numbered and limited to 500. Come play with us, ghoul...  Hello there. We see you playing ALL alone. We, of all ghouls, understand just how lonely this hotel can be... especially when it's monstrously snowy outside. Why don't you come play with us? We have been haunting these halls for ever and ever and ever, lurking for a guest like you to be our new beast friend. Somebody who can appreciate how scary-cute we are - mirror images, holding hands in our matching dresses. OH! Please don't ride your tricycle away! Maybe we can use this key to play a fangtastic game of hide-and-shriek in room 237?! We only hope you have a freaky-fab time here at your stay at the Overlook Hotel.
